texts.es: Edwin de  48 años de edad, casado, con hijos mayores,  de la localidad de achuapa tiene por actividad economica una carpinteria ubicada en su casa de habitacion, en la actualida ha logrado tener éxito con su clientela gracia al buen servicio que presta en la elaboracion de mueble, tiene varios años de experiencia, la cual la adquirio de su papa que le enseño el oficio, el esta solicitando el financiamiento para la compra de materiales como:  madera, tela, lona, pega, clavos, esponja, entre otros.
texts.en:
Edwin is 48 years old and married. His children are adults. He lives in the town of Achuapa, and his business is a carpentry workshop located in his home. He currently has achieved success with his customer base thanks to the good service he provides building furniture. He has several years of experience, which he first acquired from his father, who taught him the trade.
He is requesting financing in order to purchase materials, such as: wood, fabric, canvas, glue, nails, foam, and other items.

loans.use: to purchase wood, fabric, canvas, glue, nails, foam, and other items.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: Maria Luisa, casada, con dos hijos mayores tiene por actividad economica un pulperia ubicada en su casa de habitacion desde hace 13 años  que inico con esta herramienta de trabajo para tener un medio de apoyar con los gastos ecomonico de su hogar, y gracias al apoyo que fundacion leon 2000 le ha brindado es que ha podido invertical en capital de trabajo para mantener el negocio , en la actualidad ella esta solicitando el financiamiento para la compra de productos de consumo diario como: arroz, frijoles, azucar, sal, pan, leche, huevos, queso, fosforo, tiste, jugos naturales, entre otros.
texts.en:
María Luisa is married and has two adult children.  Her economic activity is a grocery store located at home; she started it 13 years ago in order to have a work tool through which she could contribute to household expenses and thanks to support that Fundación León 2000 has provided she’s been able to invest in working capital to stay in business.  

She’s currently asking for financing to buy daily consumption items like: rice, beans, sugar, salt, bread, milk, eggs, cheese, matches, ‘tiste’ [mix of cocoa powder and cornmeal], natural juices, among others.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Teodora

texts.en: Teodora is applying for a loan of $1,000. She is 26 years old and runs a kiosk. She has two children. She lives in the city so it is easy for her to go and buy more things to sell in her store. She is making good income from her business and she wants to open a big store in the future.

loans.use: To buy soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Islomiddin

texts.ru: Исломиддин житель района Кумсангир. Ему 43 года. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам Исломиддин занимается животноводством. Он разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. В этой области он два года. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Islomiddin is a resident of the Kumsangir region. He is 43 years old. He is married. He has four children. His wife is a housewife. Islomiddin himself is involved in animal husbandry. He breeds cattle at home. He's been involved in this area for two years. He is taking a loan to purchase calves.

loans.use: to purchase calves.

loans.name: Daler

texts.ru: Далер трудолюбивый и добрый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Его жена заботливая  ухаживает за домом и  заботиться о своей семье. Далер занимается  купле- продажей продуктов питания на местном рынке города. Имеет большой ассортимент продуктов питания. Он сам занимается этим бизнесом, его семья только поддерживает его и дают хорошие советы. Далер хотел бы получить займ для покупки масла, сахара и яиц с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Далер надеется на вашу поддержку и помощь.
texts.en: Daler, a hard-working and kind man, is married and raising two children. His wife takes care of the house and the family. Daler is engaged in the purchase and sale of food in the local town market. He has a wide range of food products. He is alone in his business - his family only supports him and gives good advice. Dallaire would like to get a loan for the purchase of butter, sugar and eggs to replenish his working capital. Daler hopes for your support and help.

loans.use: To buy eggs, sugar and oil in order to increase his working capital

loans.name: Olga

texts.ru:
Ольга – разведена. У нее двое дочерей. Она живет в Ивано-Франковске. Уже 7 лет она занимается мелкооптовой и розничной торговлей овощами и фруктами на центральном продуктовом рынке. Так как постоянного места для торговли у нее нет, она продает продукты с собственного буса. Цены на овощи и фрукты у Ольги привлекательны как для мелкооптовых покупателей, так и для среднестатистического потребителя. Чистая прибыль составляет около 3 000 гривен. 

Ольга планирует вложить сумму в 12 000 гривен в закупку ассортимента сельхозпродукции, а именно капусты, огурцов и помидоров. Она надеется увеличить оборотные средства и заработать на снижении закупочных цен. Недавно Ольга приобрела минивэн за 14 000 долларов, что помогло ей существенно облегчить работу и сделать бизнес мобильным. Со временем Ольга хотела бы доделать ремонт в квартире, в которой живет вместе с родителями и детьми.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Olga is divorced. She has two daughters and lives in Ivano-Frankivsk.  For the past seven years, she has been involved in wholesale and retail business and sells fruits and vegetables at the central food market.  Since she has no permanent place to conduct her business, she sells her goods from her own booth.  She sells produce at prices that are attractive to both wholesale buyers and the average consumer.  Her net income is about 3,000 hryvnia.

Olga plans to invest an amount of 12,000 hryvnia into the purchase of a wide range of agricultural products such as cabbage, cucumbers and tomatoes. She hopes to increase her working capital and take advantage of lower purchase prices. 

She has recently bought a minivan for 14,000 dollars, which has significantly eased her work and helped her to become more mobile.  Over time, she would like to complete some repairs in the apartment where she lives with her parents and her children.

Note: The description is in Russian.

loans.use: to buy cabbage, cucumbers and tomatoes in bulk.

loans.name: Dios Me Fortalece Group

texts.es: El banco comunal Dios me fortalece esta comformado pro 14 integrantes Teresa, Jacinta, Manuel, Amada, Heyssel, Mercedes, Ana, Reymundo,  Yelva, Ines, Paula, Marcela,  Margarita, Santos todos tienen  diferentes actividades economica diferentes pero siempre se apoyan mutuamente para el bienestar y progreso del grupo, en la actulidad Teresa es la coordinadora del grupo la cual vela por el buen funcionamiento del grupo y la buena comunicación, ella se dedica a la actividad economica de la artesania y esta solicitando el finananciamiento para la compra de materiales como: pincel, barro, pintura, moldes, entre otros.
texts.en:
The “Dios Me Fortalece” (God Strengthens Me) communal bank has 14 members: Teresa, Jacinta, Manuel, Amada, Heyssel, Mercedes, Ana, Reymundo,  Yelva, Inés, Paula, Marcela,  Margarita and Santos.  They all have different economic activities but always support each other for the group’s wellbeing and progress.

Currently, Teresa is group coordinator and she watches over the group’s good functioning and good communication.  Her economic activity is crafts and she’s asking for this financing to buy supplies like: brushes, clay, paint and molds, among others.

loans.use: to buy crafts-making supplies.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es: Anibal cliente kiva, de 53 años de edad es originario de Estelí,  casado, padre de 7 hijos. El de oficio comerciante se dedica a la venta de carne desde hace 21 años, su primer crédito  fue de gran ayuda ya que le permitió  invertir en el inventario de su negocio, incrementaron sus ventas generando a la vez mas ingresos, su primer préstamo lo utilizo para capital de trabajo en la compra de carne ya que su producto tiene mucha demanda. El desea crecer en su negocio con productos de alta calidad es por eso que hoy en día solicita de un nuevo préstamo  para invertir aun mas en su negocio en la compra de carne con el objetivo de cubrir la demanda de los clientes, en su negocio recibe el apoyo de su esposa  que le ayuda a atender a los clientes, el estima que esta nueva inversión será de ayuda ya que podrá mantener su negocio activo y podra cubrir la demanda de sus clientes, el espera contar con el apoyo de Kiva para seguir  trabajando en su negocio,  obtener mas ingresos y poder ofrecerle un mejor nivel económico a su familia.
texts.en:
Kiva client, Aníbal, 53, is from Estelí.  He’s married and the father of seven children.  He’s a merchant; he’s been selling meat for 21 years.  His first loan was of great help to him because it allowed him to invest in expanding his business’ inventory; his sales increased which in turn generated more income.  He used his first loan as working capital to buy meat which is a product in high demand.

He wants to expand his business with high quality products which is why today he’s asking for a new loan to invest even more in his business buying meat to meet customer demand.  

His wife helps him tend to customers in his business and he feels that this new investment will be of help because he’ll be able to keep his business active and will be able to meet customer demand. He hopes that with Kiva’s help he will be able to continue in business, to earn more income and be able to offer his family a better economic standard.

loans.use: to buy meat.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de cabiba de internet y tambien juegos de play station,la socia tiene un local donde trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de cabina de internet y juegos de play station.La socia solicita el credito para comprar accesorios para la computadora y tambien para comprar juegos de play station.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member still works in her Internet booth business, and also with PlayStation games. She works at her business location from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm. This business allows her to provide for her children. Her dream is to expand her Internet and PlayStation games business. She is requesting the loan in order to purchase computer accessories and also to purchase PlayStation games.

She is happy with the loan and is committed to paying her installments.

loans.use: to purchase computer accessories and PlayStation games.

loans.name: Munavvar

texts.ru: Мунаввар трудолюбивая и заботливая жена. Её муж очень старательный человек, который хочет содержать свою семью в хороших условиях и работает усердно. Мунаввар хотела помочь ему и немножко поддержать его в содержании семьи. Она начала заниматься  купле- продажей кондитерских изделий. Она продолжает свой бизнес уже 17 лет и имеет достаточно богатый опыт. Её место торговли находится на центральном рынке «Ганг»  района. Она привозит свежие продукты, который привлекает много покупателей. Она приобретает товар из города. Мунаввар хотела бы получить займ для покупки кондитерских изделий с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу поддержку, который позволит ей улучшить  благосостояние семьи.
texts.en: Munavvar is a hardworking and caring wife. Her husband is a very studious person who wants to support his family with good conditions and hard work. Munavvar wanted to help him and support him a little bit in the family. She began to engage in the purchase and sale of confectionery products. She has continued the business for 17 years and has enough experience. Her place of trade is located in the central market of the "Gang" region. She brings fresh products, which attracts many buyers. She gets her products from the city. Munavvar would like to get a loan for the purchase of confectionery products in order to replenish working capital. She is waiting for your support, which will allow her to improve the welfare of her family.

loans.use: To purchase confectionery products

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia Gloria,continua dedicandose a su negocio de salón de belleza, ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia,la socia realiza diferentes tipos de peinados,tientes,cortes de cabello entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante por su familia.
La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de materiales para su negocio como una secadora y tintes.

La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Gloria continues with her beauty salon business; it’s now several years that she’s been in this business and she does well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She does a variety of hair styles, hair coloring and haircuts, among others.  She is a responsible person who very much wants to continue moving forward for her family.

She’s asking for the loan to buy supplies for her business like a hair dryer and hair coloring.  She feels grateful for the opportunity provided by this means and commits to make her payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy a hair dryer and hair coloring.

loans.name: Sinforosa

texts.es: La Sra. Sinforosa  tiene 31 años y es soltera con 2 hijos que son de las edades de  11 y 13 años, ella se dedica a  servicio costura de polleras para las cholitas, en su taller propio que se encuentran en zona Esmeralda este de la localidad de Sacaba, este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Sinforosa  va a usar este préstamo  para la compra de una máquina de coser industrial para su negocio. su razón para solicitar este préstamo es quiere mejorar la calidad del trabajo realizado ya que tiene pedidos que entregar a distintos mercados de la localidad, la Sra. Sinforosa enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la falta de equipos y a veces de material cuando le hacen pedidos por mayor depende de los trabajos que tiene que realizar y va a utilizar los beneficios en la compra de tela, La Sra. Sinforosa es una persona trabajadora que su deseo es tener un taller grande y contratar mano de obra y así enseñar a jóvenes el oficio de la confección.
texts.en:
Sinforosa, 31, is single and has two children who are 11 and 13 years old.  She provides sewing services; she makes indigenous style blouses in her own shop located in Sacaba’s Esmeralda neighborhood.  

This loan is her first sequence within the institution and Sinforosa will use this loan to buy an industrial sewing machine for her business.  Her reason for requesting the loan is because she wants to improve the quality of the work she does since she has pending orders to fill for various markets in the area.

The business challenge Sinforosa faces is lack of equipment and sometimes of materials when she gets wholesale orders.  She depends on the orders she gets and will use profits to buy fabric.

Sinforosa is a hardworking person who’s wish is to have a larger workshop and to hire laborers to teach clothes making to youngsters.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: Jamolidin

texts.ru: Чамолидин торгует запчастями для автомашин на рынке Сафина.  Рядом с  его торговой точкой находится автосервис, и ему выгодно торговать там, потому что те, кто приходит для ремонта автомашины покупают у него запчасти. Также имеет много  постоянных клиентов так как его цены являются доступными для всех. Имеет богатый опыт в данном бизнесе. Он в этом бизнесе уже 3-ий  год. Чамолидин имеет дружную семью и двух прекрасных детей. Его любящая жена занимается домохозяйством. Чамолидин хотел бы получить займ для покупки автозапчастей с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Jamolidin sells parts for motor vehicles at the Safina market. Near his shop is an auto repair shop. It's to his advantage to sell there because those who come to the repair shop buy parts from him. He also has many regular customers because his prices are affordable for all. He has extensive experience in this business. It's already his third year in this business. Jamolidin has a close-knit family and two beautiful children. His loving wife is involved in the household. Jamolidin would like to get a loan for the purchase of auto parts to replenish his working capital. He looks forward to your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase auto parts

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia Hilda sigue participando en el banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y las reuniones del banco comunal son en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Hilda sigue trabajando en una entidad pública y también se sigue dedicando a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes, ella vende sus animalitos en los diferentes mercados y ferias de la ciudad del Cusco. Con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios. En esta oportunidad Hilda requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como cuyes. 

La socia Hilda está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Hilda continues participating in the “Siempre Juntos” (Always Together) communal bank.  The bank meetings take place in Cusco District in Cusco Province and Department.

Hilda continues working for a public entity but also continues raising small farm animals like guinea pigs, for example.  She sells her little animals in various markets and street markets in the city of Cusco.  

She did very well with the previous loan and was able to earn good profits.  On this occasion, Hilda needs the loan to buy more small farm animals like guinea pigs.

Hilda is happy about the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy more small farm animals like guinea pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de tienda de abarrotes,el vende productos de primera necesidad como aroz,azucar y leche y tambien el socio se dedica al negocio de musica,el socio anima eventos como matrimonios,cumpleaños y bautizos,el socio por medio de estos negocio saca adelante a su familia.El socio solicita el credito para comprar instrumentos musicales como una guitarra.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with his grocery store selling basic staple items like rice, sugar and milk but he also works as a musician entertaining at events like weddings, birthdays and baptisms.  He is able to support his family by means of these businesses.  He’s asking for the loan to buy musical instruments like a guitar.  He’s happy with the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy musical instruments like a guitar.

loans.name: Abdugaffor

texts.ru: Абдугаффор более 6 лет занимается продажей медикаментов. Имеет аптеку в  районе и предоставляет местным жителям медицинскую помощь. Абдугаффор имеет хорошую дружную семью. На воспитании имеет четверых прекрасных, умных несовершеннолетних детей. Абдугаффор обслуживает своих клиентов на высоком уровне и желает им добра. Всегда вежливо обращается с пациентами. Абдугаффор также раздает медикаменты во все  аптеки  района. Абдугаффор запрашивает займ для покупки медикаментов с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Abdugaffor has more than six years of experience selling medicines. He has a local pharmacy and provides care to local residents. Abdugaffor has a good, happy family. As far as education, he has four beautiful, intelligent young children. Abdugaffor serves his customers at a high level and wishes them well. He always treats patients politely. Abdugaffor also distributes medicines to all area drugstores. Abdugaffor is requesting a loan for the purchase of medicines in order to replenish his working capital.

loans.use: To purchase medicines

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
La socia Margarita,continua dedicandose al negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azucar,leche,golosinas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia trabaja todos los dias en su negocio desde las 06:00am hasta las 10:00pm aproximadamente, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de mercaderia como arroz y gaseosas.

La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Margarita continues with her grocery store business; she sells various types of products like rice, sugar, milk and snacks, among others.

She’s been in business for a good period of time and she does well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She works every day from 6am until 10pm approximately; this is the way she supports her family.

She’s asking for the loan to buy merchandise like rice and soft-drinks.  She feels grateful for the opportunity provided by this means and at the same time commits to make her installment payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
El socio Gerardo sigue participando en el banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y las reuniones del banco comunal son  cada treinta días en el distrito de Cusco de la provincia de Cusco y del departamento de Cusco.

El socio Gerardo sigue con el negocio de fabricación y venta de colchones, él sigue con el local donde vende los colchones desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m. Con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios. 

El  socio Gerardo en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar colchones y también materiales para hacer los colchones como espuma y telas al por mayor.

El socio Gerardo está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gerardo continues participating in the “Siempre Juntos” (Always Together) communal bank. The bank meetings take place every thirty days in Cusco District in Cusco Province and Department.

Gerardo continues with his business manufacturing and selling mattresses.  He's still in the locale where he sells the mattresses from 9am until 6pm.  He did very well with the previous loan and was able to earn good profits.

On this occasion, Gerardo needs the loan to buy mattresses and also materials to manufacture mattresses, like foam and fabric, at wholesale.

Gerardo is happy with the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy mattresses and also to buy supplies to make mattresses, like foam and fabric, at wholesale.

loans.name: Maria Rosa

texts.es: La señora María tiene 59 años de edad, ella cuenta con domicilio propio en la localidad de Sacaba, ella tiene 2 hijos los cuales son independientes y casados. La señora María se dedica a la elaboración de empanadas en su domicilio dos veces por semana, ya que el sueldo que percibe como maestra de escuela no le alcanza para sustentarse, la señora vende los días de feria en sacaba jueves y domingo, ya que esta es su segunda actividad,  El préstamo que solicita es para la compra de insumos por cantidad  como harina,  azúcar y queso ya que por estas épocas empieza a subir el precio de estos productos, con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien por este motivo vuelve  solicitar otro préstamo ya que elabora en mayor cantidad ya que esta época hay vacaciones escolares y se dedicara expresamente a la elaboración de empanadas,   la Sra. María es una persona muy trabajadora y agradecida  por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old and has her own home in the town of Sacaba. She has two children, who are married and no longer live at home. María works making empanadas at home twice a week, since the salary she earns as a schoolteacher is not enough to support herself. She sells them on market days, which in Sacaba are Thursdays and Sundays, since this is her second job.
The loan she is requesting is for purchasing ingredients in bulk, such as flour, sugar, and cheese, because during this time of year the price of these products starts to increase. Her previous loan went very well, which is why she is requesting another loan, since she now makes larger amounts of empanadas. She will be working exclusively on this, because school is out this time of year.
María is a very hard worker and she is grateful for the opportunity offered.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, and cheese, for making empanadas.

loans.name: Arnel

texts.en:
34-year-old Arnel owns and manages a sari-sari store business in Trinidad, Bohol. He earns 4,500 PHP per month selling snack foods, canned goods, soft drinks, and other items. 

Arnel works hard to support his family and save for his future. 

He has requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as school supplies and toiletries. He hopes to be a successful businessman in the future.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as school supplies and toiletries.

loans.name: Mang

texts.en:
Agribusiness is a very important thing for people living in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. Mang, 23, as well as other villagers, operates a rice farming business and at the same time raises pigs for additional income.

In her backyard, she built a pigpen where she has installed and fattened a few pigs. She sells those pigs to local traders and butchers when they are full grown. She has been engaged in this type of business for almost seven years and earns a suitable income to support her living. 

Mang would like to make improvements in her hog-raising business, but due to inadequate capital she is now taking out a loan of KHR 4,000,000 to expand her pigpen and purchase additional piglets for fattening. 

This will enable her to make her business more viable and a profitable source of income. With the increase in income, she will reinvest back into the business to double the return.

loans.use: to expand her pigpen and purchase additional piglets for fattening.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, soap, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: La Sra. Judith tiene 40 años tiene  2 hijos que son  de las edades de 18 y 17 años, los dos estudian, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa en su puesto de venta que se encuentra la zona Palmira  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Judith va a usar este préstamo  para compra de ropa de temporada  de invierno y así de esta manera incrementar su capital de trabajo,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de capital  para diversificar sus productos, la Sra. Judith va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir mejorando su negocio, surtiendo su mercadería y así generar mayores ingresos y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Judith, 40, has two children who are 18 and 17 years old; both are studying.  She sells clothes in a stand located in the Palmira zone.  

This loan is her first sequence within the institution.  Judith will use this loan to buy winter clothes thus increasing her working capital.  

The reason for asking for this loan is the lack of capital to diversify her products.  Judith will use profits to continue improving her business stocking merchandise to generate higher income and thus improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy winter clothes.

loans.name: Rosa Elizabeth

texts.es:
Rosa es una persona que se caracteriza por ser responsable, trabajadora y muy seria en lo que realiza. Rosa vive con su esposo y sus cuatro hijos en Pujilí que se encuentra cerca de Latacunga en la Provincia de Cotopaxi.

Rosa trabaja sola en la crianza de pollos, negocio que le ayuda a sustentar los gastos de su hogar. Rosa trabaja casi seis años con Fodemi, el actual crédito que solicita es para incrementar su negocio ampliando los galpones para comprar más pollos y también quiere dedicarse a la crianza de cerdos y va a compra crias. Esta inversión ayudará a Rosa a obtener mejores ingresos y a poder sustentar los gastos de los estudios de sus hijos.

Rosa sueña en que le vaya bien en su negocio de los chanchos que recién va a empezar, para que su hogar se estabilice economicamente.
texts.en:
Rosa is a person who is notable for being responsible, hardworking and serious about what she does.  She lives with her husband and four children in Pujilí which is located near Latacunga in Cotopaxi Province.

Rosa works alone raising chickens, a business that helps her meet household expenses.  Rosa has been working with Fodemi for almost six years.  The loan she’s asking for now is to increase her business expanding the corrals to buy more chickens; she also wants to start raising pigs and she will buy some piglets.  This investment will help Rosa earn improved income to cover her children’s educational expenses.

Rosa dreams that she’ll do well in her pig business that’s she’s going to start shortly so that her home will stabilize economically.

loans.use: to buy chickens and piglets and to make improvements to her corrals.

loans.name: Anntoniette

texts.en:
Anntoniette is a 34-year-old married woman with four children aged between 9 months and 11 years. Her husband works as a driver.

Anntoniette has had a sari-sari store business for 8 years. She earns 4,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) per month selling toiletries, sugar, vinegar, eggs, and other items. She works hard to increase her sales and help provide for her family's basic needs.

She has requested a loan to buy more items to sell such as canned goods and snack foods. Anntoniette hopes to increase her profitability.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell, such as canned goods and snack foods.

loans.name: Nadezhda

texts.ru:
Надежда родом из Новой Каховки. Она уже 16 лет занимается мелким предпринимательством в своем родном городке, продавая носки, колготки и купальники на одном из местных рынков. Размер оборотного капитала составляет 21 000 гривен. Чистая прибыль на данный момент – около 6 000 гривен. 

Надежда обратилась в Киву за кредитом в размере 10 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить 40 комплектов купальников, а также 100 пар носков для последующей реализации. Увеличив ассортимент товара, Надежда надеется за счет расширения увеличить и прибыль, тем самым получив возможность и дальше содержать семью, обеспечивая ее всем необходимым.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en: Nadezhda is from Novaya Kahovka.  She has been involved in a small entrepreneurship, selling socks, stockings and swimming suits, at one of the local markets in her native town for 16 years.  The size of her working capital is 21 000 hryvnia.  The current net profit is about 6 000 hryvnia.  Nadezhda requested a loan from Kiva in the amount of 10 000 hryvnia to purchase 40 sets of swimming suits and also 100 pairs of socks for subsequent resale.  Having expanded her merchandise selection, Nadezhda hopes to have an opportunity to continue supporting her family and providing them with all of the necessities due to an expansion and increased profit.

loans.use: to purchase 40 sets of swimming suits and also 100 pairs of socks for subsequent resale

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru: Баходур проживает в городе Турсунзаде. Ему 40 лет. Он вдовец. У него четверо детей. Он более десяти лет занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Bahodur lives in Tursun-zoda. He is 40 years old, widowed and has four children. Bahodur has been farming for more then ten years. He is requesting this loan to purchase fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Brisayda

texts.es:
Brisayda tiene 32 años, tiene tres hijos en edad escolar. Junto a su pareja e hijos viven en la casa que construyeron con mucho esfuerzo. Brisayda y su familia viven en el distrito de La Unión, caracterizado por la buena producción de verduras que otorga sus tierras.

Las necesidades de estudio de sus hijos la han impulsado ha dedicarse a múltiples actividades. Una de ellas es la agricultura, junto a su esposo, siembran hortalizas y tubérculos, también cría animales como carneros y vacas. Pero la actividad que le genera mayores satisfacciones es la venta de comestibles en una tienda que ha acondicionado en su vivienda. Lleva como 5 años en este negocio y menciona que le va muy bien, y que todo depende de los productos frescos y surtidos que pueda ofrecer. “La atención a mis clientes es lo primordial, además este trabajo es más relajado que la agricultura”, dice. Una de sus metas es otorgarles lo necesario a sus hijos, en cuanto a sus estudios posteriores. Para ello seguirá trabajando como hasta ahora.

Este es el crédito número 7 que recibe de MFP, por eso afirma su compromiso de ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Pertenece al banco comunal “La Unión hace la fuerza” y se siente contenta de tener socias igual de responsables.
Destinará este dinero en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda como: azúcar, arroz, aceite, verduras, carnes, bebidas gaseosas, etc.
texts.en:
Brisayda is 32 years old and has three children who are of school age. She lives with her partner and her children in a house that they built with great effort. They reside in the District of La Unión, which is known for having land that yields good vegetable production.

Providing for her children's educational needs is what drove Brisayda into engaging in multiple activities. One of her jobs is that of a farmer. She and her husband work together in planting vegetables and tubers. Brisayda also raises animals, such as sheep and cows. However, the job that gives her the greatest satisfaction is selling groceries from a store that is set up in her home. She has been in this business for five years and says that she is doing very well. All of her success depends on having fresh products and providing an assortment of goods to offer. "The service to my customers is of great importance. In addition, this job is more relaxed than farming," says Brisayda. One of her goals is to provide for the needs of her children, especially their education in the future. She continues to work for this reason.

This is her seventh loan with MFP. For this reason, she pledges her commitment to being punctual with her monthly payments. Brisayda is a member of the Communal Bank "La Unión Hace La Fuerza” and is pleased that there are members who are equally responsible. This loan will be used to buy basic necessity products for her store such as sugar, rice, oil, vegetables, meat, sodas, and other items.

loans.use: to buy food products for her store.

loans.name: Carmen Lourdes

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de artesania,ella tambien sigue pintando,la socia por medio de este negocio quiere salira adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la artesania.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pinceles y arcilla para que haga sus trabajos de artesania.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues working in her crafts business.  She also continues to paint.  She wants to get ahead through this means.  Her dream is to have a locale wherein she can sell her crafts.  She’s asking for the loan to buy brushes and clay to make her crafts.  She’s happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy crafts-making supplies.

loans.name: Faustina

texts.es:
La socia Faustina pertenece al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y las reuniones son cada treinta días en el distrito de Huanchac de la provincia de Cusco y del departamento de Cusco.

La socia Faustina sigue dedicándose al negocio de compra y venta de ropa, ella sigue también con el negocio de venta de artefactos y zapatos. Con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios. La socia Faustina en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar ropa como por ejemplo casacas, camisas, faldas y otras cosas más. 


La socia Faustina agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Faustina is a member of the “Siempre Juntos” (Always Together) communal bank whose meetings take place every thirty days in Huanchac District in Cusco province and Department.

Faustina continues buying and selling clothes; she also continues with her business selling appliances and shoes.  She did very well with the previous loan and was able to earn good profits.  On this occasion, Faustina needs the loan to buy clothes like jackets, shirts, skirts and other things.

Faustina is grateful for the loan opportunity that will allow her to invest in the business and to grow economically.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Rejina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de servicio de taxi que su esposo maneja el carro y tambien ahora la socia esta trabajando en su taller de mecanica junto con su esposo,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo,el sueño de la socia es ampliar su taller de macanica.La socia solicita el credito para comprar llanta para su carro.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: The member continues with her taxi service where her husband drives the car; she’s also now working with her husband in his car repair shop.  She’s able to support her son with these businesses.  Her dream is to expand the shop.  She’s requesting the loan to buy tires for her car.  She’s happy with the loan and commits to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy tires for her car.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,ella sigue preparando desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta als 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz,azucar,carne,pollo y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower is continuing to run her restaruant.  She offers breakfast, lunch and dinner.  She works from 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.  Through this business she has managed to provide a better life for her children.  Her dream is to expand and improve her business.  She is seeking this loan in order to buy products for her restaurant such as rice, sugar, meat, chicken and vegetables.

She is grateful for this loan opportunity and promises to make her repayments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy products for her restaurant such as rice, sugar, meat, chicken and vegetables.

loans.name: Melvin

texts.en:
This is Melvin, who previously availed a Php9000 loan that she used to purchase products needed in her business. Her additional earnings were a big help toward the education of her children and in meeting their personal, household and business expenses.

Melvin is now requesting a new Php9000 loan for her to buy more merchandise to increase her product inventory. The more items she has on display and on hand, the better. More items to sell will result in better profits which will definitely help her sustain her daily needs and meet the educational expenses of her children. She looks forward to this loan with gladness and thankfulness in her heart.

Melvin hopes to grow her business in the coming years. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to pay for merchandise needed in her business.

loans.name: Ricardo Antonio

texts.es: Ricardo Antonio es casado este emprendedor tiene por actividad económica un  taller de tapicería, ubicado en su casa de habitación ,el emprendedor ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000, en el trayecto de su crédito ha demostrado ser una persona responsable y con buenos valores tiene sueños y metas en la vida para superarse como persona y en el negocio. Actualmente está solicitando financiamiento para comprar más material para la tapicería como: clavos, telas, pega, zipper, cuero entre otros.
texts.en: The entrepreneur Ricardo Antonio is married and has as a business an upholstery shop, located in his own home, which has supported him by financing the purchase of materials for the upholstery shop. The entrepreneur has already taken out a loan with Fundación León 2000. In the course of handling his loan he has shown himself to be a responsible person with good values. He has dreams and goals in life to improve himself as a person and in the business. Currently he is seeking financing for the purchase of more materials for upholstering such as nails, fabric, glue, zippers, and leather among other items, since his primary production is making protective equipment for various stores.

loans.use: to purchase nails, fabric, glue, zippers, and leather among other items.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es: JORGE ALBERTO, CASADO CON 40 AÑOS DE EDAD, SIN HIJOS, EMPLEADO DE UN COLEGIO COMO JARDINERO, UBICADO EN UN COLEGIO DE SU LOCALIDAD, JORGE ESTA SOLICITANDO EL CREDIO PARA HACERLE MEJORAS A SU VIVIENDA, COMO ES EL CAMBIO DE PISO DE CERAMICA, Y REPELLAR LAS PAREDES,SUS SUEÑOS ES TERMINA POR COMPLETO SU VIVIEND, EL FINANCIAMIENTO LO SOLICITA PARA COMPRAR MATERIAL DE TRABAJO de construccion COMO: PISO DE CERAMICA,CAL, CEMENTO, ARENA, SEPARADORES, ENTRE OTROS.
texts.en: Jorge Alberto is 40 and married, without children.  He works at the local high school as a gardener.  Jorge is asking for this loan to make improvements to his home, such as replacing his tile floor and plastering his walls.  His dream is to completely finish his home.  He is asking for this loan to buy construction materials, such as tile flooring, lime, cement, sand, and framing, among other things.

loans.use: comprar :   piso de ceramica, cal, cemento, arena, separadores, entre otros.

loans.name: Sobeida

texts.es: LA SENORA SOBEIDA SOLICITA SU CREDITO PARA REPARAR EL GARAGE DE SU VIVIENDA Y ASI TENER MAS ESAPCIO DONDE PUEDAN TRABAJARLO TAMBIEN PODER ACOMODAR EL NEGOCIO DE SU ESPOSO EL SEÑOR JOEL YA QUE EL SE DEDICA A LA CARPINTERIA DESDE HACE MUCHOS AÑOS ASI EL PODRA TENER MAS ESPACIO DONDE PUEDA METER SU MERCANCIA Y TENER UN  MAYUOR NUMERO DE CLIENTES. SOBEIDA TRABAJA EN UNA FABRICA DE LA LOCALIDAD  Y SU ESPOSO COMO YA HABIAMOS DICHO SE DEDICA A LA CARPINTERIA Y ASI LOS DOS OBTIENEN INGRESOS PARA MANTENER SU CASA TODOS LOS DIAS UNA DE LAS REPARACIONES ES EL GARAGE YA QUE SERIA TAMBIEN MAYOR PRESENTACION PARA EL NEGOCIO DEL ESPOSO.
texts.en:
Sobeida is requesting her loan in order to repair the garage of her home. This is to have more space where they can work, and also accommodate her husband Joel's business. He has been a carpenter for many years, and this way he will be able to have more space to put his merchandise and have a greater number of customers.

Sobeida works in a local factory, and her husband, as already mentioned, is a carpenter. This way, the two of them earn income to support their household every day. 

One of the repairs planned is to the garage, as it would also improve the appearance of her husband's business.

loans.use: To repair her garage.

loans.name: Rosalia

texts.es:
La socia Rosalia, continua ejerciendo su profesion de cheff ,la socia sigue trabajando  en una institucion publica,la socia trabaja seis dias a la semana durante el dia,la socia lleva buen tiempo trabajando siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante,la socia continua con su sueño de aperturar un restaurante turistico aun ella esta implementando poco a poco.
La socia solicita el credito para comprar loceria como platos.

La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
The member, Rosalia, continues practicing her profession as a chef. She is still working in a public institution; she works six days a week during the day. She has been working for a good deal of time, which is how she gets ahead. 

Rosalia continues to dream of opening a tourist restaurant and she is still making that happen little by little. Rosalia is requesting this loan to purchase dishes such as plates.

Rosalia feels grateful for the opportunity being offered through this medium and, as such, she is committed to making her payments according to the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to purchase dinnerware, such as plates.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La socia Edith nació en la ciudad del Cusco, vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” de la Asociación Arariwa. 

La socia Edith trabaja en una entidad pública y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. La socia Edith en esta oportunidad accede al crédito para uso personal es para educación de su pequeño hijo. 

La socia Edith agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Edith was born in the city of Cusco and still lives in the city of her birth.  She’s in a common law relationship and has a son. She belongs to Asociación Arariwa’s “Siempre Juntos” (Always Together) communal bank.

Edith works for a public entity and does very well thanks to the effort she puts into the work.  On this occasion she’s accessing a personal use loan for her young son’s schooling costs.

Edith is grateful for the loan and commits to make her installment payments according to the established payment schedule.

loans.use: to pay for her son's schooling.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
El socio pertence al banco comunal UNION ,FUERZA AMISTAD;el cual esta situado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco.
El socio Simon tiene 65 años ,casado y tiene 06 hijos; el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesania ,el socio elabora zapatos de diferentes modelos artesanales,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio, el socio tiene un pequeño taller en su casa lugar donde elabora sus zapatos,el socio trabaja de forma ambulatoria el reparte su mercaderia a sus clientes que le solicitan ,el socio es una persona responsable siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia.

El socio solicita el credito para la compra de materiales para su negocio como cuero.

El socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Unión, Fuerza, Amistad” (Unity, Strength, Friendship) communal bank located in Cusco District, Cusco Province.
Simón, 65, is married and has six children.  He alternates his daily activities with a crafts business; he manufactures shoes in various artisanal styles.  

He’s been in business for years and does well thanks to the dedication he puts into the business every day.  He has a small workshop at home where he manufactures the shoes.  He works in an ambulatory fashion distributing his merchandise among his customers who request it.  He’s a responsible person who supports his family this way.

He’s asking for a loan to buy materials, like leather, for his business.

He feels grateful for the granted loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies like leather.

loans.name: Ven

texts.en:
Ven is 29 years old and married to Ky. They have no children yet but they are hoping to have one soon. They are from Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham, but are currently living in a rented room and working in a garment factory in Phnom Penh city. Together, they can earn a monthly salary of USD 150, which they use to pay for room fees, daily food, transportation fees and other allowances.

In order to reduce some expenses, Ven is requesting a loan from HKL for USD 800 to purchase a motorcycle for commuting to their workplace as well as for household use. This loan will help better their living conditions. Ven mentions that he’ll be diligent in repaying it so that later he can get another one to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for commuting to their workplaces as well as for household use.

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal YAHUAR MAQUI;el socio tiene 40 años,separado y tiene 03 hijos;el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de artesania ,el socio elabora chompas de alpaca ,el socio lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia,el socio trabaja de forma ambulatoria repartiendo su mercaderia a sus clientes que le solicitan ,el socio es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.
El socio solicita el credito para la compra de materiales como lana.
El socio se siente agradecido por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Yahuar Maqui communal bank. The member is 40 years old, separated and has three children. He combines his daily activities with his craft business. 

The member makes alpaca wool jumpers and has been working in this trade for several years, which is going well thanks to the effort he puts in everyday. He works on a mobile basis, delivering his merchandise to customers who request it. He is a very responsible person, who really wants to continue working to support his family.

The member is requesting the loan in order to buy materials like wool.

The member is very grateful for the offered loan and is committed to meeting his established monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy materials like wool.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
El socio se sigue dedicando al negocio de libreria y tambien sigue trabajando en construccion haciendo trabajos de construccion y tambien pinta casas,por medio de estos negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de libreria y tambien mejorar en su trabajo en construccion.El socio solicita el credito para comprar libros,cuadernos,lapices,lapiceros y borradores para implementar su libreria.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member continues with his stationery shop business and also working in construction doing construction jobs; he also paints houses.  He is able to support his children through these businesses.

He wants to improve and expand the stationery shop and also to improve the construction work.  He’s asking for the loan to buy books, notebooks, pencils, mechanical pencils and erasers to enlarge his shop.  

He’s happy about the loan and commits to make his installment payments.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for his stationery shop.

loans.name: Marvin Yobani

texts.es:
Marvin  de 28 años de edad, vive en unión libre, tiene 2 hijos, vive en una aldea rural del Municipio de Taulabe, Comayagua.
Marvin ha sido agricultor desde pequeño y hace 4 años que se dedica a su propia producción de café, el produce café pergamino húmedo, tiene una área de 1 manzanas de terreno y se ha motivado mucho por el buen precio que tiene en el mercado y genera buenas ganancias. 
El préstamo que solicita de 3000 lempiras es para invertirlo en compra de fertilizante  para el mantenimiento de la finca de café, dándole una buena asistencia va a mejorar la producción con la que podrá darle una mejor vida a su familia.
Su plan es seguir trabajando para sacar adelante sus cultivos y su familia.
texts.en:
Marvin, 28, is in a common law relationship and has two children; he lives in a rural village in Taulabe Municipality, Comayagua.

Marvin has been a farmer since he was little and for the last four years has been working growing his own coffee.  He produces wet parchment coffee and has a one-manzana [Central American unit of land measurement] plot of land.  He’s highly motivated by the good market price and he generates good profits.

The 3000 lempira loan he’s requesting is to buy fertilizer to maintain his coffee crops.  Providing good maintenance will lead to improved production to give his family a better life.  His plan is to continue working to move his crops and his family forward.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Haller Wilfredo

texts.es:
El socio Haller pertenece al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta días en el distrito de Huanchac de la provincia de Cusco y del departamento de Cusco.

El socio Haller sigue dedicándose a la compra y venta de celulares y accesorios, él sigue teniendo un stand donde expende sus productos. Con el anterior crédito le fue muy bien y pudo obtener buenos beneficios. El socio Haller solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de celulares y de accesorios.

El socio Haller agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Haller is a member of the Communal Bank "Siempre Juntos" (Always Together), a group that conducts its meetings every 30 days in the District of Huanchac in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco.

Haller continues to buy and sell mobile phones and accessories. He still manages a stand where he sells his products. With his previous loan, he did very well and was able to obtain good benefits. Haller is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of mobile phones and accessories.

He is grateful for the opportunity to receive this loan so that he can invest in his business and grow financially.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones and accessories.

loans.name: Yenny Roxana

texts.es:
La socia Yenny sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “SIEMPRE JUNTOS” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta dias en el distrito de Huanchac de la provincia de Cusco y del departamento de Cusco.

La socia Yenny se sigue dedicando a la administracion de su libreria y vende por ejemplo papeleria, borradores, reglas, escuadras, lapiceros, lapices, folders, vinilos, calculadoras entre muchos productos de escritorio y  tambien vende cuadernos para la temporada escolar. La socia Yenny invertira el prestamo en la compra de utiles escolares y de escritorio como por ejemplo papeles.

La socia Yenny agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en:
Yenny is still a member of the "Siempre Juntos" (Always Together) communal bank. The communal bank meets once a month in Huanchac district in Cusco province, Cusco department.

Yenny is still running her bookstore, and sells items such as stationery, erasers, rulers, set squares, pens, pencils, folders, binders, calculators and other office products. She also sells notebooks for the school term. Yenny will use the loan to buy school and office supplies, such as paper.

Yenny is grateful for the opportunity to receive a loan, which will allow her to invest in her business and improve her financial situation.

loans.use: To buy school and office supplies such as paper.

loans.name: Yim

texts.en:
Yim, a 35-year-old married mother of two school-aged children, lives with her family in a small village in the Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. Yim owns a two-hectare plot of land upon which she and her husband cultivate rice for their livelihoods. Rice husbandry is the sole source of the family’s income, and Yim is thankful that her business allows her to buy her daily food and send her children to school.

Yim now wants to start a pig-raising business to earn more income for her family. She is therefore requesting a loan in the amount of KHR 3,000,000 to renovate her old wooden piggery and purchase piglets to raise for future sale. Yim believes that with the help of the loan she will attain success in her new business and is hoping to lift her family out of poverty someday.

loans.use: to renovate her old wooden piggery and purchase piglets to raise for future sale.

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de reposteria,ella prepara tortas y pasteles y luego lo disttribuye a los diferentes lugares como pastelerias,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las tortas y pasteles.La socia solicita el credito para comprar insumos como harina,mantequilla,leche y huevos para preparar las tortas y pasteles.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member still runs a confectionery business, she makes cakes and pastries and then delivers them to various places, such as cake shops. 

The member works from 8am to 6pm. She wants use the business to progress in life, her dream is to have a shop where she can sell the cakes and pastries. 

The member is requesting the loan to buy ingredients like flour, butter, milk and eggs to make the cakes and pastries.

The member is happy because of the loan and is committed to her repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, butter, milk and eggs to make cakes and pastries.

loans.name: Mayra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Mayra es una mujer de 20 años de edad, se considera una persona alegre, responsable y muy trabajadora. Vive con sus padres en Latacunga en la Provincia de Cotopaxi.

Mayra trabaja con sus padres en la crianza y venta de animales como vacas, debido a que necesita ingresos económicos para sus estudios decide realizar un préstamo a Fodemi para poder comprar una vaca lechera que ayudará a entrar en el negocio de producción y venta de leche, que generará buenos ingresos económicos y ayudará a su familia y a cubrir los gastos de sus estudios.

Mayra sueña en ser una distribuidora mayoritaria de animales de granja.
texts.en:
Mayra is a 20 year old woman and describes herself as happy, responsible and very hard working. She lives with her parents in Latacunga in the Cotopaxi province.

Mayra works with her parents raising and selling livestock like cows. She needs financial income to fund her education so she has decided to request a Fodemi loan in order to buy a dairy cow, which will help her to enter into the milk production and sales business, which will generate and good income and help her family to cover the cost of her education.

Mayra dreams of being a wholesale farm animal distributor.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Crisanto Wilfredo

texts.es: El señor Crisanto de 35 años de edad es originario de Estelí, casado, padre de 3 hijos que están a su cargo, el se dedica al negocio de enderezado y pintura desde hace 2 años, su nivel  académico es hasta tercer año de secundaria. Crisanto inicio su actividad con dinero propio el cual obtuvo trabajando en un taller de enderezado y pintura a los 33 años de edad, luego de haber obtenido experiencia y total dominio en el negocio decide independizarse, pone su propio taller  de enderezado y pintura en su casa de habitación,  se siente satisfecho con su negocio pues  en 2 años ha obtenido buenos ingresos, en su actividad paga mano de obra. Solicita el crédito para comprar  un motor para  compresor, el cual será de ayuda pues con la compra del motor podrá   entregar su trabajo en tiempo y forma, sus planes futuros es ampliar el área del negocio  para mayor atracción de los clientes con el objetivo de generar mas ingresos, sus metas próximas es llegar a terminar de construir  su casa y poder comprarse un auto para tener un mejor nivel de vida y poder salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Crisanto, 35, is from Estelí.  He’s the father of three children who are in his care.  He has been working in a car body and paint shop for the last two years.  His academic level is third year of secondary school.

Crisanto started his business at the age of 33 with his own money he earned working at a car body shop. Once he acquired experience and total command of the business he decided to become independent and open his own car body and paint shop at home.  He feels satisfied with his business and has earned good income in two years; he pays labor costs.

He’s asking for the loan to buy a compressor motor that will be of help because with the purchase of the motor he will be able to complete jobs on time.  
His future plan is to expand the business to provide better customer service with the objective of generating more income.  His immediate goal is to finish building his house and to be able to buy a car to have a better standard of living and be able to get ahead with his family.

loans.use: to buy a motor for his compressor.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy materials for making clothing

loans.name: Mangovy Group

texts.es:
El programa Comité de Mujeres Rurales de la Fundación Paraguaya ha formado varios grupos en la ciudad de Curuguaty y el comité Mangovy es uno más situado en la ciudad de Curuguaty, está integrado por 11 mujeres, todas ellas amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad.
Lorenza es la presidenta del grupo, y cuenta que todas ellas con mucho sacrificio y esfuerzo están ayudándose las unas a las otras y de esa forma salen adelante. Ella por su parte tiene una despensa, donde trabaja todos los días desde muy tempranas horas, hasta muy tarde en la noche, es gracias a su negocio que ayuda a su familia y tiene los medios necesarios para cubrir los gastos del día a día.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos necesarios para poder surtir su despensa con carne, bebidas, lácteos, panificados y demás.
texts.en:
Fundación Paraguaya's "Rural Women's Committee" program has formed a number of groups in the city of Curuguaty and 'Mangovy' is one of these groups.  It has eleven [female] members who are all friends and neighbors from this city. 

Lorenza is the president of this group and she says that all of the women are working hard and helping each other.  This is how they are making progress.  Lorenza has a grocery store where she works every day from very early in the morning until very late at night.  Thanks to this business, she is able to help her family and has the money she needs to cover her day-to-day expenses.

Lorenza is requesting this loan to buy the supplies she needs to stock her store (meat, drinks, dairy products, baked goods, etc.)

loans.use: to buy meat, drinks, dairy products, baked goods, etc.

loans.name: Angélica

texts.es:
Angélica tiene 37 años, está casada con William, fruto de ese amor tienen dos hijos: Amir y Johan, a los que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro. 
Ella estudió la carrera universitaria de Trabajo Social y ahora desea sacar el título para poder ejercer. Pero como es una mujer con mucha iniciativa comenzó a trabajar en algunos proyectos sociales gubernamentales. Más su principal ingreso económico se sustenta en la crianza de animales, como cerdos, cuyes y ovejas, a los que cría y alimenta para después venderlos a un mayor precio. Ya la conocen y tiene clientes fijos, de los cuales obtiene ganancias estables. Asimismo, por las tardes comenzó a vender comida a 4 personas, quienes la pagan por la alimentación completa del día. Obtiene buenas ganancias, pues ahorra al utilizar la carne de sus mismos animales para prepara sus comidas.

Este es el crédito número 22 que tiene con MFP, pues viene trabajando con esta microfinanciera hace más de 8 años, y está agradecida de la confianza brindada. Por ello, se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos. 
Angélica invertirá este dinero en la compra de comida balanceada para sus animales.
texts.en:
Angélica is 37 years old and married to William. They have two children, Amir and Johan, who they care for in their own home located in the town of San Pedro.

Angélica earned a college degree in Social Work and now wants to put her education to good use. Being a woman with great initiative, she began working on a few social projects sponsored by the government. However, her main source of income is derived from raising animals, such as pigs, guinea pigs, and sheep. After they have been raised and fed, the animals are sold at a higher price. Angélica is recognized and has established customers, so she is able to generate a stable income. In addition, she sells food in the afternoons to four people who have hired her and pay for the daily meals that she prepares. As a way of increasing her profits, she uses the meat from the animals she raises in preparing these meals.

This is her 22nd loan with MFP and she has worked with this organization for more than eight years. She is grateful for the trust that has been demonstrated to her. Angélica promises to complete her payments, just as she did with her previous loans. She will invest the money in the purchase of balanced feed for her animals.

loans.use: to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Abilfaz

texts.ru: Abilfaz uje 9 let kak rabotayet masterom v domax, on remontiruyet doma. On nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit noviye instrumenti dlya svoyey raboti. Abilfaz 36 let. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Vmeste so svoyey jenoy i detmi oni jivut v Baku regione. Abilfaz lubit svoyu rabotu. Etomu delu on nauchilsya u svoygo otca kotoriy toje bil masterom. Abilfaz ochen nujdayetsyav v uvelicyhenii yego mesachnix doxodov dlya lecheniya glaz yego sina u kotorogo yest problema so zreniyem.
texts.en:
Abilfaz has been working as a handyman for nine years already, and repairing houses.  He needs 2,000 AZN to buy new tools for his job. 

He is 36 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children in the Baku region.

Abilfaz loves his work.  He learned his trade from his father, who also used to be a handyman.

Abilfaz really needs to increase his monthly income in order to be able to afford medical treatment for his son who is suffering from eye problems.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Solar Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres “Solar” paso al séptimo ciclo del programa “Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras”, tiene  17 integrantes todas del Barrio Solar de la Ciudad de Villa Elisa.
Matilde es la presidenta del grupo, y ella nos cuenta que su grupo siempre trabaja junto, y que se ayuda para poder salir adelante y ayudar a sus familias. Matilde tiene como profesión ser modista, ella trabaja en esto hace ya un buen tiempo, y tiene muy buena clientela que siempre le acerca trabajos para hacer.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de telas, hilos, cierres, botones y demás insumos para poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The “Solar” Women's Committee are on their seventh loan cycle within the 'Entrepreneurial Women's Committee' program.  The group's 17 members are all from Solar neighborhood, in the town of Villa Elisa.

Matilde is the group's president and she tells us that her group always works together.  The members help each other to make progress and help their families.  Matilde is a dressmaker by profession and she has very good customers who always bring her work to do.

Matilde is requesting this loan to buy fabrics, threads, fasteners, buttons and other supplies so that she can meet her customer demand.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, fasteners, buttons and other supplies

loans.name: Siempre Unidas 2 Group

texts.es:
Siempre Unidas 2 es el grupo formado por 12 mujeres de la ciudad de Concepción, que se han unido con las ganas de ayudarse las unas a las otras y así también a sus familias. Ellas están emocionadas de formar parte del grupo, pues les ayuda mucho.
Una de las miembros es la señora Teresa, quien es la presidenta del grupo, ella junto a su marido tienen un carnicería, donde la mayoría de sus vecinos se acercan a comprar de ellos. Además de eso el marido de Teresa vende hortalizas que ellos mismos cosechan. Es una familia muy trabajadora y con ganas de salir adelante.
Teresa solicita el préstamo para la compra de cortes de carnes para poder surtir su negocio y de esa forma poder ofrecer un producto de buena calidad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
“Siempre Unidas 2” [Always United 2] is a group composed of 12 women from the city of Concepcion who have united with the urge to help one another and thus, also, their families. They are excited to form part of the group, which will help them a great deal.

On of the members is Teresa who is president of the group. She together with her husband have a butcher shop where the majority of the neighbors come to buy from them. In addition to this, Teresa's husband sells vegetables that they grow themselves. This is a hard-working family with the urge to get ahead.

Teresa is requesting a loan to buy cuts of meat to re-supply her business and in this manner, to offer a good quality product to her customers.

loans.use: buy cuts of meat to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité mujeres Trabajadoras es de la ciudad de Concepción, está integrado por 15 mujeres, con gran entusiasmo y ganas de salir adelante. Son mujeres capaces y luchadoras, que se esfuerzan por un mañana mejor para ellas y sus familias.
Maria vende ropas de todo tipo, y es gracias a este trabajo que ella puede ayudar con los gastos del día a día. Nos cuenta que la vida es muy dura, que pese a ello, no se desanima y siempre trata de salir adelante. Es una persona entusiasta y con grandes aspiraciones.
Maria solicita el crédito para la compra de camperas, jeans, bufandas, camisas, sacos y demás prendas para la venta, ya que se acerca el frío y quiere tener buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
The 15-member Mujeres Trabajadoras Committee is from the town of Concepción. They are an enthusiastic group with a great desire to get ahead in life. They are capable and enterprising and work hard to make a better tomorrow for themselves and their children.

Maria sells all kinds of clothing, and it is thanks to this work that she can help with the day-to-day expenses. Life is difficult for her, but despite this, she doesn’t get discouraged and always tries to make progress. She is an enthusiastic person with great hopes for the future. 

Maria is seeking a loan to . The cold season is approaching and she wants to have a good variety of merchandise to offer her customers.

loans.use: buy jackets, jeans, scarves, shirts, bags and other items

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El comité  “Kuña Katupyry”, es un grupo de la ciudad de Curuguaty. Actualmente se encuentran  en el  primer ciclo, con diez integrantes, quienes trabajan dentro de un marco de respeto y unión, se ayudan las unas a las otras.
Florencia es una de las miembros del grupo, quien se dedica a las ventas. Ella tiene una despensa bien surtida, donde abastece a todas las personas de su barrio. Florencia es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante y seguir creciendo.
Solicita el crédito para seguir creciendo con su negocio y de esa forma poder tener mayores productos, ya que quiere poder surtir su local con bebidas, panificados, verduras, embutidos, enlatados y demás. Florencia y su grupo agradecen por la ayuda que están recibiendo por parte de Kiva y fundación Paraguaya.
texts.en:
The “Kuña Katupyry” communal bank is a group in the city of Curuguaty. They are currently in their first loan cycle, with ten members who help one another, and work within a framework of respect and unity.

Florencia is one of the group members, and she has a retail business. She has a well-stocked grocery store, where she supplies all the people in her neighborhood. Florencia is a woman very eager to succeed and keep growing.

She is requesting the loan in order to continue the growth of her business, and that way be able to carry more products. She wants to supply her shop with drinks, baked goods, vegetables, cold cuts, canned goods and other products. 

Florencia and her group are thankful for the help they are receiving from Kiva and Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: To buy drinks, baked goods, vegetables, cold cuts, canned goods and other products.

loans.name: Corazon De Maria Group

texts.es:
El comité  “Corazón de Maria” se encuentra en el primer ciclo del programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya, ellas trabajan unidas y con gran entusiasmo. Su meta es poder llegar al máximo nivel del programa y de esa forma poder ayudarse ellas mismas y a sus familias.
Elena se dedica a la venta de carne de cerco, comenta que le va muy bien en su negocio, ya que ella misma faena la carne y la vende. Es una persona muy emprendedora, trabajadora y por sobre todo sacrificada, que desea salir adelante y ayudar a su familia.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de carne de cerdo, con lo cual podrá abastecer y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la ayuda que ella y su grupo esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
The Group "Corazón de Maria” is seeking its first loan from the Paraguay Foundation's program for women entrepreneurs.  They work together with great enthusiasm.  There goal is to be able to reach the top level of the program and thus be able to help themselves and their families.

Elena has a business selling pork. She says that things are going well, and that she herself butchers and sells the meat.  She is a very hardworking and enterprising person, and most importantly she is willing to make sacrifices so she can help her family and provide them with a better life.

She is seeking this loan to buy pork, which she will use to stock her inventory and be able to fulfill her customers' orders.  She thanks the Paraguay Foundation and Kiva for the help that she and her group have received.

loans.use: to buy pork.

loans.name: Nurullo

texts.ru: Нурулло молодой мужчина с высшим образованием.Ему 33 лет, женат и имеет троих детей. Официально работает  в гостиничном комплексе.Кроме этого у него есть дополнительные источники дохода, он занимается куплей-продажей автомашин, а также у них семейный аптечный бизнес.В свободное время он помогает родителям в этом бизнесе.Как говорится, работает  везде пока молодой.Второй кредит использует на потребительские нужды.Сейчас в сезон работы хочет начать ремонтные работы в своей квартире и освежить её.Когда Нурулло использовал первый кредит, ему понравилось условия частичного погашения и у него не было затруднений в плане погашения.Теперь он намерен сотрудничать с нами и на каждый кредит планировать улучшить свои бытовые условия.
texts.en: Nurullo is a young man with a higher education.  He is 33 years old, married and has three children.  Officially, he works at a hotel complex.  Besides this work, he has additional sources of income.  He is involved in buying and selling cars and also has a family pharmacy business.  He helps his parents with this business in his free time.  The expression is that he works everywhere while he is young.  Nurullo is using his second loan to consumer needs.  Now, during the work season, he wants to begin repair work in his apartment and refresh it.  When Nurullo used his first loan, he liked the terms of partial repayment and had no difficulty with the repayment plan.  Now, he intends to partner with us and plans to use every loan to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to repair his apartment

loans.name: Felipa Jannett

texts.es: Felipa Jannett de 45 años edad con dos hijos mayores, tiene varios años de trabajar con fundacion leon 2000, la ha desmostrado responsabilidad, solvencia de pago, en esta ococion el fiananciamiento lo esta solicitando para terminar de hacer mejoras en su vivienda,  quiere ponerle el piso a la recamara de su casa, y contruir una pared divisora del patio, del fiananciamiento comprara meteriala de construccion como: ladrillos, zinc, clavos, cemento,arena, alfajillas, entre, alambre, hierro entre otros
texts.en:
Felipa Jannett is 45 years old and has two grown children. She has worked with Fundación León 2000 for several years and has demonstrated responsibility and a reliable payment record.

On this occasion, she is requesting a loan in order to finish making improvements to her home. She wants to install a floor in the bedroom of her house and to build a dividing wall in the patio. The loan will be used to buy construction materials such as bricks, zinc, nails, cement, sand, lumber, wire, iron, and other supplies.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for completing home improvements.

loans.name: Melinda

texts.en:
Melinda is 40 years old and married with four children.

Melinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

Melinda has been in this business for ten years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Melinda aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.ru: Хуршед проживает в городе Вахдат. Он женат. Ему 41 год. Хуршед более 15 лет предоставляет услугу. Он имеет средне - специальное образование. По специальности он шафер. Кроме того он у себя дома разводит крупнорогатый скот. На сегодняшний день Хуршед занимается развозкой пассажиров по маршруту Вахдат - Душанбе. Он берет кредит для ремонта маршрутки и закупа корма для скота.
texts.en: Khurshed lives in the city of Vahdat.  He is 41 years old, married.  Khurshed has been providing a service for over 15 years.  He has a secondary-specialized education.  He is a driver.  Besides this, he breeds cattle at home.  Today, Khurshed in involved in transporting passengers along the Vahdat-Dushanbe route.  He is requesting this loan to repair his taxi and purchase livestock feed.

loans.use: to repair his taxi and purchase livestock feed

loans.name: Valida

texts.ru: Valida derjit skot i prodayet molochnie produkti na bazare. Ey 32 goda, ona odna rastit dvoix detey vozrastov 9 i 15. Krome etogo ona podrabativaet kak uborshica. Ona planiruet uvelichit chislo zhivotnix i rasshirit biznes molochnoy torgovli. Valida nachala stroit sebe dom no na krishu i materialov ne xvatilo deneg i poetomu ona obratilas za summoy 1400 AZN. Ona i ee deti jivut vmeste s ee roditelami.
texts.en:
Valida raises livestock and sells dairy products at the market.  She is 32 years old and raises two children, ages 9 and 15, alone.  Additionally, she also works as a cleaning lady.

Valida is planning to increase her number of farm animals and expand her business of dairy products.

Valida has started to build a house, but she doesn't have enough money to finish the roof.  This is why she has requested a loan of 1,400 AZN.  She lives with her children and her parents.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish building her house.

loans.name: Felicita

texts.es:
