texts.ru: Абдуалим проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 41 год. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его жена домохозяйка. Сам он занимается животноводством. В этой области он три года. Кредит берет для закупа мелко - рогатого скота с целью увеличения поголовья скота.
texts.en: Abdualim lives in Shahrituz. He is 41 years old, married, and has two children. His wife is a housewife. He works in animal husbandry. He has been doing this for three years. He is taking out a loan to buy small livestock (sheep and goats) to expand his flock.

loans.use: buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Ziyaddin

texts.ru: Ziyaddinu 54 goda on jenat i u nego odin rebenok 20i let. U nego svoy vinogradniy sad i krome etogo vot uje 21 let kak vedet biznes po selskomu xozaystvu, prodaet molochnie produkti. Segodna on xochet rasshirit svoy biznes i poetomu obratilsa za kreditom v 1000 AZN dla togo chtobi kupit korovu.
texts.en: Ziyaddin is 54 years old. He is married and has one child who is twenty years old.  He has his own vineyard as well as a farm where he has worked for 21 years selling dairy products.  Now he would like to expand his business, and therefore he is taking out a loan of 1000 AZN to buy a cow.

loans.use: buy a cow.

loans.name: Pedro Luis

texts.es: Pedro utilizó su primer financiamiento en la compra de un bicicoche con el que comercializa el llamado “Raspao”, ralladura de hielo al que le agregan diferentes esencias que le dan un sabor único y refrescante.  Esto fue una inversión muy importante para el ya que dejó de pagar arriendo por el que usaba, obteniendo así una mayor ganancia con sus ventas. Actualmente solicita crédito para la compra de la materia prima con que elabora el producto, como lo son: hielo, leche condensada y esencias además de comprar mercancías que comercializa junto con su esposa como ropa, calzado y variedades.  Su mensaje para los financiadores de kiva es el siguiente: “Estoy muy agradecido por el préstamo recibido porque me permitió fortalecer mi negocio”.
texts.en:
Pedro used his first loan to buy a bicycle cart in order to sell what is called “raspao,” shaved ice to which he adds different extracts that gives a unique and refreshing flavor. This was a very important investment for him as he no longer needed to lease what he utilized, thus obtaining a higher earning on his sales. 

Currently he is asking for a loan in order to buy the raw materials with which to make his product, such as ice, condensed milk and extracts and to buy merchandise to sell with his wife such as clothing, shoes, and miscellany. His message to the Kiva loaners is the following: “I am very grateful for the loan granted for allowing me to strengthen my business.

loans.use: to buy the raw materials to make his product raspao, such as ice, condensed milk and artificial flavors and to buy merchandise such as clothing, shoes, and miscellany

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза жительница города Турсунзаде. Ей 24 года. Она замужем. У нее один ребенок. Шахноза уже три года как занимается животноводством. Кроме того она занимается выращиванием овощей. Кредит берет для закупа мелко - рогатого скота.
texts.en: Shahnoza lives in Tursun-zoda. She is 24 years old. She is married with one child. Shahnoza has been working in animal husbandry for three years. She also grows vegetables. She is taking out a loan to buy sheep and goats.

loans.use: buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Tohirjon

texts.ru: Тохиржон,мужчина 51 лет.Женат,имеет 3 детей.Проффесия-бухгалтер.Более 20 лет занимается откормом и купле продажей скота.Хорошо разбирается в живодноводстве.Он знаток своего дела.В наличае имеет несколько поголовья скота.Кроме этого выращивает сельхоз культуру.В осномном выращивает кукурузу и рис.По бизнесу помагает его супруга.С 2007 года кредитуется в нашей организации.Ни разу не нарушал политику кредитования.Очень добросовестный человек.Он надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Tohirjon is a 51-year-old man. He is married and has three children. He is an accountant by profession. For more than twenty years, he has been buying, fattening, and selling cattle.  He understands animal husbandry very well. He is an expert in his field. He started with livestock, but now he also grows crops. He primarily grows rice and corn. His wife helps with the business. He has been taking out loans from our organization since 2007. He has never had bad credit. He is a very diligent person. He hopes for your support.

loans.use: fatten his livestock for sale

loans.name: Ngu

texts.en:
Mrs. Ngu is 53 years old. She has two children. They are both adults. She is a carpenter for a studio. She earns 4,200,000 VND a month. 

She has participated in the credit program of SEDA since 2009. The last cycle, she borrowed 7,392,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. 

In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 9,184,000 VND to enlarge her own carpentry studio. Then she hopes her business could get enough money for her children’s education fees.

loans.use: to enlarge her own carpentry studio.

loans.name: Ruel

texts.en: Ruel is 36 years old and single. He is in the agricultural business and has been farming flowers in the Philippines for the past six years. Ruel has borrowed 17 times from NWTF in the past. He requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other supplies for his farm. In the future, Ruel would like to save money to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other supplies for his farm.

loans.name: Yenis Mercedes

texts.es: Yenis inició hace 7 años su negocio de peluquería después de terminar sus estudios de Estilista en un instituto de la ciudad de Barranquilla. Con un capital inicial muy pequeño de $200.000.00 COP que le sirvió para comprar sus implementos y equipos básicos, empezó a ofrecer el servicio de corte, peinados, tintes, etc., a los vecinos del barrio, amigos y familiares. Actualmente no solo ofrece este servicio sino también los de internet, video juegos y llamadas a celulares.  Solicita su primer crédito con kiva para la compra de una máquina cortadora de cabello y dos consolas de video juegos play Stations 2.  Sabe que esta inversión será exitosa porque prestará un mejor servicio, podrá aumentar sus ingresos y responder a las peticiones que le han hecho sus vecinos de fortalecer el servicio de video juegos con el que se obtiene una muy buena rentabilidad. Yenis tiene 38 años y vive en el barrio Los Olivos 2 en unión libre con su compañero y sus dos hijos varones de 16 y 20 años. Su principal reto es educar profesionalmente a sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones habitacionales de su vivienda, es por esto que sueña cada día con construir un segundo piso para separar su negocio de la vivienda, así estarían más cómodos tanto sus clientes como su familia.  Para cumplir sus sueños Yenis trabaja arduamente mejorando cada vez y prestando un mejor servicio.
texts.en:
Yenis started her hairdressing business 7 years ago after finishing her hairstylist studies in an institute in the city of Barranquilla. With a very small starting capital of $200,000.00 Colombian Pesos which she used to buy her basic tools she started to offer haircutting, hairdressing and hair-dying services to her neighbours in the area, friends and family. Now she not only offers this service but also the internet, video games and mobile phone calls.

She is asking for her first Kiva loan to buy a hair clipping machine and two video game consoles – play station 2s. She knows that this investment will be successful because she will be able to provide a better service, increase her income and respond to the demands which the people in her neighbourhood have made to improve the video games services and with this she will obtain a very good income. 

Yenis is 38 years old and lives in the suburb Los Olivos 2 with her partner and her to sons of 16 and 20 years old. Her main challenge is to educate her children professionally and improve the living conditions in her house, and for this reason she dreams every day of constructing a second story to separate her business from her house. This way both her customers and her family would be more happy. So that she can achieve her dreams, Yenis works very hard to improve and provide a better service.

loans.use: to buy a hair clipping machine and two video game consoles – play station 2s.

loans.name: Hien

texts.en: Mrs. Hien is 42 years old. She has two children who both have gotten married. She has worked as a carpenter for 11 years, with a monthly income of 4,900,000 VND. Mrs. Hien has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2009. The last loan cycle, she borrowed 8,288,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this cycle, she wants to borrow 9,184,000 VND to enlarge her carpentry studio at home.

loans.use: to enlarge her carpentry studio at home.

loans.name: Rahimboy

texts.ru: Рахимбой трудолюбивый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Все дети совершеннолетние. Двое сыновей с жёнами проживают с ним в одном домохозяйстве, а он занимается животноводством и выращиванием селхозкультур Имеет достаточный опыт по скотоводству и земледелием. В основном он выращивает пшеницу, ячмень, кукурузу и другие сельхозпродукты. Уже более 25 лет он занимается этим бизнесом. Его сыновья уехали на заработки в Российскую Федерацию, а заботливая жена помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Часть полученного урожая он  использует в качестве корма для скота, а остальное продает местным жителям по более низкой цене, чем на базаре, с первых рук. Отходы от пшеницы использует для откорма скота. Он хочет улучшить условия своего домохозяйства. С этой целью он обращается в «ИМОН Интенешнл» за займом для приобретения строительных материалов для постройки нового дома для сыновей.
texts.en: Rahimboy is a hardworking man. He is married and raised four children. All of the children are now adults. Two of his sons and their wives are living with him. He works in animal husbandry and farming and has a great deal of experience. He mainly grows wheat, barley, corn and other agricultural products. For over 25 years he has been in business. His sons went to work in the Russian Federation, and his caring wife helps him with the business. A portion of his crop he uses as feed for livestock, and the rest is sold to local residents at lower-than-market prices. Waste from the wheat is used for fattening cattle. He wants to improve their household. To this end, he approached IMON International for a loan to purchase construction materials to build a new home for his sons.

loans.use: buy building materials.

loans.name: Teofila

texts.en: Teofila is 62 years old and widowed with 8 children. She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock for her store. Teofila has borrowed and paid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 8 years and also earns an income from pig fattening. Teofila aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: purchase additional stock for her general store.

loans.name: Junus

texts.en:
Junus, 57, is a single man and lives with his mother. He operates a pig breeding business in order to support their living costs. All of his siblings are married and live with their family. Junus initiated the business in 2010. He raises piglets up to 5 months then sells them to the market. From the raised piglet selling, Junus is able to generate about IDR 3,500,000, depending on the pig’s weight.

Junus wants to raises more piglets. Therefore, he requested a loan of IDR. 3,000,000 from TLM to purchase 2 piglet to be raised, and food for them. He hopes to have improvement in his business in the future.

loans.use: to buy 2 piglets and food to feed them.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en: Mahmoud is 38 years old, married and has five children. His educational background is primary school. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. he has a house where he wants to complete its needs. He leases his house out to customers. He defines himself as a hard worker who is determined to get ahead through a great spirit of progress. He requested a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB to build a small cistern for his house. He hopes to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to build a small cistern for his business

loans.name: Al-Tayb Group

texts.en: This group is called Al-Tayb. It is made up of four women: Najat, Lamis, Nathal, and Hanan, who are neighbors from Taiz, Yemen. They are hardworking women. They are taking out a loan of 180,000 YER. Najat is the group leader (she is the woman who wears glasses). She is 48 years old and married. She is a very efficient woman, because she likes to work and thus, help her family. She has two children who are all studying. She hopes that all her children will be able to finish their studies. Her business sells incenses and perfumes, and this has been her sole source of income for more than four years. She started her business when her husband's salary was insufficient to cover their family's expenses. She says her business is going very well, her loan has helped her, and she is very satisfied with the support provided. So, she has applied for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB to buy incenses and perfumes, etc. to sell to her customers, thus giving her the opportunity to improve the income from her business. In the future, she would like to expand her business activities.

loans.use: To buy incenses and perfumes, etc. for her business

loans.name: Al-Noor Group

texts.en:
This group, Al-Noor, consists of four members: Anisa, Elham, Sina, and Fatima. They work in their businesses daily to increase their profits and offer a good living for their families. They live in Aden, Yemen. Together, they have applied for a loan of 230,000 YER.

Anisa is the leader of the group (she is the woman on the left with the black handbag). She is 41 years old where she lives with her children in Aden, Yemen. She works hard to provide for her family. In her business, she sells different items, such as foods and household products. She started her business to sell ice cream and vegetables. She has been in this business for eight years. Due to the bad situation in Yemen, she has requested a loan in order to buy stock for her business, such as clothes, soap, and foods. She hopes to expand her business to open a clothing store.

loans.use: to buy stock for her business, such as clothes, soap, and foods.

loans.name: Arzaq Group

texts.en:
This group, Arzaq, consists of four members: Arzaq, Ward, Ashwaq, and Fawziah. They work in their businesses daily to increase their profits and offer a good living for their families. They live in Aden, Yemen. Together they have applied for a loan of 110,000 YER.

Arzaq is a 28-year-old married woman living in Aden, Yemen (she is the second woman from the left in the photo) and a member of this group. She has been selling clothes. This business allows her to meet her family's needs without much difficulty. She obtains her supplies at a market in the city. She has requested a youth loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy more ladies clothes for resale. She hopes to expand her business to generate more profit.

loans.use: to buy more ladies clothes for resale.

loans.name: Qaid

texts.en:
Qaid is 49 years old. He is married and has 12 children who live in Aden, Yemen.

He established his business selling games 22 years ago. He began his business to make himself self-reliant and to care for the needs of his family. 

Now he requires a new loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to buy additional games. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his profits. In the future, Qaid plans to expand his business by opening another shop.

loans.use: to buy additional games for his business.

loans.name: Om-Mahran Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om-Mahran. The group consists of five members: Sana, Nagla, Samra, Wardh, and Sina, who are hardworking and honorable. They applied for a loan of 160,000 YER.

Sana is the leader of the group( she is the first woman where seated from right screen on the photo ) a married woman and has six children who live together in Aden, Yemen. She sells gas cylinders along the street that runs in her area. She launched her business one year. She says that her incomes are put away as savings and are also used to pay for expenses and educate her children. She applied for a loan of 30000 YER from AMB to buy additional gas cylinder for her business. Her goal is to expand her business to sell electrical and building materials.

loans.use: to buy additional gas cylinders for her business.

loans.name: Fathi

texts.en: Fathi is a hard-working, responsible and happy man. He lives with his 3 children in Sana`a, Yemen. He works to earn the income needed to support and educate his three children. This is why for the last 14 years they have been operating an electronics store to repair televisions and radios. He is able to attract many customers because he is a professional in his business. He needs to secure the source of income to support him and his family. It is for this reason he requests a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to allow him to buy electronic equipment for repairing televisions and radios. He hopes to be successful and achieve his dream.

loans.use: to buy electronic equipment to repair televisions and radios

loans.name: Saleh

texts.en:
Saleh is 53, a married man, and lives with his 10 children. Almost all of them are adults. He is still responsible for the family’s financial situation. For this reason he has set up a small grocery shop where he sells basic grains, eggs, sweets, candies, soft drinks and other items. 

Due to the family’s financial difficulties, he has decided to ask for this loan of 200,000 YER from AMB which will allow him to buy merchandise such as drinks, sweets, oil, rice, sugar and other items which will be attractive to his customers. This way he will increase his sales and monthly income so that he can cover his family’s food, housing and educational expenses.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as drinks, sweets, oil, rice, sugar and other items for his business

loans.name: Majd

texts.en: Majd is 32 years old, married, and lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has completed secondary school only. He is a carpenter. He has been operating a carpentry shop for 4 years, which is his principal source of income. He started his business with limited capital. He is an incredibly hard-working man and, as a result, has a lot of experience. Through lots of effort, he has managed to make cupboards and doors, which provides him with the necessary income. He took a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase wood for his business. In the future, he hopes to have carpentry equipment to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase wood for his business

loans.name: Abdulwly

texts.en:
Abdulwly is a 25-year-old man. He is married and has worked reselling cell phones and accessories in a store as well as offering good services by operating an internet cafe. His business opened in 2007.  

He has applied for a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to buy screens for his business.  He wants to expand his store and get married.

loans.use: to buy screens for his business

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en: Ahmed is 35 years old and a married man who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He is supporting a family of seven members. He opened a small grocery store 2 years ago to continue having an income. Now he has applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to add more products like canned food, soft drinks and other items to have variety in the store. He hopes that he can also start selling fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to add more products like canned food, soft drinks and other items to his business

loans.name: Dhafr

texts.en:
Dhafr, thirty, is married and has three children who live in Sana`a, Yemen. He has been operating an electrical store for ten years. He was a worker in a different business until he was able to open his own business. 

His reason for requesting the loan is the lack of working capital. The business challenge he faces is to stay competitive in face of the competition and he requested a loan of 100,000 YER to buy varied merchandise like lamps and other items to meet customer demand.

loans.use: to buy varied merchandise like lamps and other items for his business.

loans.name: Kumria

texts.en:
Kumria, twenty-seven, is single; she lives in Sana`a, Yemen. She has a bookshop. She has also expanded her business to add cosmetics. She’s managed to stay in business thanks to her good administration. She works full-time in her store in order to take care of customers.

She is currently asking for a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to buy books and cosmetics. She will do this in order to have a greater variety of products available for customers so that the business will grow with even more customers. Her plan for the future is to expand the business more and to continue working to provide herself with a better future. Kumria is a client who already received funds from Kiva.

Kumria sends the following message to her Kiva lenders, "Thank you for your help and I hope you will keep supporting us with these types of loans, which are offered with low interest rates."

loans.use: to purchase stationery and beauty supplies.

loans.name: Omer

texts.en: Omer is a twenty-seven-year-old married man and has one child who lives in Ibb, Yemen. For more than a year, he has been an ice cream reseller. It is his main source of income. He is currently applying for a youth loan of 100,000 YER to buy a new fridge which he will use to freeze his ice creams. This loan will increase his working capital and he hopes to renovate his house.

loans.use: to buy a new fridge which he will use to freeze his ice creams.

loans.name: Hani

texts.en:
Hani is a thirty-one-year-old married man. He has three children and lives in Sana`a, Yemen. Hani is a businessman who provides services such as designing and advertising. He has managed to grow his business because he has been featured in magazines. He has also managed to access financial resources easily.

He has requested a loan of 90,000 YER to buy a laptop computer. His goal is to have a company for designing and advertising.

loans.use: to buy a laptop computer for his business.

loans.name: Afnan

texts.en:
Afnan is a 47-year-old, married woman who lives with her 2 children in Sana`a, Yemen. She started a pharmacy business in 2007. Her educational background is diploma of Pharmacology. There is a big need for her type of business and she has many regular customers. 

Afnan is a good-natured woman who says, "I would like to develop the business activity by purchasing the products in large quantities for economic reasons.” The total loan she is requesting is 300,000 YER to buy medicines for her business. She hopes to grow her business in the coming years. Afnan dreams of being able to give her children a good and high quality education through hard work on her business.

loans.use: to buy medicines for her business.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a young man who is 31 years old and lives Taiz, Yemen. He is married and has 2 children. He bought his bus two years ago so that he could start his life and cover his own personal and family expenses. He faced a financial challenge as the income of his bus was not sufficient to cover the cost of maintenance. Then, he took a loan of 120,000 YER from AMB to repair his bus. He hopes to save money in order to replace the current bus by buying a new one.

loans.use: to cover the cost of maintenance for his business.

loans.name: Alkmblyh Group

texts.en:
This  group is called “Alkmblyh” and it consists of four women from Aden, Yemen (Ashjan, Swria, Hamidh and Hala). They have very good experience working together and helping each other out. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER.

One of the members is Hamidh. She is the woman who is standing in the center of the photo. She is a very hardworking person who very much wants to get ahead. She comments that she always strives to the maximum to be able to help her family. She comments that she sells all types of clothes and thanks to this work, she’s been able to get ahead and help her family.

She’s asking for a loan of 50,000 YER to buy clothes and cosmetics to stock up and be able to meet customer demand since she has many pending orders that she’d like to be able to fill.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics for her business

loans.name: Nama Group

texts.en:
This group called Nama consists of four members (Adila, Nama, Mriam and Sonia) who live in Aden, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 320,000 YER.
 
Mriam is a 50-year-old married woman. She is the second woman from the right in the photo. She established her clothing and incense businesses three years ago. She describes her biggest challenge as insufficient funds for improving her business.

She requests a loan of 80,000 YER from AMB to buy more clothing such as jeans, dresses, t-shirts, incense and shoes. The extra income from this loan will allow her to increase her profit. In the future, she plans to expand her business and build a house. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy more clothing such as jeans, dresses, t-shirts, incenses and shoes for her business

loans.name: Johr Group

texts.en: Jophr is a group of four women from Sana'a, Yemen who are close friends.  Najat, Anbh, Bsmh and Hana live in large traditional families with their husbands, children, and other relatives. To expand their businesses, the group members decided to request a loan of 80,000 Yemeni from AMB. Najat is 45 years old and the leader of this group. She is the second woman on the left in the photo. She is a married woman and has six children. They are her reason and motivation to do well in life. She lives in Sana`a where she has a house. She requested a loan of 20,000 YER from AMB to renew her house and to buy cement. In the future, she would like to complete renewing her business to lease to her clients.

loans.use: to buy cement and renew her house

loans.name: Om-Jamal Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om-Jamal and consists of four members who live in Aden, Yemen:  Amirh, Amonda, Fatima and Yasmin. They are hardworking and responsible for offering their families a better life.

Amonda is a member of this group and lives in Aden. She is 30 years old and married. She is the second woman from the right holding a handbag. She has had a house for five years. She has one child. With this loan of 30,000 YER from AMB, she is going to bolster her capital and buy cement to renew her house,
 
In the years to come, she would like to expand the rooms in her house.

loans.use: to buy cement for renewing her house

loans.name: Altawn Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Tawn and consists of four members: Fatima, Khizran, Om alkhyr and Basmh. They are friends who live in Sana'a, Yemen. They took out a loan of 130,000 YER.

Fatima is the leader of the group. She is a widow and has five children who live together in Sana`a, Yemen. She owns a house that she wants to renew with construction supplies. She works hard to provide her family all they need. The main hardship that she faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan of 40,000 YER from AMB to buy cement to renew her house.

loans.use: to buy cement to renew her house

loans.name: Al-Waad Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-waad and consists of four members.  Lamia, Mriam, Mona and Salma are ladies who are working in different businesses. They live in Aden, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 170,000 YER.
 
Lamia is 23 years old. She is single and lives in Aden, Yemen. She is a beautician who is a professional in this field. She is able to attract many customers and she launched her business five years ago. She dropped out of school due to lack of financial support and so began doing beautician work to support herself. Currently, she applied for a youth loan of 60,000 YER from AMB to buy cosmetics for her business. She hopes to open a beauty salon in her area in order to increase her revenue.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics  for her business

loans.name: Al-Akhwh Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Akhwh and consists of three females (Ekhlas, Lwla and Suad) and one male (Mohammed). They applied for a loan of 140,000 YER.

Ekhlas is 30 years old and married. She is the second woman from the left in the photo. She sells clothing, shoes, and incense and is applying for a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy pants, shirts, sweaters, shoes, incense etc. She started the business two years ago with help from her family. The business is important to her because it generates extra income. Her hopes for the future are that her child continues to thrive and that her business continues to grow.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, sweaters, shoes, incense etc for her business

loans.name: Om-Wadiah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om-Wadiah and consists of three members, Shada, Ghazh, and Ansaf, who live in Aden, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 150,000 YER. 

Shatha is 22 years old. (She is the woman who is standing in the centre.) She lives in Aden, Yemen. She has been selling phones in order to get more profit. Her business is the main source of her income. She applied for a youth a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to buy additional phones and recharge phone cards for her business.

loans.use: to buy additional phones and recharge phone cards for her business.

loans.name: Ghaza Group

texts.en:
This group is called Ghaza and consists of four members, Malkh, Asrar, Amal, and Khadigh. They applied for a loan of 120,000 YER.

Khadigh is the leader of the group. (She is the first woman on the right in the photo.) She is married and the mother of nine children. The oldest is 22 and the youngest is 2 years old. She has a house. 

She would like to renew her house so she applied for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy cement to renew her house.

loans.use: to buy cement for her house.

loans.name: Anwar

texts.en:
Anwar is a 31-year-old man who lives with his only child in Sana`a, Yemen. He has been operating a clothing store. He started his business by working in a grocery store. 

He applied for a loan of 150,000 YER from AMB to buy dresses, shirts, and pants for his business. He would like to increase his profit to offer his family a better life.

loans.use: to buy dresses, shirts, and pants for his business.

loans.name: Gina Marcela

texts.es: Gina invirtió su crédito anterior en la compra de mercancía de hogar para la venta tales como: productos plásticos, electrodomésticos menores, fantasía, piñatería.  Con esto pudo surtir su negocio e incrementar las ventas.  En estos momentos solicita un nuevo crédito con el fin de comprar en su mayoría electrodomésticos menores como abanicos y estufas. Su microempresa ha tenido muy buena acogida y tiene un gran número de clientes que le solicitan estos productos.  Está muy agradecida con Kiva y desea mandar un mensaje a sus financiadores así: “Les agradezco su apoyo y espero me continúen ayudando ya que me sirvió mucho el préstamo recibido”.
texts.en:
Gina invested her last loan in the purchase of home merchandise to resell such as: plastic products, small electrical appliances, novelty items and  party products. With this she was able to supply her shop and increase sales.

She is now asking for a new loan to buy small electrical appliances wholesale such as fans and heaters. Her small business has had a good welcome and she has a large number of customers who ask for these products. She is very grateful to Kiva and wants to send a message to her financers that “ I thank you for your support and hope that you continue helping me since the loan I received has assisted me very much.”

loans.use: to buy small electrical appliances wholesale such as fans and heaters for resale.

loans.name: Jean Népomscene

texts.en: Jean Nepomscene is 36 years old. He is married to a business woman, who helps him with the foodstuffs business they have been running for thirteen years. He wants this loan to buy more foodstuffs such as beans, sorghum and rice to sell. With the profits, he will provide food for the family and grow their savings.

loans.use: to buy more beans, sorghum and rice to sell.

loans.name: Erick

texts.en:
Erick is a married man with three children, aged from 5 to 21 years old. He describes himself as an industrious man. He operates a retail stall where he sells items such as biscuits, sweets, water, sodas and juices. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. His stall is located near a bus station and his primary customers are passengers and the general public. He describes his biggest business challenge as the high prices of commodities. 

Erick will use the 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) loan to buy sodas and cakes for his stall. His business goal is to run a wholesale shop within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be able to pay for his children's education to higher levels.

loans.use: to buy cakes and sodas to sell

loans.name: Arame

texts.fr: Arame est une femme mariée.Elle est mère de deux enfants.Depuis deux ans, elle exerce un commerce de produits cosmétiques.Cette activité lui rapporte des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir à certains de ses besoins et de participer aux dépenses d'alimentation de la famille.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 300000f pour acheter des produits cosmétiques.
texts.en: Arame is a married woman. She is the mother of two children. For two years, she has been running a cosmetics business. This business brings her an income that allows her to meet some of her needs and to contribute to the family's food expenses. In order to strengthen her business, Arame is seeking a loan of 300,000 francs to purchase cosmetics.

loans.use: To purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Bayarmagnai

texts.en:
Bayarmagnai, 42, runs a freight transportation business in urban and rural areas. He has been living with his wife and his daughter in a rental house for many years. His wife assists him and runs their business together. 

Since last year he has been building his family house by brick. The building is in the middle stage and the basement, walls and roof are built completely. Now he needs some money to buy the building materials to fix the inside and add wall insulation materials. 

Although Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world, it is one of the most polluted countries in the world. This is due to the long and cold winters where temperatures frequently go below -40C (-40F) even in the cities.  Also, in summer, many parts of the country are extremely cold and are known to have snowstorms.  Both homes and nomadic tents burn a lot of fuel and emit huge amounts of pollution every night from families just trying to stay warm. In response to this, Credit Mongol offers Green Loans to their clients to make home improvements that reduce heat loss and improve heating systems. We believe that together we can decrease pollution and the harmful effects it has on the environment and Mongolians' health. The loan he is taking will be dedicated to buying the building materials to fix the inside of the house and add wall insulation.

loans.use: To buy building materials to fix the inside of the house and add wall insulation.

loans.name: Charito

texts.en:
Charito is 52 years old and married with four children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Charito runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 29,500 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to purchase additional stock to sell in her store. She has been in this business for 20 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, sugar, milk, bread, candies and eggs. 

In the future, Charito would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell in her store

loans.name: Conception

texts.en:
Conception is 57 years old and married with 5 children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Conception is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Conception has been raising pigs for 5 years and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: To purchase additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Amistad Group

texts.es:
Amistad, el nombre del grupo lo dice mucho de ellas. Son vecinas y amigas del municipio de Monterrey. Esta integrado por siete mujeres perseverantes.
Ana Silvia, es una de ellas. Ella es esposa y madre de dos hijos. Buscando mejorar el ingreso familiar y con ello mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos, ideo la manera de hacerlo desde el hogar. Fue entonces que decidió aprender de la industria de los productos de limpieza de línea económica para ofrecer a sus vecinos.
Ahora, ella solicita un crédito para aumentar sus inventarios y formulas para ofrecer mayor variedad de productos.
Ana Silvia esta convencida que seguirá creciendo y consolidando si negocio
texts.en:
Amistad is the name of the group, which says a lot about them. They are neighbours and friends from the municipality of Monterrey. The group is made up of seven persevering women. 

Ana Silvia is one of them. She is a wife and the mother of two children. Hoping to increase her family's income and with that to improve her children’s quality of life, she found a way of doing so from her own home. It was then that she decided to learn about the cleaning products industry, to sell budget-line products to the people of her neighbourhood. 

She is now asking for a loan to increase her inventory and stock of cleaning products to be able to offer a bigger variety of products. Ana Silvia is sure that she will continue growing and consolidating her business.

loans.use: to buy cleaning product merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To vary her wares according to the season.

loans.name: Ibrahima

texts.fr: Ibrahima est un homme marié, père de trois enfants.Il exerce dans l'agriculture et l'élevage notamment l'embouche bovine.En effet, il achète des bœufs qu'il engraisse et revend une fois arrivés à maturité.Ces deux activités lui assurent des revenus qui lui permettent d'entretenir sa famille.Actuellement, il sollicite un pret de 200000f pour acheter un bœuf et de l'aliment bétail.Son ambition est de construire un bon enclos afin d'élever un nombre plus important de bêtes.
texts.en: Ibrahima is a married man and the father of three children. He works in agriculture and livestock farming, notably the fattening of cattle. In fact, he purchases steers, which he fattens and resells once they've matured. These two businesses provide him with the income to allow him to support his family. He is currently seeking a loan of 200,000 francs to purchase a steer and livestock feed. His ambition is to build a good enclosure in order to raise a larger number of beasts.

loans.use: To purchase a steer and livestock feed.

loans.name: Musu

texts.en:
Greetings from Sierra Leone! This is 43-year-old Musu from Moriba town in the southern area of Bo, Sierra Leone. She is widowed with 2 children age 12 and 20 years old. Her children attend school. She has run her business since her husband died; she decided to operate this business to generate enough income to support her children.

Musu has been running a clothing business for 5 years. She sells baby clothes, baby oil, baby pins, shirts, and brassieres. She works 11 hours a day, 7 days per week. Her business is the only source of income she has. Her customer base has grown and her products sell every day. With that, her business is doing well.

Musu has requested a loan in order to buy more similar products such as baby clothes, baby oil, baby pins, shirts, and brassieres. The extra income from this loan will allow her to improve the standard of living of her family. 

In the future, she wants to improve her business from being on a table to being in a shop. She thanks you for your support!

loans.use: To buy products such as baby clothes, baby oil, baby pins, and shirts.

loans.name: Assa

texts.ru: Асса проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 39 лет. Он женат. Его жена занимается растениеводством. Сам Асса уже десять лет как занимается торговлей. Он арендует торговую точку на рынке, где продает муку. Кредит берет для покупки нескольких мешков муки первого и второго сорта.
texts.en: Assa lives in the Shahrituz region.  He is 39 years old and married.  His wife works in plant cultivation.  Assa himself has been in sales for 10 years now.  He rents a stall at the market where he sells flour.  He is taking out a loan to purchase several bags of fine and coarse flour.

loans.use: to purchase several bags of fine and coarse flour.

loans.name: Nazokat

texts.ru: Назокат замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 20 лет она занимается выращиванием картофеля и пшеницы, кроме того она параллельно занимается скотоводством. Отходы от выращивания сельхозкультур идут на корм крупного и мелкого рогатого скота, и ей выгодно содержать скот, так как расходы на корм у неё сокращаются. На протяжении всего времени по расширению бизнеса помогает ей её заботливый муж. Назокат хотела бы получить займ для покупки скота  для расширения бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту
texts.en: Nazokat is married and is raising two children. For more then twenty years she has been growing potatoes and wheat and also raising cattle for meat. She uses leftover greens from her farm to make feed for her animals, which is a good way to reduce feed costs. Nazokat's caring husband has always helped with the farm. Together they want to purchase more animals for their herd and expand their business. Nazokat is hoping for your help and kindess.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand her business

loans.name: Ibra

texts.fr: Ibra est un paysan qui cultive de l'arachide et du mil en saison des pluies.Un partie de la production est destinée à la consommation alors que l'autre partie est vendue sur les marchés locaux.Ce qui lui rapporte des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.A l'approche de l'hivernage, il sollicite un pret de 200 000f pour acheter des semences destinées à son exploitation agricole.
texts.en: Ibra is a small farmer who grows groundnuts and millet during the rainy season. A portion of the harvest is intended for consumption, while the remainder is sold in the local markets, which brings him the income that allows him to meet the needs of his family. With the approach of the rainy season, Ibra is seeking a loan of 200,000 francs in order to purchase seeds intended for his farm.

loans.use: To purchase seeds intended for his farm.

loans.name: Sadriddin

texts.ru: Садриддин трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Десять лет назад Садриддин начал свою деятельность в сфере земледелия. Садриддин заботливый семьянин и на воспитании имеет одного ребёнка. Его жена занимается домохозяйством. В основном он занимается выращивает сельхозпродукции, помимо того он занимается и скотоводством. Имеет несколько голов мелкого рогатого скота, каждый день он выгуливает скот на холмах. Его бизнес приносит ему хороший доход и он хочет расширить его и стать успешным фермером. Садриддин хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота  с целью увлечения поголовья скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость
texts.en: Sadriddin is a hardworking and kind man. He started farming ten years ago. Sadriddin is a family man and is raising one child.  His wife is a home maker. Sadriddin specializes in growing staple crops, and also raises some livestock for meat sales. He owns a herd of sheep which he turns out to pasture in the hills every day. His farm yields a good profit and he wants to expand it further and become a successful farmer. Sadriddin wants to take out a loan to purchase more animals for his herd. He hopes for your help and generosity.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Rabiya

texts.ru:
Рабие 54 года, имеет 4 детей. Рабия работает техничкой (уборщицей) с отделении энергокомпании в селе Кызыл-Суу и в качестве дополнительного заработка с  1996 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Рабии  -  на сегодняшний  день  ее хозяйство насчитывает 1 корову с теленком, 2 козы, 1 бычка, 1 лошадь и 1,80 га земли , где она сажает ячмень. Ежемесячная прибыль с продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет около 6,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рабия обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Рабия планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение своего хозяйства.
texts.en: Rabiya is 54 years old and has four children. She works as a cleaning lady in the office of the energy company in Kyzyl-Suu village. To supplement her small salary Rabiya has also been raising cattle at home since 1996. She started her herd with 10,000 som (KGS) and with hard work has expanded it to include a milk cow with calf, two goats, one stier, one horse and 1.8 hectars of land where she grows oats. The monthly profits from milk and dairy sales are 6,000 som (KGS). In order to expand her business further Rabiya has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) which she will use to purchase calves. Rabiya will use the profits to continue developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Akbarali

texts.ru: Акбарали занимается купле- продажей скота. У него 30-летний богатый опыт в этом бизнесе. За счет прибыли он арендует землю и занимается посевом сельхозкультур. Хорошо знает специфику своего бизнеса. Акбарали является хорошим добрым семьянином и воспитывает четверых детей. В бизнесе помогают жена и дети. Акбарали хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия, чтобы создать комфорт в своем доме. С этой целью он запрашивает займ для покупки стройматериалов для достройки жилого дома.
texts.en:
Akbarali is in the cattle sales business.  He has a 30-year wealth of experience in this business.  He rents land with his profit and grows field crops.  He knows his business down to the last detail.  Akbarali is a good and decent family man raising four children.  His wife and children help him with his business.

Akbarali wants to improve their living conditions and create a comfortable home.  With this goal, he is requesting a loan for the purchase of building materials to complete the building of his home.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: Cheryll

texts.en:
As a married parent of six children, Cheryll works hard to support her family. She has a food vending business in the Philippines and also earns additional income from raising livestock. Cheryll has applied to borrow 19,500 Philippines pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food vending business.

Cheryll has sustained her business activities through her past 19 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Rabiya

texts.ru:
Рабие 53 года, вдова, проживает с сыном. Рабия с 1994 года занимается животноводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний  день в хозяйстве Рабии имеется 4  головы крупного рогатого скота, выручка в продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Рабия обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Рабия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Rabiya is 53 years old, widowed and has one son. She has been raising cattle as a primary source of income since 1994, when she purchased her first animals with 10,000 som (KGS). Currently Rabiya has four cows and makes 12,000 som (KGS) monthly from dairy sales. In order to expand the herd, Rabiya has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 130,000 som (KGS) which she will use to buy calves. She will invest the profits from this expansion into her livestock business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica is 46 years old, married to Joseph and blessed with four children aged 16, 14, 12 and 10 years respectively. She runs a cafeteria, a business she started eight years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 5,000. 

She has requested a second loan of KES 10,000 to pay school fees for her child who is in secondary school. Her dream is to see her children get to higher institutions of learning.

loans.use: To pay school fees for her child.

loans.name: Abdurasul

texts.ru:
Пятнадцать лет тому назад трудолюбивый человек под именем Абдурасул начал свою деятельность в сфере сельского хозяйства. Он начал свой бизнес с надеждой получения прибыли для содержания семьи и обучения своих детей. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота, приобретает скот с местных рынков, откармливая, реализует за хорошие деньги. В бизнесе занимается один. Кроме того он работает бригадиром в колхозе местного района. Имеет хорошие условия для содержания и откорма скота. А также он занимается переработкой абрикоса. Имеет 1,5 гектара арендованного сада с абрикосовыми деревьями. В течении сезона он перерабатывает 1200-1800 кг абрикоса.  А также 1,8 гектаров земли для посева. 
 Абдурасул женат, жена тоже работает в колхозе. Имеет двух детей: сына и дочь. Сын работает в Российской Федерации. Ежемесячно отправляет деньги для улучшения уровня жизни. Дочь помогает отцу в бизнесе в переработке и выращивании сельхозпродуктов. Кроме этого он занимается выращиванием кукурузы, пшеницы, моркови и гороха. Абдурасул несколько лет кредитуется в «ИМОН Интернешнл» и имеет хорошую репутацию и отличную кредитную историю. За счет полученной прибыли от своего бизнеса он отремонтировал свой дом и построил дом. Наблюдается постепенное улучшение уровня жизни. Он сказал, что все эти улучшения, благодаря полученным денежным средствам от «Имон Интернешнл» и за счет прибыли от бизнеса и денежных переводов с Российской Федерации от сына. Абдурасул хотел бы получить займ для приобретения крупного рогатого скота для откорма и реализации.
texts.en:
Fifteen years ago a hard working man named Abdurasul started to farm. He began his farm with hopes of supporting his family and educating his children.  Abdurasul focuses on fattening and reselling cattle for meat, which he purchases at the local markets. He works by himself and his aimals have good barns and pastures. Abdurasul also works as a manager at the local farming co-op. He also processes apricots for drying from a 1.5 hectare orchard with apricot trees which he rents. In one season the orchard yield 1200-1800 kg of apricots. Abdurasul also has 1.8 hectares of land for farming. There he grows corn, wheat, carrots and peas. Abdurasul is married and his wife also works for the farming co-op. He also has two children - a son and a daughter. His son is away in Russia for work and sends back money monthly to support his parents. Abdurasul's daughter helps her father to grow and process produce. 

Abdurasul has been receiving loans from "Imon International" for a few years and has an excellent credit history. Using the profits from his business he has been able to make repairs to his house and built another house for his family. There is a steady improvement in the family's living conditions. Abdurasul mentioned that this is due to the improvements to the farm financed by loans from "Imon International" as well as the money his son sends from Russia. Abdurasul wants to take another loan for purchasing cattle for fattening and re-sale.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Zebiniso

texts.ru: Зебинисо добрая и трудолюбивая женщина. Она замужем, её семья очень дружная, воспитывает двоих детей. Муж работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Более 10 лет она занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Она начала свой бизнес с надеждой получения прибыли для  содержания семьи и обучения своих детей. В основном она выращивает сельхозкультуры, как картофель и пшеница. Кроме того она занимается купле- продажей крупного и мелкого рогатого скота. Зебинисо хотела бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли с целью получения хорошего урожая. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Zebiniso is a kind and hard working woman. She is married and has a great family and two wonderful children. He husband works in the farming co-op. Zebiniso herself has been farming for ten years. She started her business in hopes of being able to support her family and pay for her children's education. She primarily grows staple crops like potatoes and wheat. Zebiniso also raises and resells cattle, sheep and goats. She wants to take out this loan to purchase fertilizer for her soil to assure a big crop this fall. Zebiniso hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Gulrukhsor

texts.ru: Гулрухсор замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей: одного сына и одну дочку. На иждивении имеет родителей. Гулрухсор дома занимается с семьёй производством и продажей национальных лепешек. Она работает 28 дней в месяц. Выпекает лепешки и продает на рынке по цене 1 сомони за одну штуку. В бизнесе помогает муж и его брат. Гулрухсор запрашивает займ для покупки муки и уголья для выпечки лепешек. Она и её муж надеются на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Gulrukhsor is married and has two children: a son and a daughter. They live with their parents. Gulrukhsor and her family bake Tajik national flat bread from home. She works 28 days a month. She bakes the flat bread and sells it on the market for one somoni a piece. Gulrukhsor's husband and brother help her in the bakery. Gulrukhsor is requesting a loan to purchase a batch of flour and coal for the bakery. She and her husband hope for you help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy flour and coal

loans.name: Khudoikul

texts.ru: Худойкул из тех людей про которых говорят «Золотые руки». Он является мастером по переработке древесины  для разных целей,  в том числе производит национальные  колыбели.  Несмотря  на то,  что работа достаточна  изматывающая и требует большого терпения оптимизма  Худойкулу не занимать. Его ремесло приносить ему моральное удовлетворение. Каждый раз создавая новую колыбель он обязательно  принимает во внимания его качество, долголетие,  красоту  дизайна и конечно его удобство в применении. Так как его фантазиям нету границ он хотел бы получить займ чтобы воплотить свои задумки в жизнь. Эти средство пойдут на создания новых шедевров из древесины так необходимые в быту и по уходу за ребёнком.
texts.en: Khudoikul is one of those people who is described as having "golden hands."  He makes different items out of wood, including traditional cradles.  Despite the fact that the job is tiring and requires a lot of patience, Khudoikul has a lot of optimism.  His trade provides him with moral satisfaction.  Every time he builds a new cradle he takes into account the quality, longevity, and beauty of the design and of course its ease of use.  Since his fantasy knows no bounds he would like to take out a loan in order to translate his ideas into reality.  These resources will go toward creating new wood masterpieces that are so necessary for the home and for childcare.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials

loans.name: Arzikan

texts.ru:
Арзикан 52 года, имеет 6 детей и проживает с сыном и 2 внуками. Арзикан в поисках источника дохода 20 лет назад начала свой бизнес в полеводстве и животноводстве.  Благодаря упорному  труду Арзикан на сегодняшний  день в ее хозяйстве имеется 3  головы крупного и 14 мелкого рогатого скота,  выручка в продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 8,000 сом (KGS). Также Арзикан обрабатывает 2,1 га земли, где она выращивает рис, хлопок и кукурузу. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Арзикан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка и покрытие затрат на полевые работы.  Доходы от кредита Арзикан планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Arzikan is 52 years old and a mother of six children. She lives with her son and two grandsons. Arzikan has been farming as a primary source of income for twenty years. Due to her hard work Arzikan now owns three cows and 14 sheep and makes 8,000 som (KGS) monthly from dairy sales. She also farms a 2.1 hectares plot of land where she grows rice, cotton and corn. In order to expand her business Arzikan turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase young cattle and pay for tillage of her fields. She is planning to invest the profits from this expansion to back into her farm.

loans.use: to purchase livestock and pay for tillage

loans.name: Otajon

texts.ru: Отачон добрый человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Более 20 лет он занимается купле- продажей бензина и солярки. Имеет собственную автозаправку в местном городе. Привозит товар из города Худжанда и Каратог Республики Киргизии. Имеет собственную автомашину, также имеет три колонки и оборудование для заправки автомашин. В бизнесе помогает ему его сын. Отачон хотел бы получить займ для покупки топлива.
texts.en: Otajon is a kind man, he is married and is raising four children. He has been selling gas and diesel for twenty years and owns a gas station in the city. Otajon brings fuel from Khujand and from Karatog in Kyrgyzstan. He has his own fuel truck and three gas pumps for filling cars with gas. Otajon's son helps with this business. Otajon wants to take out this loan to purchase more fuel.

loans.use: to buy fuel for his gas station

loans.name: Saidikhon

texts.ru: Сайдахон с 2007 года занимается переработкой абрикоса. Она замужем и они имеют троих сыновей. В бизнесе помогают муж и дети. Ежегодно покупает несколько гектаров сада абрикосовых деревьев. Во время сезона она с семьёй ездит на поле и занимается переработкой абрикоса, а затем  вывозит на рынок. Также она получает денежные переводы из Российской Федерации от двух своих сыновей, которые уехали на заработки.  Её муж дома занимается откормом и выращиванием скота. Сайдахон хотела бы получить займ для покупки сада абрикосовых деревьев с целью переработки абрикоса и с целью дальнейшей реализации.
texts.en: Saidikhon has been growing and drying apricots since 2007. She is married and has three sons. Her children and husband help Saidikhon in her business. Every year she buys several hectares of apricot orchard and during the fruit season her and her family drive to the orchard and pick, de-pit and dry the apricots for Saidikhon to sell at the market. The family also receives monthly money transfers from their two other sons who left to Russia for work. Saidikhon's husband raises and fattens cattle for meat sales. Saidikhon would like to take out this loan to purchase an apricot orchard so that she can pick and process fruit from it for resale.

loans.use: to purchase on apricot tree orchard

loans.name: Shomurod

texts.ru: Шомурод проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 60 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Его жена работает в дехканском хозяйстве. Сам Шомурод занимается выращиванием овощей. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Shomurod lives in Shahrituz. He is 60 years old, married and has four children. His wife works in the farming co-op. Shomurod grows vegetables for sale. He had this farm for two years. Shomurod is taking out this loan to purchase fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
Hugo tiene 29 años, su pareja es Irayda, con quien tiene un hijo de 6 años. Ellos viven en su casa propia, la que acaban de construir en la localidad de Huasahuasi.
Él se dedica a la agricultura, con la producción de papas, arvejas y habas, pero lo que mejores resultados le trae es la venta de arvejas, por su poca inversión y rápida cosecha. Ahora tiene papas de distintas variedades sembradas y cosechará en los meses de agosto hasta diciembre. Menciona que en estos meses las ventas son favorables para todos los agricultores, por eso no duda en invertir en sus cuidados y abono. Hugo está seguro que poco a poco incrementará su producción. Confía en su esfuerzo.    

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, por lo que promete que pagará con puntualidad las cuotas y agradece el apoyo. Se siente contento de formar parte del banco comunal “Capital semillera”, por el trabajo solidario que se realiza.
Con este dinero podrá comprar semillas de papa de la variedad “Única” y bolsas de fertilizante, con los que abonará dichas papas.
texts.en:
Hugo is 29 years old. His partner is Irayda and they have a six-year-old son. They live in their own home, which they completed construction in the town of Huasahuasi.

Hugo is a farmer who produces potatoes, peas, and beans. The crop that brings in the best results is his sale of peas because it requires a small investment and yields a quick harvest. Now he has planted different varieties of potatoes and will harvest them between the months of August and December. Hugo notes that these months bring the most favorable sales to all farmers, so he is not hesitant to invest in compost and the care of his crops. He is confident that he can gradually increase his production and is trusting in his own abilities.

This is his third loan with MFP. He is grateful for the support and promises to submit his loan payments on time. Hugo is pleased to be part of his Communal Bank "Capital Semillera" (Seed Capital) because of the work they do together. The money will be used to buy potato seedlings of the "Única" variety and bags of fertilizer that he can apply on his crops.

loans.use: to buy potato seedlings and bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Abdulatif

texts.ru: Абдулатиф добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Жена домохозяйка и воспитывает детей. Более 9 лет он занимается торговлей. Торгует на рынке и продает продукты питания. Его брат помогает ему в ведении бизнеса. Приобретает товар с рынка «Фаровон». В его торговой точке находятся разные виды продуктов питания. Абдулатиф хотел бы получить займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью пополнения оборотного капитала.
texts.en: Abdulatif is a kind and hard working man. He is married and is raising three children. His wife is a home maker and raises their kids. For nine years Abdulatif has been working in retail. He sells groceries at the local market. His wife helps him in this business. Abdulatif buys groceries at the "Farovon" market and sells them at his market stall. He wants to take out this loan to purchase groceries and have more cash on hand.

loans.use: To buy food for his store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Nasibjon

texts.ru: Насибчон трудолюбивый и старательный человек, он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. После окончания школы в 2000 году Насибчон работал простым продавцом, затем постепенно перешел на продажу муки в 2009 году. Имеет торговую точку и также распределяет по магазинам муку. В бизнесе помогает брат. Постепенно набирая опыт, он стал успешным бизнесменом. Он работает каждый день без выходных, чтобы продвинуть свой бизнес вперед. Насибчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки автомашины марки «ЛАБО» для развозки товара по точкам
texts.en: Nasibjon is a hard working and dedicated man, he is married and is raising two children. After finishing high school in 2000 Nasibjon first worked as a salesman and then moved up to sell flour wholesale in 2009. He has his own market stall and also delivers flour to grocery stores. His brother helps him with the business. By slowly becoming more experienced Nasibjon has now become a successful businessman. He works every day without weekends so that he can move his business forward. Nasibjon wants to take out this loan to purchase a car of the "LABO" make to be able to deliver flour to the grocery stores and market stalls.

loans.use: To buy a car for developing his business

loans.name: Umir

texts.ru: Умир житель района Кубодиян. Ему 54 года. Он женат. У него шестеро детей. Его дети находятся на заработках за рубежом. Он сам занимается животноводством. В основном он разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Этим видом деятельности занимается четыре года. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и теленка.
texts.en: Umir is a resident of Qubadiyon region. He is 54, married and has six children. His children are working outside the country to earn money for the family. Umir himself has been raising cattle at home for four years. He is taking out this loan to purchase bulls and a calf.

loans.use: to purchase bulls and calf

loans.name: Mukhtar

texts.ru: Mukhtar zanimaetsa selskim xozaystvom. Segodna u nego odna korova i odin telenok. Klienti sami xodat k nemu za sirom, molokom i prochimi molochnimi produktami. Mukhtar xochet kupit 2 korovi s telenkom dla togo chtobi uvelichit doxodi s biznesa. On jenat i u nego 7 mesachniy rebenok. Mukhtar ochen pozitivniy chelovek, on ochen lubit svoyu semyu i xochet sozdat zdorovie usloviya dla nix.
texts.en: Mukhtar is a farmer. Currently he has one cow with calf and his clients come to his house to purchase cheese, milk and other dairy products. Mukhtar wants to buy two more cows with calves to improve his dairy business profits. Mukhtar is married and has a 7 month old baby. He is a very positive man, loves his family and wants to create the best living conditions for them.

loans.use: to buy two cows with calves

loans.name: Juana Francisca

texts.es: Juana Francisca es docente de Educacion secundaria, es una persona muy conocida en su comunidad, todos sus hijos todos son preparodos junto con su esposo. Cuenta con otros ingresos debido a que su esposo trabaja fuera del pais. Actualmete pidio un financiamiento que se le otorgo con Fondo Kiva y gracias a eso pudo construir un pozo artesal ya que en esta ciudad hay pobremas de escases de agua. Espera que se le continue apoyando para ir poco a poco mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juana Francisca is a high school teacher who is well-known in her community. All of her children have been educated, as well as her husband. She has other income sent to her since her husband works outside of the country.

Juana Francisca is currently requesting a Kiva loan so that she can use the funds to build an artesian well since the city is facing water shortage problems. She hopes that the support will continue so that she can gradually improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to build a well.

loans.name: Makhmasharif

texts.ru: Махмадшариф трудолюбивый и добрый человек, на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 8 лет он занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания и кондитерских изделий. Кондитерские изделия  приобретает по оптовым ценам в кондитерском цеху  «Ширинихои шарки». В бизнесе помогает его любящий сын. Махмадшариф хотел бы получить займ для покупки продуктов питания с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Makhmasharif is a hard working and kind man and a father of five children. His wife is a home maker. Makhmasharif has been selling groceries and sweets from his own store for more then eight years. He purchases the sweets at whole sale prices from the candy factory "Shirinihoi sharki" and his son helps him with the store. Makhmasharif wants to take out a loan to purchase a batch of groceries and sweets wholesale to expand his inventory. He hopes for your help and kindess.

loans.use: to purchase groceries for resale

loans.name: Husen

texts.ru: Хусен более 15 лет занимается купле- продажей скота, является опытным фермером. Закупает скот 4 раза в месяц, затем откармливает их и продает на другом рынке города. Хусен очень старается развивать свой бизнес и улучшить свое благосостояние семьи. Хусен запрашивает займ для приобретения скота с целью увлечения поголовья скота. Хусен надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Husen has been reselling cattle for more then fifteen years and he is also an experienced farmer. He purchases animals four times a month then fattens them and sells them at a different market. Husen really wants to expand his business and improve his family's life. He is requesting a loan to purchase more cattle for his herd. Husen hopes for your help and kindess.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to expand his business

loans.name: Jamoliddin

texts.ru: Чамолиддин трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 20 лет он занимается сушкой и продажей абрикосов. Имеет 108 шт. плодовых деревьев абрикоса. Чамолиддин также имеет землю и выращивает сельхозпродукты на продажу и для семейных нужд. Данный момент он хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли. Он планирует посеять семена для корма скота. Чамолиддин надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Jamoliddin is a hard working and kind man. He is married and is raising three children. For more then twenty years he has been drying and selling apricots and currently has 108 apricot trees in his orchard. Jamoliddin also owns land where he grows staple crops and produce for the needs of his own family. Currently Jamoliddin wants to take out a loan to purchase fertilizer to prepare soil for planting. He wants to plant fodder plants for his animals. Jamoliddin hopes for your help and kindess.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлюда трудолюбивая и добрая женщина, она замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей, одну дочь и одного сына. Она занимается купле- продажей скота. Благодаря своему труду, она смогла поднять детей и продвинуть свой бизнес. Муж помогает в ведении  бизнеса в продаже скота на рынке. Он  работает усердно с раннего утра до позднего вечера. Она аккуратно содержит коровник, также скот. Благодаря данному бизнесу она начала строить дом. В бизнесе помогают ей её прекрасные заботливые дети. Мавлюда хотела бы получить займ для покупки одного крупного рогатого скота и одного теленка, так как в настоящее время на полях много корма для скота. Мавлюда надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие
texts.en: Mavluda is a hard working and kind woman, she is married and has two children - a son and a daughter. Mavluda raises animals for resale at the meat market for a living. Because of her hard work she has been able to raise both of her children and expand her business. Her husband helps with the animals and sells them at the market. He works hard from early morning till late night. Mavluda makes sure that both her barn and her cows are clean and well taken care of. Her wonderful and caring children also help with the business. The cattle business is so profitable that the family has been able to build a new house for themselves. Mavluda wants to take out this loan to purchase another cow and calf for her herd as the fields have an abundance of fresh grass for the animals at the moment. Mavluda hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Silvia tiene 45 años, su pareja es Carlos, con quien tiene dos hijos de 16 y 12 años. Viven en su casa propia en el  distrito de La Unión.
Su actividad principal, desde hace 25 años, es la agricultura, siembra en sus propios terrenos arvejas, habas, espinacas, zanahorias y otros productos. Comenta que la clave de las buenas ventas que realiza está en programar bien sus sembríos; por ejemplo, ahora empezará con la siembra de arvejas, porque en octubre sus precios son mejores. “Ahora pienso sembrar arvejas y habas, porque ya estoy cosechando espinacas y lechugas, con ese capital invertiré en abono”, menciona. Ahora piensa aumentar su producción, ya sea comprando otro terrenos o arrendándolos. Se siente contenta con su trabajo porque es lo que le gusta hacer.

Este sería el tercer préstamo que Silvia recibe de MFP. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Los ángeles de la unión 2”, un grupo de mujeres responsables y solidarias.
Con el dinero de este préstamo comprará una bolsa se semilla de arvejas, cuyo precio es de 550 soles.
texts.en:
Silvia is 45 years old. She and her partner Carlos have two children, ages 16 and 12. They live in their own home in the District of La Unión.

For the past 25 years, farming has been her main activity. Silvia grows peas, beans, spinach, carrots, and other products on her own land. She says that the key to generating good sales is scheduling her crop cycles well. For example, she is planting peas now because the prices will be better in October. "I am planting peas and beans now because when I am ready to harvest spinach and lettuce, I can use the profits to invest in compost," remarks Silvia. Now she plans to increase her production and has already acquired additional land through purchase or lease. She is pleased with her work because she enjoys what she does.

This will be her third loan with MFP. Silvia is a member of the Communal Bank "Los Ángeles de la Unión 2”, a group of responsible and supportive women. The money from this loan will be used to buy a bag of pea seeds that costs 550 PEN.

loans.use: to buy pea seeds.

loans.name: Madina

texts.ru: Мадина замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих  детей,  дети несовершеннолетние. Не- смотря на трудности агробизнеса  каждый год она занимается и выращиванием сельхозкультур. Имеет опыт в сфере скотоводства и земледелия. В основном она выращивает пшеницу, картофель и другие сельхозпродукты.  Из-за нехватки денежных ресурсов и низкого уровня жизни она хочет получить займ для покупки скота и минеральных удобрений для развития своего бизнеса. Часть полученного урожая она  использует для домашних нужд, а отходы использует в качестве корма для скота, а остальное продает местным жителям по более низкой цене, чем на базаре. От полученных доходов от бизнеса она хочет благоустроить свой дом. С этой целью она обращается в «ИМОН Интернешнл».
texts.en: Madina is married and a mother of two young children. Despite the difficult life of farmers in the current economy Madina still grows crops for sale. She has a lot of experience in both farming and animal husbandry. Madina mainly grows wheat, potatoes and other staple crops. She uses a portion of her harvest for the needs of her own family and also prepares fodder for the livestock from crop leftovers. The rest of her harvest Madina sells to the local people at below market prices. Due to insufficient personal funds and bad living conditions Madina wants to take out a loan to purchase cattle and fertilizer for her farm. She plans to use the profits from this expansion to perform repairs on her house. With this goal in mind Madina has turned to "IMON International" for a loan.

loans.use: to buy cattle and fertilizers in order to expand her business

loans.name: Erdenechimeg

texts.en:
Erdenechimeg is 30 years old and drives a taxi around Erdenet, the third largest city in Mongolia. She has been running her business since last year and earns only a modest income. 

Erdenechimeg lives with her husband and her two children in their recently-built house on a small plot of land. Her new house is built of cement bricks and loses a lot of heat, so she has decided to insulate the walls with red bricks, which are a very good insulation material. She hopes that her house will be warm after the repairs. 

Although Mongolia has the lowest population density in the world, it is one of the most polluted countries in the world. This is due to the long and cold winters where temperatures frequently go below -40 C (-40 F), even in the cities.  Also, in summer, many parts of the country are still extremely cold and are known to have snow storms. Both homes and nomadic tents burn a lot of fuel and emit huge amounts of pollution every night from families just trying to stay warm. In response to this, Credit Mongol offers Green Loans to their clients to make home improvements that reduce heat loss and improve heating systems. We believe that together we can decrease pollution and the harmful effects it has on the environment and Mongolians' health. The loan Erdenechimeg is taking will be dedicated to buying building materials to insulate her house.

loans.use: to buy building materials to insulate her house

loans.name: Mercy Silvana

texts.es:
Mercy nació 1975. En la actualidad vive con su esposo e hijo en el sector de la Villaflora en el sur de Quito, la capital del Ecuador. La ciudad de Quito está situada en la cordillera de los Andes a 2.800 metros sobre el nivel del mar, haciéndola la 3era capital más alta del mundo. En 1978, Quito fue nombrado Primer Patrimonio Cultural de la Humanidad por la UNESCO por un paisaje que combina naturaleza e infraestructura de una manera única en su categoría. Quito se divide en tres partes: el Centro Histórico; donde se preserva el Quito colonial, el Norte; donde tradicionalmente se sitúan las clases socioeconómicas altas, y el Sur; conocido como “el lado pobre” de la ciudad. 
Mercy  se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y víveres  al por mayor entre los cuales los principales productos son: arroz, azúcar, aceite, panela, aguardiente;  trabajando de 7 a 8 horas al día. Su esposo trabaja varias horas al día de chofer, pero el ingreso no es suficiente, por lo tanto el negocio de Mercy es importante para la pareja y su hijo de 16 años. Para que su familia tenga una vida más digna, ella solicita un préstamo a Kiva. Con el dinero extra ella podrá tener ayuda para comprar y transportar el aguardiente y la panela (endulzante a base de caña pero sin refinar) e incrementar las ventas del negocio. Con más ingresos, Mercy sueña con mejorar su calidad de vida y construirse su casa propia.
texts.en:
Mercy was born in 1975. She currently lives with her husband and son in the sector of Villaflora, which is south of the Ecuadorian capital of Quito. The city of Quito is situated in the Andean mountain range at 2,800 meters above sea level, making it the third highest world capital. In 1978, Quito was named the first World Heritage Site by UNESCO for its landscape that combines nature and infrastructure in a unique way that it becomes classified in a category of its own. Quito is divided into three parts: the Historical Center where colonial Quito is preserved; the North where the higher socioeconomic classes traditionally live; and the South which is known as the "poor side" of the city.

Mercy sells groceries and provisions in bulk. Among the main products she offers are rice, sugar, oil, unrefined cane sugar, and brandy. She works seven to eight hours each day. Her husband works different hours of the day as a driver, but his income is not sufficient. For this reason, Mercy's business is important to her husband and their 16-year-old son. In order for her family to have a more decent life, she is requesting a Kiva loan. The extra money will be used to buy and transport brandy and unrefined cane sugar so that she can increase the sales of her business. With more income, Mercy dreams of improving her quality of life and building a house of her own.

loans.use: to buy unrefined cane sugar and brandy in bulk and to pay for transportation costs.

loans.name: Geswendebala De Sect15 Group

texts.fr:
