Mme GISELE est la responsable du groupe GESWENDBALA  SECT 15. Elle est mariée et mère de 05 enfants. Le plus âgé a 19ans et le moins âgé a 10 mois. 03 vont à l’école et elle a 05 personnes  en charge.

Mme vend des pagnes depuis 06ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de secteur 10 en ville. Ses clients sont  un peu partout en ville.

Elle veut s’acheter 15 pagnes.

Mme voulais ouvrir un compte d’épargne pour ses bénéfices mais son enfant était malade et elle n’a pas pu, elle espère le faire cette fois ci. Elle a pu rouvrir son atelier  qui depuis était fermer ou elle vend en même tant ses pagnes, elle ambitionne acheter ses pagne pour renforcer son atelier.
texts.en:
Gisèle is in charge of the Geswendebala Sect 15 group and is married with five children. The eldest of the children is 19 years old and the youngest 10 months. Three go to school and Gisèle has five dependents.

She has been selling "pagnes" (pieces of decorative fabric) for the past six years. She gets her supplies in the Sector 10 market in town. Her customers come from all over the town. She would like to buy 15 "pagnes".

Gisèle would like to open a savings account for her profits but she has a child who is ill and has not been able to yet; she hopes to be able to do it this time. She has been able to reopen her workshop which had been closed and where she sells her fabric. Her ambition is to buy more "pagnes" to strengthen her workshop.

loans.use: to buy 15 "pagnes".

loans.name: Tabita

texts.en:
Tabita is a 46-year-old woman. She lives with her husband and her three children Armi, 23 years old; Jhois, 18 years old; Ronald, 16 years old. Tabita also has an adopted son – Fredrik, 7 years. 

Tabita has been running a duck business since 2008 to add to her husband's income. She also started a kiosk business in 2011 to generate more income. Tabita would like to improve her businesses by adding more stock at her kiosk and also purchasing duck food. Some of her business capital was recently spent on her children's expenses. Therefore, she requested a loan of IDR 4,000,000 from TLM. She expects to be successful in her businesses.

loans.use: to add more kiosk stock and to purchase duck food.

loans.name: Daniela

texts.en: Daniela is a married woman with 2 adult children. She and her husband are both farmers. They till land in Trinidad, Bohol and grow rice crops to sell. Daniela does her best to keep their crops healthy. She has requested a loan to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs. Daniela hopes that their loan will help them achieve an abundant harvest.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and other farm inputs

loans.name: Tidiane

texts.fr: Tidiane est un homme marié.Il est père de trois enfants dont les deux fréquentent l'école primaire.Il pratique l'agriculture sous pluie en hivernage.Il fait également du maraichage en saison sèche sur des  parcelles oû il a creusé un puits.Cette diversité lui permet de générer durant toute l'année des revenus qui lui permettent de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et à ses propres besoins.A un mois de l'hivernage, il sollicite un pret de 200 000f pour acheter des semences.
texts.en: Tidiane is a married man who is father to three children, two of whom go to primary school. He has a farming activity during the rainy winter season and during the dry season he carries out a market gardening activity on pieces of land where he has dug a well. This diversity enables him to generate income throughout the year which in turn allows him to provide for his family's needs as well as his own. With one month to go to the winter season, he is requesting a loan of 200,000 francs to buy seeds.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Son

texts.en: Mrs Son is 60 years old. She has three children and they all have their own families. Mrs Son has had a paint shop business for three years and she makes 4,000,000 VND each month. She has participated in SEDA's crediting program since 2008. During her last loan cycle, she borrowed 8,288,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this loan cycle, she wants to borrow 8,288,000 VND to support her business by expanding the variety of paints offered.

loans.use: to expand the variety of paints to enlarge her business

loans.name: Alwad Group

texts.en: This group is called Alwad, and it consists of four members who are all women: Tagwa, Samar, Nama and Fakhriah. They are from Sana`a, Yemen, and they know each other very well as they have lived in the same neighborhood for a long time. The members took a loan of 105,000 YER. Fakhriah is one of the group's members. She is 20 years old and married with one child. (In the photo, she stands in the center, holding the red wallet.) She has been selling cosmetics. She tells us it is going well. She is requesting a youth loan of 40,000 YER from AMB to buy additional cosmetics so that she can meet the demands of her customers. Her goal is to be able to keep working and supporting her family.

loans.use: to buy additional cosmetics

loans.name: Ammar

texts.en:
Ammar is a 22-year-old single man. He lives in the Sana'a, Yemen. He has been selling fresh fruits and vegetables. He currently works in his own business which is the main source of his income. This is the third time he’s asking for a youth loan of 150,000 YER from AMB. He has had his business for five years.

The loan will be used to stock his store better by buying fruits and vegetables like oranges, apples, lemons, potatoes and onions. His business will allow him to obtain better daily profits since his sales will be higher which will make it possible for him to maintain better conditions for his family’s well-being.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables like oranges, apples, lemons, potatoes and onions for his business

loans.name: Wendtoin Group

texts.fr:
Mme  PASCALINE  est la représentante du groupe  WENDTOIN. Elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants. Le plus  âgé a 25 ans et  le moins âgé a 06 ans. 02 vont à l’école .Elle a 06 personnes en charge.

Mme vend du poisson et du pain depuis 12 ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché de dassasgo en ville. Ses clients sont partout surtout les élèves.

Elle veut s’acheter  05 sachets de poisson. 

Mme veut renforcer son activité  de vente de poisson avec ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne  s’acheter une moto  pour le transport de ses marchandises.
texts.en:
Pascaline is the representative of the Wendtoin group and she is married with six children. The eldest of the children is 25 years old and the youngest six. Two of them go to school and Pascaline has six dependents.

She has been selling fish and bread for the past 12 years. She gets her supplies at the Dassasgo market in town. She has all sorts of customers, above all students. She wants to buy five sacks of fish and would like to boost her fish selling business with her profits. Her ambition is to buy a motorbike to transport her goods.

loans.use: to buy five packs of fish.

loans.name: Ambika Group

texts.fr: La cliente  Chirezi est une femme efficace,  âgée de 40ans et membre du groupe de crédit ambika. Elle est  mariée à un enseignant d’une école primaire et mère de 6 enfants tous scolarisés.  Elle avait débuté  son activité  en 2009 avec un capital de 300$ financé par son mari et en 2010 elle a adhéré au groupe de crédit de Hekima et dispose à ce jour un capital propre de 2000$. Le crédit sollicité va  lui permettre  de  faire l’approvisionnement  de  10sacs des fretins. Elle remercie Hekima  pour  son crédit et prie Dieu de le bénir d’avantage.
texts.en: The customer, Cirezi, is an efficient woman, who is 40 years old and a member of the Ambika loan group. She is married to a primary school teacher and is mother to six children who are all at school. She began her business in 2009 with a capital of USD300 funded by her husband, and in 2010 she joined the Hekima loan group; today she has own capital of USD2000. The loan she has requested will enable her to get fresh supplies: ten bags of small fried fish. She thanks Hekima for her loan and prays to God to bless it even more.

loans.use: to buy ten bags of small fried fish.

location.country: The Democratic Republic of the Congo

loans.name: Umeda

texts.ru: Умеда трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Она сама воспитывает двоих детей без мужа, живет у родителей. Отец недавно умер, мать пенсионерка. Умеда прошла тренинги по «Start-up» и хочет начать свой бизнес. Она женщина трудолюбивая, и детей хочет обучать труду. Ранее она ездила в Россию на заработки, дети остались с её матерью. Потом вернулась и хотела начать своё дело на Родине. Для этого она хотела бы заняться переработкой сухофруктов. С этой целью она запрашивает займ для закупа сухофруктов, чтобы обрабатывать и продавать на рынке региона. Она и её дети надеются на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Umeda is a hardworking and kind woman. She is a single mother raising two children and lives with her parents. Her father passed away recently, and her mother is a pensioner. Umeda completed an entrepreneurship training and would like to start a business. She is a hardworking woman and would like to teach her children a trade. Earlier, Umeda worked abroad in Russia, leaving her children with her mother. She then returned home and wanted to build a business in her homeland. She would like to go into business processing dried fruits. Umeda has asked for a loan to purchase dried fruits for processing so she can sell them in the regional market. She and her children are counting on your help and your charity.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits

loans.name: Abdulwhab

texts.en:
Abdulwhab, 29, is a single man who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He opened his grocery store to increase his income. He started his business with a small amount of capital. Little by little as it grew, he started to stock it with more grocery goods. He tells us that he has competition now but because he’s well located his sales have not dropped. He applied for a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. 
He will use the loan to buy groceries, rice, sugar, canned food, and soft drinks. His future goal is to build stores which he will be able to rent and increase his income, allowing him to get married.

loans.use: to buy groceries, rice, sugar, canned food, and soft drinks for his business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bags of compost and potato seedlings.

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es:
Alfonso tiene 42 años, su pareja es Lucy, la madre de sus cinco hijos, pero solo viven con dos de ellos, los de 15 y 4 años. Su casa es alquilada y se ubica en la zona rural de Vista Hermosa.
Él se ha dedicado a la agricultura desde que era niño, ya que lo hacía con sus padres. Siembra habas, arveja, maíz, papas, lechugas, coliflor y otras verduras, en parcelas que arrienda, ya sea con dinero o a cambio de sus productos. Así también, hace 4 años que decidió incursionar en la compra y venta de verduras, las que adquiere de sus vecinos o en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad. Con la ayuda de Lucy lleva su mercadería hacia otra ciudad ubicada a una hora y media de viaje. “Vender en La Oroya es bien rentable porque en esa ciudad no se produce nada, por ser un centro minero”, menciona. Alfonso espera una estabilidad económica que le permita mantener sin problemas a sus hijos menores.

Este es el préstamo número 5 que adquiere con MFP, por eso se compromete en ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas como en ocasiones anteriores.
Con este dinero podrá adquirir la mercadería necesaria (verduras de todo tipo) para negociarlas en la ciudad de La Oroya.
texts.en:
Alfonso is 42 years old. His partner is Lucy, the mother of their five children, but they only live with two of them (ages 15 and 4). The house they rent is located in the rural district of Vista Hermosa.

Alfonso has been farming since he was a boy and performed this type of work with his parents. He grow beans, peas, corn, potatoes, lettuce, cauliflower, and other vegetables on parcels of land that he leases by paying money or bartering for his products. Four years ago, he also decided to start buying and selling vegetables that he acquires from his neighbors or at the wholesale market in the city. With the help of Lucy, he takes his merchandise to another city located an hour and a half away. "Selling in La Oroya is profitable because nothing is produced there since it is a mining town," says Alfonso. He hopes to have financial stability so that he can support his young children without any problems.

This is the fifth loan that he has acquired from MFP. He promises to complete his payments on time, just as he did on previous occasions. Alfonso will use the money to acquire merchandise that he needs (vegetables of all types) so that he can sell in the city of La Oroya.

loans.use: to buy more vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Fanny Manuela

texts.es: Fanny labora como docente en el colegio Cesár Augusto Salinas Pinell desde hace 12 años desenpeñandose con gran responsabilidad y honestidad, su esposo como director de servicios municipales y le apoya con los gastos del hogar y con sus deberes crediticios. Solicita su 4to credito con el que va a pagar mano de obra de la construcción de una habitación en su vivienda, pues desea brindar a su hija mejores condiciones, ademasdueña con que esta crezcan en un ambiente agradable y que su familia permanezca bien unida y no le falte lo basico en el hogar.
texts.en: Fanny has been working as a teacher in the Cesár Augusto Salinas Pinell school for 12 years, displaying great responsibility and honesty in her work. Her husband works as a director of municipal services and he helps her with the household expenses and her loan repayments. She is requesting her fourth loan which she will use to pay for construction workers to build a bedroom in her home, as she wants to give her daughter better living conditions. Her dream is for her daughter to grow up in a pleasant environment, for her family to remain close and for them to always be able to cover their basic needs.

loans.use: to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Israel Antonio

texts.es: El sr. Israel de 37 años de edad, vive en union libre con la mamá de sus hijo, la cual se dedica a la elaboracion de tortillas, tiene 2 hijos que dependen economicamente de el. Trabaja como Operario de Limpieza para la Alcladia de Juigalpa. Solicita el credito para invertirlos en culminar paredes de un anexo, entechado y embaldosado de piso, el ya tenia comprado el zinc.
texts.en: Israel is 37 years old, and lives with the mother of his children who works making tortillas. He has 2 children who are financially dependent on him. He works as a cleaner for the City of Juigalpa. He is requesting this loan to invest in finishing the walls of an annex, roofed and with tiled floors. He has already bought the zinc.

loans.use: to finish building a bedroom.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.es: La sra. Ernestina de 58 años de edad es soltera, no tiene hijos que dependa de ella, trabaja como conserje en la Normal Regional desde hace muchos años. Solicita el credito para invertilos en hecer reparaciones en su casa como es compra de zinc y madera para reforzar algunas partes de su casa que se encuentran en mal estado.
texts.en: Ernestina is 58 years old and single.  She does not have any dependent children.  She has been working as a caretaker at an educational institution for many years.  She is requesting this loan to invest in repairing her home.  She will buy metal sheets and wood in order to strengthen some parts of her house which are in a bad state of repair.

loans.use: to fix her roof

loans.name: Karina Stefania

texts.es:
KARINA STEFANIA tiene 20 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en San José de Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

Karina Stefania tiene una tienda de viveres. Solicita el crédito para comprar aceite, un quintal de arroz, un quintal de azúcar, jabón, fideo. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar el negocio.

Las compras lo hará en Guaranda.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es poder mejortar el estilo de vida. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer caminata por el campo.
texts.en:
Karina Stefania is 20 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  She lives with her parents in San José de Chimbo, Bolívar province.

Karina Stefania has a grocery store.  She is requesting this loan to buy oil, a 100lb sack of rice, a 100lb sack of sugar, soap and noodles.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to increase her business.  She will make her purchases in Guaranda.

The challenge that Karina Stefania faces is improving her lifestyle.  In her free time, she enjoys going for walks in the country.

loans.use: to buy oil, a 100lb sack of rice, a 100lb sack of sugar, soap and noodles

loans.name: Rosa Natividad

texts.es:
ROSA NATIVIDAD tiene 56 años de edad es viuda tiene tres hijos de 23, 18 y 15 años de edad ella vive con los hijos en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

ROSA NATIVIDAD se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz suave, Solicita el crédito para comprar una cocina, un cilindro de gas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo que tanta falta le hace para poder cocinar rápido los alimentos. 

La compra lo hará en la ciudad de Guaranda.

El sueño es contar con salud para mantenerce en pie y poder trabajar. En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarce a elaborar comida típica.
texts.en: Rosa Natividad is 56 years old. She is a widow and has three children who are 23, 18 and 15 years old. She lives with her children in Chimbo, Bolívar province. Rosa Natividad is a farmer who grows 'soft maize' (Zea mays amylacea) . She is requesting this loan to buy a stove and a gas cylinder. With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy what she really needs to be able to cook her food quickly. She will make her purchase in Guaranda. Rosa Natividad's dream is to enjoy good health so that she can keep going and keep working. In her free time, she enjoys preparing traditional food.

loans.use: to buy a stove and a gas cylinder

loans.name: Marioly

texts.es: La Sra. Marioly tiene 30 años tiene dos hijos que son de las edades de  12 y 10 años, ella se dedica a la venta de sándwiches en su kiosco que se encuentra ubicado en una avenida  céntrica de la ciudad de Cochabamba,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Marioly  va a utilizar  este préstamo  para el  mantenimiento de su kiosco y compra de insumos para la  venta de comida rápida,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital, la Sra. Marioly  enfrenta retos en su negocio que son falta de capital, ella va a utilizar los beneficios mejora de kiosco.
texts.en: Marioly is 30 years old and has two children who are 12 and 10.  Her business is selling sandwiches from her kiosk which is located on a central avenue in the city of Cochabamba.  This loan is her first with the institution.  Marioly will use this loan for the maintenance of her kiosk.  She will also buy supplies for her fast food sales business.  Her reason for requesting the loan is to increase her capital.  The challenge Marioly faces in her business is a lack of capital.  She will use her profits to improve her kiosk.

loans.use: to maintain her kiosk

loans.name: Gladys Argentina

texts.es:
GLADYS ARGENTINA tiene 61 años de edad es casada tiene un hijo, vive con el esposo y con la hija de 18 años de edad en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

GLADYS ARGENTINA es auxiliar de contabilidad en un despacho jurídico. Solicita el crédito para comprar una cocina, microondas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá minimizar el tiempo de preparación de alimentos.

La compra lo hará en Chimbo. El seuño es poder tener lo necesario para poder vivir mejor. En el tiempo libre le gusta pasear con la familia.
texts.en:
GLADYS ARGENTINA is 61 years old, married, and has one child.  She lives with her husband and 18-year-old daughter in Chimbo, Bolívar province.

Gladys Argentina is an accounting assistant in a law office.  She is requesting this loan to buy a stove and microwave.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to minimize the time it takes to prepare her food.  She will make her purchase in Chimbo.

Gladys Argentina's dream is to be able to have what she needs to live better.  In her free time, she enjoys going for walks with her family.

loans.use: to buy a stove and a microwave

loans.name: Tres Marias Group

texts.es:
La socia Lisbeth alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz,azucar,leche,golosinas entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia ,la socia a la vez es estudiante universitaria ella estudia la carrera de agronomia ya le falta poco para egresar de la carrera siendo de esta manera que la socia sale adelante.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como gaseosas.

Los demas socios se dedican a la venta de productos de belleza,venta de fruta,venta de comida,tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Lisbeth splits her time between her daily activities and her business running a grocery store.  She sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk, candies, etc.  She has been in this business for a long time and it is doing well thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day.  At the same time, Lisbeth is a college student.  She is studying for a degree in agronomy and she doesn't have long left before she finishes.  This is how she makes progress in life.  

Lisbeth is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as soda.

The other members of this group sell beauty products, sell fruit, sell food and run a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as soda

loans.name: El Gran Poder Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “EL GRAN PODER”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Josefa, ella es casada y tiene 45 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja con su negocio de venta de ropa,ella tiene una tienda donde vende ropa como pantalones,casacas,blusas y abrigos,la socia trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia quiere salir adelante,el sueño de la socia es ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como blusas,casacas,abrigos y pantalones al por mayor.

 Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de venta de artesania, negocio de venta de productos de belleza, negocio de venta de ropa.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These borrowers belong to the 'El Gran Poder' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

This member is Josefa.  She is 45 years old, married, and has two children.  She runs a clothing business.  She has a store where she sells clothing such as pants, jackets, blouses and coats.  She works from 9.00am to 8.00pm and, through this this business, she would like to make progress in life.  Josefa's dream is to expand and improve her clothing business.  She is requesting a loan to buy clothing such as blouses, jackets, coats and pants, wholesale.

The other members of this group sell handicrafts, beauty products and clothing.

Josefa is grateful to those who will take part in her dream in this way and pledges to make her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as blouses, jackets, coats and pants, wholesale

loans.name: David

texts.es:
El socio David nació en el valle de Kosñipata pero actualmente vive en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco. 

El socio David se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y tiene varios galpones donde viven sus animales. En esta oportunidad David requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes.  

El socio David agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
David was born in Kosñipata valley but currently lives in the beautiful city of Cusco.

David's business is raising animals such as guinea pigs.  He has several sheds where his animals live.  On this occasion, he needs a loan to buy guinea pigs.

David is grateful for his loan and pledges to make his repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs

loans.name: Carlos Jose

texts.es: Carlos Jose de 38 años de edad, casado, con tres hijos menores de edad de la localidad de leon, tiene por actividad economica el servicio de jardineria, actividad que tiene hace tres años, surgio por la necesidad de tener un herramienta de trabajo para solventar los gastos de sus familia, el esta solicitando el financiamiento para invertir en herramientas de trabajo como: rastrillos, pala, podadora, fertilizantes, tijeras, entre otros.
texts.en: Carlos Jose is 38 years old, married, and has three dependent children.  He lives in the town of Leon and his business is providing gardening services.  He has been in this business for three years, having started it because he needed a job in order to cover his family's expenses.  He is requesting a loan to invest in work tools such as rakes, shovels, a lawnmower, fertilizers, shears, etc.

loans.use: to buy rakes, shovels, a lawnmower, fertilizers, shears, etc.

loans.name: Cristhian Enrique

texts.es:
CRISTHIAN ENRIQUE tiene 31 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 7 y tres años de edad en Chimbo Provincia de bolívar.

CRISTHIAN ENRIQUE trabaja en una panaderia. Solicita el crédito para comprar un computador, impresora. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar un computador. La compra lo hará en Guaranda. 

El sueño es poder mejorar el nivel de vida conjuntamente con la familia.

En el tiempo libre le gusta siempre estar junto a los hijos.
texts.en:
CRISTHIAN ENRIQUE is 31 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife and children, who are 7 and 3 years old, in Chimbo, Bolívar province.

Cristhian Enrique works in a bakery.  He is requesting this loan to buy a computer and printer.  He will make his purchase in Guaranda.

Cristhian Enrique's dream is to be able to improve his standard of living together with his family.

In his free time, he enjoys being together with his children.

loans.use: to buy a computer and a printer

loans.name: Rocio Del Amanecer Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “ROCIO DEL AMANECER” inicia su tercer ciclo en el Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes donde la señora Sonia es la presidenta.  Las actividades que desarrollan dentro del grupo son distintos, entre ellos tenemos: agricultura, venta de comida, comercio de mineral, venta de verduras. 
La señora Sonia cuenta que es la primera vez que integra una Banca Comunal dentro de Pro Mujer y que para esto fue invitada por su madre; en la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de agricultura, mismo que trabaja hace varios años aprendiendo el mismo de su familia.
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de semillas) los que comprarán de los productores por mayor y posteriormente a la siembra y cosecha lo venderá en las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto. Esta forma de trabajo apoya a salir adelante a su familia pues ella es soltera.
Cuando le consultamos que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella nos respondió que le gustan las capacitaciones en salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The “ROCIO DEL AMANECER” community bank are starting their third loan cycle as part of the Villa Exaltación regional office.  The group has eight members and Sonia is the group's president.  The business activities that the women are engaged in are varied and include: farming, selling food, mineral sales and selling vegetables.

Sonia tells us that this is the first time she has belonged to a Pro Mujer community bank.  She was invited by her mother.  Sonia's business is farming.  She has been in this business for some years, having learned it from her family.

The loan that Sonia is taking out will be used to increase her capital.  She will buy seeds from wholesale producers, sow them, harvest them, and then sell her crops in the street markets in the city of El Alto.  This work helps her to support her family.  Sonia is single.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Sonia replied that she likes the training sessions on the topics of health and finances.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Erika Sarah

texts.es: La Sra. Erika tiene 39 años y es casada con 2 hijos que son de las edades de 15 y 6 años, la Sr. Erika se dedica a la venta de celulares en su puesto de venta que se encuentra zona de sagrado,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra. Erika  va a utilizar  este préstamo  para la compra de mercadería celulares por mayor para surtir su negocio,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incrementar su capital  de trabajo, la Sra. Erika enfrenta retos en su negocio que son tener una buena venta y  va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando mercadería para seguir mejorando su negocio y así de esta manera seguir generando más ingresos y por ende  mejorar su calidad de vida, la Sra. Erika se siente feliz y agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en: Erika is 39 years old, married, and has two children who are 15 and 6 years old.  Her business is selling cellphones from her sales location which is in Sagrado district.  This loan is her first from the institution.  Erika will use her loan to buy cellphones wholesale to stock her business.  Her reason for requesting this loan is to increase her working capital.  The challenge Erika faces in her business is ensuring good sales.  She will use her profits to continue buying merchandise so that she can continue improving her business.  This will enable her to continue making more income and she will be therefore be able to improve her quality of life.  Erika feels happy and grateful for the opportunity that she is being given.

loans.use: to buy cellphones wholesale

loans.name: Shokry

texts.en:
Shokry is 30 years old, a married man, and he has one son. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He has a taxi which he uses to work daily to increase his household income. He attracts a lot of customers. For this reason, and the great customer service he provides, the business does well. Currently, he faces a challenge to his profits due to increasing fuel prices and maintenance of his taxi. 

He requested a youth loan of 100,000 YER from AMB. With this loan he will repair his taxi. His dream is to increase his profit from his taxi to offer a good life to his family.

loans.use: to repair his taxi.

loans.name: Al-Fardos Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Fardos and is comprised of 5 women: Hawh, Hajh, Aisha, Muna and Jwhra. The president of the group is Muna. She is 26 years old, married, and has 2 children (she is the tallest woman located in the center of the photo). She works selling vegetables and fruits. She lives in Mokala, Yemen. This loan will be her first from AMB. She will use the loan to buy onions, tomatoes, apples, oranges, etc. for her business, and in this way will increase her working capital and improve her business. 

Her reason for requesting this youth loan is a lack of capital. She faces challenges in her business, including increasing her client base, and she will use the profits to improve the quality of life for her family. She hopes to expand her business to a retail shop.

loans.use: to buy onions, tomatoes, apples, oranges, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Al-Ahd Group

texts.en:
This group, called Al-Ahd, is made up of 5 women: Huda, Rasha, Miadh, Latifa and Tunis from Hadramout, Yemen. They are heads of households, and they got together with the idea of helping their families. They applied for a loan of 150,000 YER.

Rasha is one of the members (she is the third woman from right screen in the photo). She is 27 years old, the president of the group, and she says that she puts a lot of effort into helping her family. She has a business selling all types of clothes, and thanks to this, she has been able to get ahead and help her family. 

At this time, she is requesting a youth loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to stock up with clothes like pants, shirts and other garments for her business. She wants to be well-stocked so that she can offer a good variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to stock up with clothes like pants, shirts and other garments for her business.

loans.name: Al-Moamr Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Moamr and consists of 3 women (Lina, Soha, and Azal) and 2 men (Aed and Bashir). They live in Taiz, Yemen. This community is hardworking and works as much as they can in order to offer better living conditions. They took out a loan of 150,000 YER.

Lina is the leader of the group (she is the tallest woman on the photo). She is a married woman, and she is 22 years old, living in Taiz, Yemen. She has a small house. She went through a lot of effort and had to save money with her husband to set up her house. She is aiming to complete her house. 

She took out a youth loan of 30,000 to buy cement for her business. She hopes with this loan to get more profit so that she can expand her business for improving her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy cement for her business.

loans.name: Ramzy

texts.en:
Ramzy is 30 years old and a businessman. He is married and has two children who live in Taiz, Yemen. He has been running a retail shop for the past six years with a daily income which he uses to support his family. He was a worker in the same shop until he was able to save a good amount to buy the business from the former owner.

He is applying for a youth loan of 200,000 YER from AMB. He will use the loan to purchase stock for his shop, like sugar, rice and soft drinks. With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. His hopes and dreams are to open a cafeteria which will help him to care for his family’s basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase stock for his shop, like sugar, rice and soft drinks for his shop.

loans.name: Yesenia

texts.es: Yesenia de 32 años de edad es madre de dos hijos en las edades de 8 y 14 años, con quienes   ha logrado salir adelante gracias a su trabajo independiente en su propia miscelánea, donde vende mercancías variadas y detalles para la mujer, el hogar y la escuela. Así mismo aprovecha sus instalaciones para ofrecer el servicio de llamadas telefónicas, que antes funcionaba en casa de sus padres. Yesenia poco a poca ha ganado una muy buena clientela, ella ha logrado vender no solo al detalle entre vecinos de su barrio, sino también surte locales comerciales que se encuentran a su alrededor. Poco a poco sus ventas se incrementaron y hoy sus necesidades de compra, en volumen y de contado, son cada vez mayor; esta es la razón por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante la cual comprara calzado para caballeros, damas, suéteres femeninos, masculinos e infantil, pues estas son sus prendas de mayor rotación en el mercado y está preparándose para esta temporada de vacaciones,  donde el volumen de sus ventas se incrementa. Su meta de crecimiento y prosperidad, no se detienen porque quiere brindar a sus dos hijos lo mejor de si misma,  para que tengan un futuro prometedor construido por ella misma y así lo sueña.
texts.en: Yesenia is 32 years old and the mother of two children who are 8 and 14.  She has managed to make progress in life thanks to her business.  Yesenia has a store where she sells a variety of merchandise, women's products, housewares and school supplies.  She also makes the most of her premises to offer a telephone service which she previously ran from her parents' home.  Yesenia has gradually gained a very good customer base.  She manages to sell not only retail, among her neighbors, but also stocks the stores around her.  Her sales have gradually increased and, as a result, her purchasing needs, in bulk and for cash, have also increased.  For this reason, she is applying for a Kiva loan (her first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo).  She will use the loan to buy men's and women's shoes and men's, women's and children's sweaters, as these are the goods which have the best turnover and she is preparing for the holiday season when her volume of sales will increase.  Yesenia's aims for growth and prosperity are never-ending because she would like to give the best of herself for the sake of her two children so that they can enjoy a promising future.  This is what she dreams of.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's shoes, and men's, women's and children's sweaters

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is 30 years old. He is married and has two children. He is a barber and is known for doing very good quality work. He lives in Taiz, Yemen. He was a worker in a barber shop until he expanded to have his own shop. He has employed three workers in his business. 

He is applying for a youth loan of 100,000 YER to buy combs and barber machines for his business. With this loan he hopes to increase the number of customers who visit his business. 

For his family, the most important thing in his life is his children, and that is why he strives every day to support them and contribute income to the family.

loans.use: to buy combs, barber machines for his business.

loans.name: Abdulftah

texts.en:
Abdulftah is 30 years old and lives in Ibb, Yemen. He is married and has three children. He was working in the military and was able to save money so he could buy a bus. He has had his business for 4 years. It is the only source of income for covering the daily expenses of his family.

He requested a youth loan of 150,000 YER from AMB to repair his bus. He hopes to improve his business to support the education of his children and to buy another bus.

loans.use: to repair his bus.

loans.name: Fahd

texts.en:
Fahd is 26 years old and married. He has two children and lives in Sana`a, Yemen. He was working in a supermarket. Currently, he has a vegetable and fruit shop and he uses his rickshaw to transport his goods. 

He has applied for a youth loan of 287,000 YER from AMB to purchase a rickshaw to facilitate buying and transporting vegetables and fruits for his business. This will help him operate efficiently and increase his route coverage. His future plan is to own a house.

loans.use: to purchase a rickshaw for his business.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.es:
La socia Josefina continua dedicandose a trabajar en un restaurante turistico , tambien continua con su negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes,la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia su negocio,la socia es una persona alegre y responsable con muchas ganas de continuar adelante por su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mas cuyes para su negocio.
texts.en:
Josefina continues working in a tourist restaurant.  She also continues working in her business raising animals such as guinea pigs.  She raises these animals and then sells them to her customers who request them.  She has been in this business for years and it is doing well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day.  This borrower is a cheerful and responsible person who has a great desire to continue making progress for the sake of her family.

The borrower is requesting a loan to buy more guineas pigs for her business.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs for her business

loans.name: Hector Adolfo

texts.es:
HECTOR ADOLFO tiene 28 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive en casa de familiares con el hijo de 6 años de edad en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

HECTOR ADOLFO es mécanico. Solicita el crédito para comprar rodelas, gata, grasa, aceite, ejes. Con la yuda del crédito podra incrementar el negocio.

Las compras lo hrá en Guaranda.
El sueño es poder comprar y mejorar el estilo de vida. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Hector Adolfo is 28 years old, is single and has one son. He lives in his family's house with his son of 6 years of age in Chimbo Province, Bolivar.

Hector Adolfo is a Mechanic. He is asking for this loan to buy washers, a jack, grease, oil, axles. With the help of this loan he will be able to expand the business. He will make the purchases in Guaranda. 

His dream is to be able to buy and improve his lifestyle. In his spare time he likes to play volleyball.

loans.use: to buy washers, a jack, grease, oil, axles.

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel is 49 years old. He is married with five children who all go to school. He sells sorghum and owns a meal milling machine where the neighborhood brings their cereals to get flour from sorghum and maize. With the loan, he wants to buy an engine for his meal milling machine. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children and renovate the house.

loans.use: To buy an engine for his meal milling machine.

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her animal selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy sheep and goats in larger numbers. She will grow them up and will sell to butchers for profit.

She is a very hardworking lady and started her business a few years ago after the sudden death of her husband. She has given birth to 4 sons and a daughter. All of her sons do different kinds of work to support financially while her daughter is studying in tenth class.

Razia is very confident about the further growth of her business after investing the loan.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding the book called an Asasah Passbook is Razia.

loans.use: to buy goats and sheep for animal selling business

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a 34-year-old married man. He has 4 children with ages ranging from 5 to 12 years. He describes himself to be a determined man.

He operates a retail store where he sells cereals. He has been involved in this business for 4 years. His business is located within a market and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high prices of cereals. He will use the 15,000 KES loan to buy more cereals for selling.

His business goal is to run a big cereal wholesale shop within 5 years.

loans.use: to buy more cereals for selling

loans.name: Loi

texts.en:
Mrs. Loi was born in 1962. She has two children who are at primary school. She is a carpenter with an income of 4,500,000 VND each month.

She has participated in the credit program of SEDA since 2008. In the last loan cycle, she borrowed 8,288,000 VND and repaid this loan on time. In this cycle loan, she wants to borrow 8,288,000 VND to support her business.

loans.use: to upgrade her own carpentry studio at home

loans.name: Ho

texts.en:
Ho is a 42-year-old married woman who has been residing with her family in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is responsible for two children, and currently one of them is already married.

To earn a living, Ho and her husband are engaged in a rice farming business, from which the main source of the family’s income is made to satisfy their living needs. They can cultivate rice twice a year for sale between the two seasons.

Ho wishes to make a better quality of life for their children through her sacrifices and patience. She is now requesting a loan of 500 USD to purchase a motorcycle, which they can use to get anywhere as easily as they wish without paying for any transportation fees. This will be her first loan from HKL and Kiva. She is thankful for your help and is confident to pay her loan back as scheduled.

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es:
La socia Leonor continua dedicandose  a su negocio de venta de chicha y crianza de animales menores como cuyes la socia cria a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable con muchas ganas de continuar trabajando por su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mas cuyes para su negocio.
texts.en:
Leonor continues in her business selling 'chicha' (a corn-based drink) and raising animals such as guinea pigs.  She raises these animals and then sells them to customers who request them.  She has been in this business for years and it is doing well thanks to the effort that she puts in.  This borrower is a responsible person who has a great desire to continue working for the sake of her family.

Leonor is requesting a loan to buy more guinea pigs for her business.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs for her business

loans.name: Fernando

texts.es:
FERNANDO tiene 32 años de edad es casado no tiene hijos, vive en casa de los familiares en Chimbo Provincia de Bolívar.

FERNANDO se dedica a la siembra de maíz suave y a la siembra de cebada. Solicita el crédito para comprar insumos, 
urea, abonos, líquidos para la maleza.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar insumos agrícolas.

Las compras lo hara  en Guaranda. El sueño es poder comprar un terreno y un vehículo. En el tiempo libre le gusta  jugar futbool.
texts.en: Fernando is 32 years old, married and doesn't have any children. He lives in a family member's house in Chimbo, Bolívar province. Fernando is a farmer who grows 'soft maize' (zea mays amylacea) and barley. He is requesting this loan to buy supplies, urea, fertilizers and weed killer. With the help of this loan, he will be able to buy his farming supplies. He will make his purchases in Guaranda. Fernando's dream is to buy a plot of land and a vehicle. In his free time, he enjoys playing soccer.

loans.use: to buy supplies, urea, fertilizers and weed killer

loans.name: Diosdada

texts.en:
Diosdada owns and manages a sari-sari (convenience) store in Trinidad, Bohol. She earns 6,000 PHP per month selling toiletries, snack foods and soft drinks. She works hard to support her family, a husband and 4 children.

It is her dream to improve her family's living conditions. She has requested a loan to buy soft drinks, toiletries and more items to sell. Diosdada hopes to achieve her dreams in the future.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, toiletries and more items to sell

loans.name: Ana Ruth

texts.es:
Ana, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo porque necesita invertir en su negocio, además deberá construir un muro en su vivienda, que realmente necesita realizar, el préstamo lo utilizara una parte para comprarse maíz y leña, pero en su mayoría sera invertido en la compra de cemento, arena y hierro, para poder construir el muro.
Ella ha tenido un efecto positivo con el préstamo anterior, pues le ayudo para mejorar su producción y poderse establecer en la venta, además le ha ayudado en la condición económica de su familia, generando los ingresos necesarios.
texts.en:
Ana is requesting a new loan because she needs to invest in her business.  She also really needs to build a wall in her home.  She will use part of her loan to buy corn and firewood but will invest most of the money in buying cement, sand and iron so that she can build her wall. 

Ana's previous loan had a positive effect as it helped her to improve her production and establish her sales.  It also helped her family financially, making the income they need.

loans.use: to buy corn and firewood, sand, cement and iron

loans.name: Siforo

texts.en:
Siforo is 50 years old. She is the mother of eight children, all of whom go to school. For the past 30 years, Siforo has run a business selling different foodstuffs. 

Siforo is requesting a loan to buy more beans and rice to sell. She plans to use her profits to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy beans and rice to sell

loans.name: Mayaky Sartasiñani Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “MAYAKI SARTASIÑANI” inicia su primer ciclo en el Centro Focal de Villa Adela, está compuesta por ocho integrantes donde la señora Luisa es la presidenta. Las actividades que desarrollan dentro del grupo son distintos, entre ellos tenemos: Artesanía en mantas, venta de café, tienda de internet, costura de chamarras, venta de comida, venta de productos ESIKA, venta de cosméticos. 
La señora Luisa cuenta que hace cinco años que integra una Banca Comunal dentro de Pro Mujer y que para esto fue invitada por una promotora; en la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de artesanía en mantas y elaboración de chompas de bebe, mismo que trabaja hace varios años.
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de flecaduras y cortes de tela) los que comprarán de las ferias tradicionales de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente a la elaboración lo venderá a pedido a las galerías. Esta forma de trabajo apoya a salir adelante a su familia pues ella vive en concubinato y tiene un hijo.
Cuando le consultamos que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella nos respondió que le gusta el área de salud, los préstamos y los ahorros.
En la fotografía no esta presente la señora Olivia, pues se fue de inmediato a su puesto de venta
texts.en:
The “MAYAKI SARTASIÑANI” community bank are starting their first loan cycle as part of the Villa Adela regional office.  The group has eight members and Luisa is the group's president.  The members carry out a number of different business activities including: making blankets by hand, selling coffee, running an Internet cafe, sewing jackets, selling food, selling Esika brand products and selling cosmetics.

Luisa tells us that she has been a member of a Pro Mujer community bank for five years.  She was invited to join by a loan officer.  Luisa currently has a handicraft business selling blankets and making baby sweaters.  She has been in this business for some years.

Luisa is requesting this loan to increase her capital.  She will buy fringes and fabric in the traditional street markets in the city of La Paz and, after making her goods, she will sell them to order to stores.  This work helps her to support her family.  Luisa lives with her partner and has one child.

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, Luisa replied that she likes the health services, the loans and the saving.

*Olivia does not appear in the photograph as she left immediately to return to her sales location

loans.use: to buy fringes and fabric

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is 23 years old and a single man from Nakuru county. He has a business selling newspapers.

Moses is requesting his first loan from KADET LTD to buy daily newspapers to sell. He is optimistic that his loan will really boost his business. In the future, Moses hope to have a stall where he can sell his newspapers.

loans.use: to purchase daily newspapers to sell

loans.name: Louse

texts.en:
Louse is 44 years old and widowed. She is the mother of three children, all of whom go to school. For the past 13 years, Louse has run a general store.

Louse is requesting a loan to buy items such as soap, beans, sugar, and cooking oil. Although she sells both foodstuffs and other items, she will use this loan to specifically buy the abovementioned products. Louse will use the profits from her business for savings.

loans.use: to purchase items for her general store

loans.name: 20 De Mayo Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “20 DE MAYO” inicia su primer ciclo en el Centro Focal de Villa Adela, está compuesta por once integrantes donde la señora Ema es la presidenta.  Las actividades que desarrollan dentro del grupo son distintos, entre ellos tenemos: venta de zapatillas, venta de camas y edredones, costura, venta de comida, venta de medias, hilado de vicuña, venta de helados, venta de chorizos. 
La señora Ema cuenta que hace tres años que integra una Banca Comunal dentro de Pro Mujer y que para esto fue invitada por una promotora; en la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de medias, mismo que trabaja hace varios años, aprendiendo el mismo de su madre.
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de medias) los que comprarán de las empresas textiles y posteriormente lo venderá en las ferias fronterizas y el departamento de Oruro. Esta forma de trabajo apoya a salir adelante a su familia pues ella es soltera y tiene dos hijos.
Cuando le consultamos que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella nos respondió que le gusta el área de salud.
En la fotografía no aparesen las señoras Maribel y Sandra ya que ellas se encontraban en consulta médica.
texts.en:
The communal bank “20 de Mayo” (20th of May) is starting its first cycle at the Focal Centre in Villa Adela. It is made up of eleven members of whom Ema is the president. The activities carried out buy the group-members are varied. Amongst them are: the sale of casual shoes, sale of beds and eiderdowns, couture, food sales, sock sales, vicuña yarn sales, ice-cream sales, chorizo sales. 

Ema has been a member of the communal bank, part of Pro Mujer (“Pro Women”) for four years and for this reason she was invited to become a marketing officer. She has a sock-sales business, with which she has worked for many years, having learnt this from her mother. 

This loan will help her to increase her capital (purchase of socks) which she will buy from textile companies and then sell at the border markets and in the department of Oruro. This type of work helps to move forward and helps her family since she is single and has two children. 

When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, she said she likes the health aspect. 

Maribel and Sandra do not appear in the photo as they were at a doctor’s appointment.

loans.use: to buy socks.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.en:
Miriam is 45 years old and married with six children. She is from Nakuru. For the past ten years, she has been a businesswoman and has run a business raising rabbits. 

Miriam is requesting her first loan from KADET LTD to buy more rabbits to rear and sell. She is optimistic that her business will do well after her loan. In the future, Miriam hopes to see her business grow.

loans.use: to buy rabbits to rear and sell

loans.name: Harol Gabriel

texts.es: El Joven Harol tiene 20 años y es soltero se dedica a la atención de una  pensión familiar  donde se ofrece variedad de platillos especiales desde almuerzos hasta  platos extras, su pensión se encuentran en la zona de tembladerani,  este préstamo es su segunda secuencia dentro de la institución, el Joven Harol va a utilizar este préstamo  para la ampliación del negocio compra de sillas, de electrodomésticos,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es incremento de capital de trabajo, Harol enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia, que está a dos cuadras de su negocio, ella va a utilizar los beneficios en seguir comprando mesas, sillas y horno industrial, El Joven Harol es una persona emprendedora, se siente feliz y agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Harol is 20 years old and single.  His business is serving in a family diner where they offer a variety of special meals, from lunches to a la carte dishes.  His diner is located in Tembladerani district.  This loan is his second from the institution.  Harol will use his loan to expand the business, buying chairs and electrical appliances.  His reason for requesting the loan is to increase his working capital.  Harol faces challenges in his business such as the competition which is two blocks away.  He will use his profits to continue buying tables, chairs and an industrial oven.  Harol is an entrepreneurial person.  He feels happy and grateful to the institution for the support they have offered.

loans.use: to expand his business (buying tables, chairs and electrical appliances)

loans.name: Leah

texts.en:
Leah is 30 years old and is a single mother with two school-going children ages six and 12. For the past 14 years, she has been a farmer. Leah earns a monthly income of 20,000 KES. She was introduced to KADET LTD by a field officer.

Leah is requesting her first loan from KADET LTD to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizer and seedlings. She will also use part of her loan to pay farm laborers. In the future, Leah hopes to become one of the leading farmers in her area. She also hopes to manage to see her children educated.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and pay laborers

loans.name: Protogene

texts.en:
Protogene is 22 years old and is single. For the past six years, he has been running a general store. 

Protogene is requesting a loan to add more and new items such as cooking oil, sugar, and salt to his store. He will save the profits from his loan.

loans.use: to buy cooking oil, sugar, and salt to sell

loans.name: Consolee

texts.en:
Consolee is 68 and has five children. For the past five years, she has been selling cassava. 

Consolee is requesting a loan to buy more cassava to sell. She will use the profits from her loan to provide food for her family.

loans.use: to buy cassava to sell

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 40 years old and is married to Susan. Together, they have two children ages one and five. For the past seven years, Francis has been a farmer and he also operates a grocery store. He earns a monthly income of 15,000 KES. Francis was introduced to KADET by a field officer.

Francis is requesting his first KADET LTD loan to purchase fertilizer, seedlings, and pesticide. He will also use his loan to pay laborers on his farm. In the future, Francis hopes to expand and improve his farming skills to provide for his children.

loans.use: to purchase farm inputs and pay laborers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her stock of merchandise

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 29 years old and is married with five children aged between three and eight years old. She also takes care of six relatives. For the past eight years she has been selling various goods such as beans, rice, cooking oil, salt, and other items. She currently employs one person to help her. 

Jacqueline is requesting a Kiva loan via the Vision Finance Company to buy various goods such as beans, rice, cooking oil, salt, and other items to sell. She will save the profits from her loan for the future and hopes to pay school fees for her children and be able to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy goods such as beans, rice, cooking oil and salt to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cow feed

loans.name: Josphat

texts.en:
Josphat used his previous loan amount to buy more goods to sell in his retail shop. It was very profitable and he was able to repay the loan in good time.

This will be his fourth loan, and he plans to use it to stock up his shop with sacks of sugar and rice, cooking oil, and baking flour, among other items.This will enable him to meet the high demands of his customers as well as make more profits. With the anticipated profits, he plans to add more stock and also improve his farm  by buying  fertilizer and seeds.

In the future, Josphat would like to invest more in his business and open a supermarket .

loans.use: to buy more retail goods like sugar, rice, cooking oil, and baking flour to sell.

loans.name: Antoinette Genese

texts.fr: Genese est une jeune femme de 31 ans célibataire, mère de trois enfants dont l'age varie entre 8 et 17 ans, tous les trois vont encore à l'école . elle est commerçante dans un marché de la place depuis 8 ans déjà ou elle vend la tomate et parfois le couscous en détail. Elle s'achete un cajot de tomate ou un sac de couscous chaque fois pour détailler mais ça ne rapporte pas grand chose.d'où la necessité de crédit qui lui permettra d'acheter plusieurs cajots de tomate ou sacs de coucous pour revendre en gros. Ce quilui donnera une marge bénéficiaire importante, et lui permettra d'économiser pour les rentrées scolaires de ses enfants qui approche déjà.
texts.en: Genese is a young woman of 31.  She is the single mother of three children who are between 8 and 17 years old.  All three are still attending school.  Genese has been working as a trader in a local market for eight years.  She sells tomatoes, and sometimes couscous, retail.  She buys one crate of tomatoes or one sack of couscous at a time to sell retail.  However, this does not make her a great deal of money.  She needs this loan as it will allow her to buy several crates of tomatoes or sacks of couscous at once which she will sell wholesale.  This will give her a good profit margin and allow her to save for the upcoming start of the school year when her children will return to school.

loans.use: to increase her stock of merchandise

loans.name: Hong

texts.en:
Hong is 43 years old and married with six children. She lives in a thatched house in Prey Chor district, Kompong Cham province. She is involved in cultivating rice to generate income. Her husband also works in the same type of business and helps her manage most of the maintenance of the rice field. 

Hong’s family is experiencing difficulties in their life because their house suffers from the rain when there is too much rain coming. Hong wants to renovate her house and make the family more comfortable, so she is asking for a loan of 2,000,000 riels to purchase timbers and wallboard. She hopes that this loan will be granted to her to help her family. Her priority in life is to provide further education for all of her children.

loans.use: to purchase timbers and wallboard to renovate and expand her house.

loans.name: Divine Bonte Group

texts.fr:
Mme Marie Augustine est la représentante du groupe DIVINE BONTE. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 32ans et le moins âgé a 02ans 02mois. 01 va à l’école et elle a 01 personne en charge.

Elle fabrique et vend le savon liquide et en boule depuis 02ans. Mme s’approvisionne à Faso chimie en cité AN III en ville. Ses clients sont les femmes, les hommes, les gérants de boutique et le voisinage.

Mme veut s’acheter 60 litres d’huile de coco, 02 sac de soude, 02 sac de carbonate et 40 litres de beure de karité pour la fabrication du savon.

Mme utilise ses économies pour satisfaire ses commandes. Elle n’a pas pu acquérir sa deuxième machine donc elle ambitionne toujours s’acheter une deuxième machine de transformation et ouvrir un magasin.
texts.en:
Madame Marie Augustine is the representative of the Divine Bonte group. She is married and the mother of three children. The oldest is 32 years old and the youngest is 26 months old. One of them attends school and she has one person under her care.

She has been making and selling liquid soap and soap balls for two years. She gets her supplies from Faso Chimie in the Cité AN III part of town. Her customers are women, men, store managers and neighbors.

She would like to buy 60 liters of coconut oil, 2 bags of sodium carbonate, 1 bag of carbonate, and 40 liters of Shea butter to make soap.

She uses her savings to meet her orders. She was not able to buy a second processing machine, so she still aims to buy a second processing machine and open a store.

loans.use: to buy 60 liters of coconut oil, 2 bags of sodium carbonate, 1 bag of carbonate, and 40 liters of Shea butter to make soap.

loans.name: Bernadette

texts.fr: Bernadette est une femme de 57 ans veuve, mère de 7 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 5 et 23 ans, quatre vont encore à l'école. Elle commerçante depuis 10 ans dans une gare ou elle vend du bois. Il y'a des périodes où ce n’est pas facile de vendre du bois ce qui l'inquiète souvent et de devient difficile de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille dont elle a la charge. C'est pour cette raison qu'elle veut acheter en plus du bois qu'elle vend déjà, le charbon et la sciure en grande quantité pour revendre. Ceci l'aidera pendant les périodes dures à nourrir sa famille et aussi à économiser pour les rentrées scolaires
texts.en: Bernadette is a 57-year-old widow and the mother of seven children who are between 5 and 23 years old.  Four of her children still attend school.  She has been working as a trader for 10 years.  She works in a station, selling wood.  There are periods when it is not easy to sell wood.  This often worries her as it becomes difficult for her to cover the needs of her dependent family members.  For this reason, she would like to buy more wood, charcoal and sawdust in large quantities to re-sell.  This will help her to feed her family during the hard times and enable her to save up for when her children return to school after the holidays.

loans.use: to diversify her merchandise

loans.name: Aïssatou

texts.fr: Aïssatou est une jeune femme, célibataire.Elle vend des tissus et des habits.Ce commerce lui rapporte des revenus assez consistants qui lui permettent de constituer une épargne à l'UIMCEC.Elle arrive aussi à participer aux dépenses d'entretien de sa famille et à prendre en charge ses propres besoins.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 150000f pour acheter des vêtements.Elle envisage de faire des voyages de commerce à l'extérieur de son pays.
texts.en: Aïssatou is a young, single woman who sells fabric and clothing.  This business makes her fairly permanent income which allows her to form savings with UIMCEC.   She also contributes towards her family's expenses and covers her own needs.  In order to strengthen her working capital, she is requesting a loan for 150,000 francs to buy clothing.  She plans to make purchasing trips abroad.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: Awa est une jeune femme mariée et mère de trois enfants.Pour pouvoir subvenir à ses besoins et soutenir son mari dans la prise en charge des dépenses d'entretien de la famille, elle exerce un commerce de crème glacée et de produits alimentaires.Malheureusement, son réfrigérateur,tombée en panne à plusieurs reprises, n'arrive plus à fonctionner correctement.Ainsi, pour relancer ses activités, elle sollicite un pret de 200000f pour acheter un nouvel réfrigérateur.
texts.en:
Awa is a young married woman, mother of three children. 
To meet her needs and to help her husband provide for the family’s expenses, she sells ice cream and foodstuffs. Unfortunately, her refrigerator broke down on several occasions and does not function properly. 

In order to launch her activity again, she is requesting a loan of 200, 000 francs to purchase a new refrigerator.

loans.use: to purchase a new refrigerator.

loans.name: Vasil

texts.en:
Vasil is forty-four years old and married. He has two children, seventeen and fifteen years old, who are attending the secondary public school in a nearby city known for its natural beauty and breathtaking scenery.  It is the  capital city of their district in southeastern Albania, situated on the shores of Ohrid Lake. The entire family lives in a nearby village, and the children take the bus everyday to and from school.   

The increase in their family’s expenses due to the children’s school and plans for their future education made Vasil start his livestock business two years ago in the hope that the profit would be enough to cover the extra expenses. In addition, he owns some “dynyms” of land where he plants crops for human food and animal feed. This is his second time requesting a loan from VFA.  The first one, which was used to buy a cow, has been paid off.  He sold the milk to a local dairy farm and has had a good profit so far. With this second loan, Vasil is planning to add one more cow to increase the milk production.
This loan will be a great help to him and his family and he is really appreciative of all the support from Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To add one more cow

loans.name: Venuste

texts.en:
Venuste is 55 years old and is married. He has seven children aged between 6 months and 25 years old. He sells charcoal. Venuste has 10 years of experience in this work and he currently employs 10 people to help him. 

Venuste has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more charcoal in sacks for resale. With any profits, he will be able to save money for his future and to reinvest in his other business of timber.

loans.use: To  purchase more charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Oumar

texts.fr: Omar est un homme marié et père de sept enfants.Il pratique depuis bientôt quatre ans, l'aviculture.Il achète des poussins qu'il élève et revend une fois à maturité.Cette activité lui permet de générer des revenus pour prendre en charge ses propres besoins ainsi que les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille.Afin de faire une nouvelle opération , il sollicite un pret de 500 000f pour acheter des poussins, des aliments et des vaccins.Son ambition est de devenir fournisseur des hôtels de sa localité.
texts.en:
Omar is a married man and the father of seven children. 
For the last four years he has been in the business of poultry farming. He buys chicks that he raises and he sells them once mature. This activity allows him to generate an income, take care of his needs as well as cover the family’s expenses.

In order to start a new operation, he is requesting a 500,000 francs loan to purchase chicks, feed and vaccines. His aim is to become the provider of his town's hotels.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed and vaccines.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 39 years old. He is married to Margaret.  They have three children aged 15,10 and 5 years.  He is a farmer and has been in the business for the past four years.  He gets a monthly income of KES 15,000 from his business.

This is his second loan from KADET LTD. He repaid his previous loan well and in good time. He was introduced to KADET by a field officer. He will use the loan amount to purchase fertilizer, seedlings, and pesticides and also use part of it to pay laborers on the farm.

He hopes to expand and improve his farming skills so that he can manage to help his children.

loans.use: Purchase farm inputs and pay laborers.

loans.name: Jeanne

texts.en: Jeanne is 42 years old. She sells cassava and has been in the business for 26 years. She wants the loan to add more cassava to sell. The profits from the business will be used for savings.

loans.use: To buy more cassava to sell.

loans.name: Khushvaktmurod

texts.ru: Хушвактмурод  очень начитанный и ответственный. Воспитывался  в очень интилигентной семье.  Он с детства занимался  выращиванием скота и любил этим заниматься с отцом.  Повзрослев и будучи уверенном в себе решил заняться купле -продажей скота и по серьёзному и начал данный бизнес с 1500 сомони. В настоящее время он владелец 4 голов крупного рогатого скота и 10 голов мелкого рогатого скота. Ещё он занимается обработкой земли, с которого берёт корм для своего скота.  Для этого дело он привлёк свою семью и знакомых.  Хушвактмурод из тех людей, которые  не останавливаются на достигнутом и пытается поднять уровень своего бизнеса и состояния на достойную планку  и по возможности помогать своим друзьям привлекая их в свой бизнес. Хушвактмурод хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en:
Khushvaktmurod is a very well read and responsible man who comes from a very intelligent family.  

Since childhood he has been involved in animal husbandry, an activity he used to enjoy with his father.  Later on, believing in himself, he decided to buy and sell livestock for good and started his own business, beginning with an initial amount of 1,500 somoni.   

He currently owns four head of cattle and ten head of smaller livestock.  He also cultivates some land and grows cattle feed.  He has drawn his family and friends into this business. 

Khushvaktmurod is not one of those people who rest on their laurels; he is trying to raise his business and conditions to an acceptable level.  Whenever possible he tries to help his friends by involving them in his business.

He would like to receive a loan to buy livestock in order to expand his business. He looks forward to your help and mercy.

loans.use: to purchase cattle in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru: Махбуба трудолюбивая и добрая женщина, она замужем и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Более 20 лет она занимается купле- продажей скота. Она откармливает скот дома, затем продает на рынке за выгодную цену. Её муж работает охранником, также помогает жене на содержание скота. Махбуба имеет землю и выращивает рис, также она имеет абрикосовый сад. Она летом занимается обработкой и сушкой абрикоса. Помимо того она работает в собесе и помогает пенсионерам. Махбуба хотела бы получить займ для покупки абрикосовых деревьев с целью сушкой и обработки абрикоса. Она надеется на вашу доброту и милосердие.
texts.en: Makhbuba is a hard-working and kind woman. She is married and is raising five children. For more than 20 years she has been selling livestock. She fattens the livestock at her home, and then sells them at the market for a good price. Her husband works as a security guard, and also helps her take care of the animals. Mahkuba has some land; she grows rice and has an apricot orchard. During the summer she processes and dries apricots. Besides this, she works in the social security department and helps retirees. Makuba would like to obtain a loan to buy apricot trees so she can dry and process apricots. She is counting on your kindness and compassion.

loans.use: To purchase apricot trees

loans.name: Arona

texts.fr: Arona est un jeune marié, père d'un enfant.Il vit avec sa femme et ses deux parents.Il conduit un taxi de transport urbain.Cette activité lui permet de générer des revenus qui lui permettent de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille. Afin d'embellir son taxi et d'améliorer ses performances, il sollicite un pret de 400000f pour acheter des organes et de la peinture.
texts.en:
Arona is a young married man and father of one. He lives with his wife and parents. 

Arona drives a taxi providing urban transport. This business means he can earn money to meet his family’s living expenses. In order to improve his taxi and increase his revenue, he is requesting a loan of 400 000 francs to purchase equipment and paint.

loans.use: purchase equipment and paint.

loans.name: Solange

texts.en:
Solange is 29 years old and married with two children, ages 3 and 4 years old, and she takes care of three relatives. She sells various goods such as beans, rice, cooking oil, lotions, etc. She has six years of experience in this work and she currently employs four people to help her.

Solange has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods such as beans, rice, cooking oil, lotions, etc., for resale. With any profits, she will be able to save money for her future and she will be able to pay medical insurance for her family.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as beans, rice, cooking oil, lotions, etc., for resale.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Iván,  es soltero y tiene un hijo pequeño con el cual no vive pero le pasa mensualidades para su manutención ya que el niño vive con su madre. Iván vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Kupini de la ciudad de La Paz.
Iván, estudió derecho y actualmente trabaja como Asesor Jurídico, por más de ocho horas al día y con lo que gana  ayuda  a pagar los gastos de servicios básicos y alimentación en su casa  y no le alcanza para pagar sus estudios es por eso que solicita el crédito para pagar el diplomado en la facultad de derecho y de esta forma mejorar sus ingresos.
El sueño de Iván, es mejorar sus ingresos y poder independizarse ya que necesita más comodidad y de esta forma mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la tercera vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Iván is single, and he has a young son, who does not live him.  His son lives with his mother, and he pays for his support monthly.  Iván lives in his parents’ house, occupying only one room.  The house is in the Kupini area of the city of La Paz.

Iván studied law, and he currently works as a legal advisor for over eight hours a day.  With what he earns he helps pay the expenses for basic services and food at his house.  

He does not have enough to pay for his education. That is why he is requesting the loan to pay for his law diploma.  This will improve his income.

Iván’s dream is to improve his income and to be able to become independent.  He needs to be more comfortable, and that will improve his quality of life.

This is the third time he has worked with IMPRO and the first time with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for his law diploma in order to get more income as a professional.

loans.name: Yéta

texts.fr: Yéta est une femmes mariée.Elle est mère de quatre enfants.Elle tient au marché central de sa localité un magasin de vente de tissus qui lui rapporte des revenus assez consistants.Cela lui permet de prendre en charge les dépenses d'entretien de sa famille mais également de subvenir à ses propres besoins.Afin de renforcer son fonds de commerce, elle sollicite un pret de 500 000f pour acheter des tissus ordinaires, des tissus "basin" et des tissus "ganila".
texts.en:
Yéta is married and the mother of four children. She runs a business selling cloth at the central market in her area. This business brings in a fairly regular income, which helps her to provide for her family’s needs as well as her own expenses. 

In order to increase her business funds, Yéta is requesting a loan of 500 000 francs for the purchase of ordinary cloth, basin cloth and ganila cloth.

loans.use: to buy ordinary cloth, basin cloth and ganila cloth.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru:
Семь лет тому назад  Шухрат начал свою деятельность в сфере торговли. Он начал свой бизнес с надеждой получения прибыли для  содержания семьи. Он занимается купле -  продажей кураги и переработкой абрикосового сада с целью дальнейшего реализации. В бизнесе занимается один, но для переработки абрикоса помогает  супруга. Ежегодно покупает сад абрикосовых деревьев около 1,5-1,8 га. с г. Кайраккума и г. Канибадама. Женат, имеет единственного сына.
 Шухрат кредитуется в «Имон Интернешнл» несколько лет,  имеет хорошую репутация и отличную кредитную историю. Кроме того он занимается покупкой и реализации сушенных абрикосов и кураги. Приобретает товар с рынков г. Канибадама и реализует в Исфаре. Имеет дополнительный доход от бизнеса. Шухрат хотел бы получить займ  в размере  3 000 долларов США  для приобретения сада абрикосовых деревьев  с целью  переработки.
texts.en: Seven years ago Shukhrat started working as a merchant. He started his business with the hope of earning income to take care of his family. He sells dried apricots and processes apricots from an orchard for later sale. He runs the business by himself, although his wife helps him process the apricots. Each year he buys apricot trees and rents  1.5–1.8 hectares of orchard space from the cities of Kairakkum and Kandbadam. Shukhrat also sells dried apricots; he buys them at the market in Kanibadam and sells them in Isfar. Shukhrat is married and has one son. He has received loans through IMON International for several years, and has a good reputation and an excellent credit history. This provides him with some additional income. Shukhrat would like to obtain a loan in the amount of 3000 dollars to acquire an orchard's worth of apricot trees to grow and process apricots.

loans.use: To purchase apricot trees

loans.name: Sharifa
