texts.ru: Шарифа трудолюбивая и добрая женщина, она замужем и на воспитании имеет троих детей, двое из них девочки, которые учатся. Сын работает в Российской Федерации на стройках. Шарифа работает инспектором на государственном унитарном предприятии. Она оповещает граждан местного города об оплате за услуги пользования водоканала. Шарифа хочет улучшить свои жилищные условия и с этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки стройматериалов для ремонта своего дома. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Sharifa is a hard working, kind and married mother of three children, two girls who attend school and one son who is away working in Russia. Sharifa works as an inspector on a state-owned unitary enterprise. She notifies locals about water canal fees. 
Sharifa wants to improve her housing conditions and is asking for a loan in order to purchase some building materials for her home. She's hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase building materials.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Virginia, es casada y tiene dos hijos pequeños con los cuales vive en tres habitaciones en alquiler , la habitación tiene paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz.
Virginia estudió solo hasta la primaria, actualmente trabaja como empleada de limpieza en casas particulares los fines de semana y de lunes a viernes trabaja como educadora en una guardería por más de ocho horas al día ya que tiene que cubrir los gastos de educación, alimentación y servicios básicos de su familia ya que su esposo le envía poco dinero del trabajo que realiza en la mina en los yungas de La Paz, pero lamentablemente tuvo un accidente en la mina.
El crédito lo necesita para pagar el hospital ya que su esposo se encuentra internado por un accidente y necesita varios análisis y exámenes y con lo poco que gana Virginia no le alcanza para pagar los gastos médicos de su esposo.
Es la cuarta vez que trabaja junto a IMPRO y la segunda vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Virginia is married and has two young children.  She lives with them in three rented rooms.  The rooms have brick walls and dirt floors.  The house is located in the Pasankeri area of the city of La Paz.

Virginia only went to elementary school.  She currently works cleaning private houses on the week-ends.  Monday through Friday she works as an educator at a daycare for over eight hours a day.  She does this because she needs to cover her family’s expenses for education, food, and basic services.

Her husband used to send her a little money from the work he did at the mine in Los Yungas de La Paz.  However, he regrettably had an accident at the mine.

She needs the loan to pay the hospital because her husband is hospitalized because of an accident.  He needs various analysis and examinations.  The little that Virginia earns is not enough to pay for her husband’s medical expenses.

This is the fourth time that she has worked with IMPRO and the second time with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay the hospital and for examinations for her husband, who had an accident in the mine where he works.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy beads, thread, etc., for her embroidery business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy food supplies.

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es:
Sergio, es casado y tiene tres hijos, vive en casa propia ocupando tres habitaciones pequeñas con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra , la casa esta ubicada en la zona Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió hasta terminar la secundaria y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja por más de diez horas al día vendiendo celulares ya que tiene un puesto en una calle comercial de la ciudad de La Paz; es por eso que solicita el crédito para comprar más celulares ya que desea mejorar sus ingresos para mantener a su familia pues  es el único que cubre los gastos de alimentación, servicios básicos y gastos médicos ya que no cuenta con seguro médico.
El sueño de Sergio, es construir más habitaciones en su casa para dar más comodidad a su familia y mejorar sus ingresos para poder cubrir los gastos de estudios de sus hijos.
Es la primera vez que solicita el crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Serio is married and has three children.  He lives in his own house, occupying three small rooms.  The rooms have brick walls and dirt floors.  The house is located in the Pasankeri area of the city of La Paz.

He has a high school education, and he currently earns income by working over ten hours a day selling cell phones.  He has a stand on a commercial street in the city of La Paz.

That is why he is requesting the loan to buy more cell phones.  He wants to improve his income in order to support his family.  This is the only way he covers the food, basic services, and medical expenses.  He does not have medical insurance.

Sergio’s dream is to build more rooms onto his house in order to make his family more comfortable.  He dreams of improving his income in order to be able to pay for his children’s education.

This is the first time he has requested a loan from IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity of cell phones.

loans.name: Marlyn Edith

texts.es: Marlyn de 44 años de edad, se dedica a la fabricación de calzado en un pequeño taller que tiene en su casa, ubicada al suroccidente de la ciudad, donde vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 13 años. Las líneas de productos con las cuales trabaja son las sandalias femeninas para damas y para niñas, las cuales vende mediante encargos, que le hacen sus clientes: vecinos, empleados de empresas y todos los referidos que estos le hacen. Para complementar sus ingresos también vende mercancía variada, como perfumes, productos de bellezas y en general variedades femeninas y domésticas. Su meta es fortalecer su negocio, organizando una miscelánea y teniendo un punto comercial bien posicionado, donde después de fabricar ella misma su calzado, pueda exhibirlo con éxito. Mientras todo esto ocurre sus estados financieros muestran una rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 30%, con potencial de crecimiento, por eso necesita resolver su necesidad de capital de trabajo, para comprar en mayor volumen, ganado descuentos   y esto lo logrará con su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que invertirá en cuero, pegantes, accesorios y pintura, insumos con los que fabricará nuevos y hermosos diseños, que desde ya están encargados.
texts.en:
Marlyn, 44 years old, makes sandals in a small shop she has in her house, located  southwest of the city, where she lives with her husband and their 2 children, both aged 13. The product lines she works with are feminine sandals for ladies and girls, which she sells based on orders from neighbors, employees of enterprises, and all those who are referred by customers.

To complement her income, Marlyn also sells varied merchandise, such as perfumes, beauty products and in general, a variety off feminine and domestic items. Her goal is to fortify her business by organizing miscellaneous products, and to occupy a sound commercial position, wherein she can successfully exhibit the shoes she makes. 

While all this is occurring, their financial state shows a profit over sales of no less than 30%, with potential for added growth. For this reason, Marlyn needs working capital, to purchase a larger volume, earning discounts, and this will be achieved with her Kiva loan, the 1st financing she has received through the Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo. 

Marlyn will invest in leather, glue, accessories, and paint, supplies used for making new and beautiful designs, which are already ordered.

loans.use: invest in leather, glue, accessories, and paint for making sandals.

loans.name: Ridon

texts.en:
Ribon is a 31-year-old married man. He has 2 children with ages ranging from 1 year to 10 years. He describes himself as a customer-friendly and business-minded man. He operates a retail store where he sells home products such as Blue Band (a brand of margarine), bread, salt, sugar and cooking fat.

He has been involved in this business for 8 years and employs 1 staff member. His business is located in an area that is conducive to business and his primary customers are hotels and local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as inadequate funds for improving the business. He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy home products such as cooking fat, maize flour, etc. His goal is to expand his business and to venture into the hotel business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future he will have expanded his shop and hotel.

loans.use: to buy home products such as maize flour, cooking fat, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of shades, bracelets, school supplies and handkerchiefs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline.

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is a 47-year-old married man. He has 5 children who range in age from 2 years old to 20 years old. He describes himself as honest and business minded. 

Henry operates a restaurant where he sells food, tea, and snacks. He has been involved in this business for 12 years. His business is located in an ideal business environment and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate funds for improving the business. He will use the loan of 20,000 KES to buy food ingredients. 

Henry's business goal is to run a profitable hotel within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand his hotel and create job opportunities for people.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients.

loans.name: Wycliffe

texts.en:
Wycliffe is from Nakuru.  He is 47 years old and married, with three children between 14 and 21 years old.

Wycliffe is a newspaper vendor and has been in this business for a while now. He has applied for his first loan from KADET LTD to enable him to buy some magazines and stationery to add to his stock. 

He hopes to improve his family's standard of living in the near future.

loans.use: To buy magazines and stationery to add to his stock for sale.

loans.name: Oscar Benavide

texts.es:
Oscar es un hombre de 50 años, se encuentra felizmente casado, vive en la ciudad de Pisco con su esposa, él siempre ha sido una persona muy alegre, trabajadora y entusiasta, que ha dedicado todos sus esfuerzos para sacar adelante a su familia, Oscar tiene 2 hijos quienes actualmente ya son mayores de edad, son casados y tienes sus hijos, Oscar quiere mucho a sus nietos y desea poder ayudarlos en su crianza y educación.
Gracias al apoyo de su familia y a su gran deseo por salir adelante, desde hace 6 años, Oscar emprendió su pequeño negocio de taller de mecánica para autos y motos, él cuanta con un local alquilado para realizar su labor, dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas diarias en las cuales puede atender un promedio de 10 clientes, Oscar cree que su negocio marcha bien debido a que es recomendado por sus clientes, por su buen trabajo y trato amable.
Oscar se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra herramientas, tales como: una compresora de aire para pintado, un taladro, gata hidráulica, caja de herramientas, entre otros; de esta manera tendrá su negocio mejor acondicionado con las herramientas necesarias para brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes y con ello podrá incrementar sus ingresos económicos, con los cuales espera poder darle una mejor calidad de vida para su familia y en un futuro no muy lejano desea poder tener su propio taller de trabajo.
texts.en:
Oscar, 50, is happily married.  He lives in the city of Pisco wih his wife.  He has always ben a happy, hard-working person, dedicated to the needs of his famly.  Oscar has 2 grown children, both married with children of their own.  Oscar dearly loves his grandchildren and wants to help his children support and educate them.
Oscar started his small auto repair business, with help from his family, 6 years ago.  He operates the business in a rented space.  He works about 10 hours a day and sees an average of 10 customers.  He says that the business is successful because he provides a good service and many of his customers are referrals from other customers. 
Oscar wants to thank Kiva lenders because he will be able to use this loan to buy the tools he needs--an air compressor, an electric drill, a hydraulic jack, a toolbox, etc.--to operate his business.  The investment will allow him to provide the best possible service to his customers and, in turn, increase his income and his family's quality of life.  For he future, he wants to provide a better future for his family and, in the not too distant future, buy a workshp of his own.

loans.use: to buy equiment for his auto repair business.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 50 years old. She is married to Simon and together they have two children aged 19 and 12 years old. She sells charcoal and has been in this business for the 3 years. She gets a monthly income of 30,000 KES from sales in her business.

This is Mary's first term loan with KADET LTD. She was introduced to us by one of our field officers. She will use the loan amount to purchase stock of charcoal for resale in her business. She will use the anticipated profits to open a grocery store.

Mary hopes to expand her business and sell charcoal wholesale.

loans.use: to purchase stock of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: C19008 Abisunganye Group

texts.en:
Cecile is 38 years old and is married with four children between 4 years and 16 years old. She sells various goods such as buns, milk, bananas, beans and meat. Cecile is a leader of this group, which is called "C19008 ABISUNGANYE" in the local language. In the photo, she's the first person from left side. Cecile has 10 years of experience in this work and she currently employs one person to help her. 

Cecile has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy a large quantity of food and drinks such as buns, milk, bananas, beans and meat for resale. With any profits, she will be able to save money for her future and to buy land.

loans.use: To buy large quantities of food and drinks such as: buns, milk, bananas, beans and meat for resale.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is 41 years old. He is married to Mary and together they have three children aged nine, eight and six years. He operates a motorcycle and has been in the business for the past nine years, while his wife has a tailoring business.  Paul gets a monthly income of KES 25,000 from the business.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD. He was introduced to KADET by one of the group's field officers.  Paul will use the loan amount to purchase textiles for his wife's tailoring business. He will use the anticipated profits to repay the loan.

He hopes to purchase a taxi and open a boutique for his wife in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase textiles for his wife's business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita is 58 years old. She is married and has three children. The oldest is 28 years old and the youngest is 16 years old. 

She and her husband have been farming rice in the town of Trinidad, Bohol for more than twenty years now. Carmelita earns an average monthly income of 2,000 PHP. This loan will be used to buy quality seedlings, fertilizer, and labor fees for some hired help.

Carmelita will use her income for family daily consumption.

loans.use: to buy quality seedlings, fertilizer, and labor fees for some hired help.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more African clothes, shoes for women, etc. for resale.

loans.name: Bédériatou

texts.fr: Madame Bédériatou est mère au foyer. Elle est âgée de 30ans et a un enfant de 03ans qui ne fréquente pas pour le moment. Son conjoint est peintre –bâtiment. Pour bien jouer son rôle de femme au foyer,  Elle exerce l’activité de la vente des produits cosmétiques depuis 2002. Son approvisionnement se fait à Lomé chez les grossistes de produits cosmétiques et sa vente se réalise de façon ambulante. Sa clientèle augmente de jour en jour et comme elle ne dispose pas d’assez de moyens financiers pour répondre à leurs besoins, elle sollicite de 	WAGES un second montant pour pouvoir se ravitailler en produits cosmétiques. Elle veut agrandir l’activité, diversifier les marchandises, installer un point de vente fixe et assurer les besoins primaires de la famille.
texts.en:
Bédériatou is a housewife. She is 30 years old and has a child aged three who is not yet in school. Her husband is a painter-builder. 

In order to contribute in her role as housewife, Bédériatou has been selling cosmetic products since 2002. She buys her supplies from cosmetics wholesalers in Lomé and sells them door-to-door. Her customer base is growing daily, and as she doesn’t have the financial means to meet their requirements, she is requesting a second loan from WAGES so that she can restock. 

Bédériatou would like to expand her business, diversify in terms of products, set up a permanent sales point and provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente es casado tiene 59 años de edad, tiene tres hijos de 28,25 y 19 años vive con su esposa e hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar. 

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui esta conformada por 14 socios esta VRC queda casi a 25 minutos de la oficina en San Simón  se dedican a  la agricultura y Ganadería.

Vicente se dedica a la agricultura y cultivar y vender  papas, maíz venta de leche y crianza de ganado.
Solicita el crédito para compra de ganado lechero. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá incrementar los animales. La compra lo hará en la ciudad de Guaranda.

El sueño del señor  es poder comprar un vehículo para comodidad de  la  familia. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el transporte.

En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y disfrutar de los carnavales de la provincia.
texts.en:
Vicente, 59, is married with three children, 28-, 25-, and 19-years old, respectively.  He lives with his family in Guaranda, a city in Bolivar province.

The Tagma Ruminahui community bank has 14 members.  It is 25 minutes or so from our office in San Simon.  The members operate farming and livestock businesses.

Vicente is a farmer.  He grows potatoes and maize, raises cattle and sells milk.  He is applying for a loan that he will use to buy cows for his milk business.  The investment will allow him to grow the business.  He sells what he produces in Guaranda.

For the future, Vicente wants to buy a truck because transportation is his biggest challenge.

In his spare time, he likes to rest!  He also enjoys local fairs.

loans.use: to buy cows for his milk sales business.

loans.name: Yunisi

texts.en: Yunisi is 32 years old. She has four children. She has been a businesswoman since 1994 selling rice and beans. She wants the loan to add more quantity of rice and beans to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy more rice and beans to sell.

loans.name: Morodokayi

texts.en:
Morodokayi is 31 years old. He is married with one child aged one year. 

He owns a canteen which he has been running for the past nine years. He wants the loan to buy more juices, sodas, and bread for resale. 

The profits from the business will be used to make savings. He would like to see his business prosper in the future.

loans.use: to buy more juices, sodas, and bread for resale.

loans.name: Maria  Rafaela

texts.es:
María Rafaela tiene 30 años de edad, es divorciada tiene tres hijos de 12,8 y 5 años ,vive con sus hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

María Rafaela se dedica al cultivo de papas, además a la cría de animales cómo pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para compra gallinas, cerdos.

Con la ayuda del crédito va incrementar su negocio. Las compras y ventas lo realiza en la ciudad de Guaranda  cada 15 dias.

El sueño es tener su propia casa y que sus hijos culminen sus estudios. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es el transporte y la competencia ya que quiere ser la mejor en el mercado. 

En el tiempo libre descansa y cuando es la época de carnaval lo disfruta a lo máximo.
texts.en:
María Rafaela, 30, is divorced.  She has three children, 12-, 8-, and 5-years old, respectively.  She lives with her children in Guaranda, a city in Bolivar province.

The Tagma Ruminahui community bank has 14 members.  It is 25 minutes or so from our office.  The members operate farming and livestock businesses.

María Rafaela is a farmer.  She grows maize and raises pigs and chickens.  She is applying for a loan that she will use to buy more animals.  The investment will allow her to grow her business.  She buys and sells what she needs in Guaranda every 15 days or so.  

For the future, María Rafaela wants to buy a house of her own and see her children finish school.  Her biggest challenges are transportation and competition from other animal sales businesses.

In her spare time, María Rafaela likes to rest!  She also enjoys local fairs.

loans.use: to buy pigs and chickens for her animal sales business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock of household items.

loans.name: Simon

texts.en:
Simon is 27 years old. He is married to Janet and together they have two children. 

Simon operates a motorcycle and has been in the business for the past 2 years. He gets a monthly income of 20,000 KES from the business.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD. Simon was introduced to us by one of our field officers. He will use the loan amount to add to his savings and purchase another motorcycle.

Simon hopes to improve his living standards and enroll his children in good schools.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle.

loans.name: Dolia

texts.en: Dolia is 74 years old and married with 15 children. She works very hard to provide for them. Dolia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 10,000-Philippine-peso loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her general store. Dolia has been in this business for 36 years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, spices, soap, shampoo, noodles, etc. In the future, Dolia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Afroditas Group

texts.es:
La Banca Comunal “AFRODITAS” inicia su sexto ciclo en el Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes donde la señora Jeersy es la presidenta.  Las actividades que desarrollan dentro del grupo son distintos, entre ellos tenemos: venta de berlines, venta de cosméticos, librería, producción de muebles metálicos, tejido de chompas, cafetería, fabricación de mantas. 
La señora Jeersy cuenta que es el primer año que integra una Banca Comunal dentro de Pro Mujer y que para esto fue invitada por su amiga; en la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración de calzados, mismo que trabaja hace varios años aprendiendo el mismo de su hermano.
El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de cuero) los que comprarán de las distribuidoras y posteriormente lo comercializará en las ferias de la ciudad de La Paz. Esta forma de trabajo apoya a salir adelante a su familia pues ella es soltera y tiene un hijo.
Cuando le consultamos que le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella nos respondió que le gustan las capacitaciones en salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The AFRODITAS community bank is embarking on its sixth round of funding from the Centro Focal de Villa Exaltacion.  The bank has eight members, led by their president, Sra. Jeersy.  The bank's members operate various businesses that include: cosmetics sales; sales of paper and other school supplies; metal furniture production; cafeterias; and clothing and bedding manufacture and sales.
Sra. Jeersy tells us that she only joined the community bank recently--a friend invited her to join--and this will be her first Pro Mujer loan. She operates  a business making and selling shoes.  She has been a shoemaker for many years, a skill she learned from her brother.  
She will use this loan for working capital (to buy leather).  She buys leather from local wholesalers and sells what she makes at various markets in La Paz.  Sra. Jeersy is single and the business is the sole source of income for her and her child.
When we asked her what she likes about Pro Mujer, she told us that she likes the health training she's received and access to credit.

loans.use: to buy leather for shoe business.

loans.name: C9454 Dufatanye Group

texts.en:
Anastase is 31 years old. He is married with four children aged between three and ten years old. He takes care of six relatives. He sells cows. Anastase is the leader of this group, which is called "C9454 Dufatanye" in the local language. In the photo, he's the first person on the left in the second row. Anastase has six years of experience in this work, and he currently employs two people to help him. 

Anastase has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to buy more cows to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save money for his future and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To buy more cows to sell

loans.name: Barno

texts.ru: Барно более 30 циклов финансируется в «ИМОН Интерненшл». Она занимается производством мешка, товар закупает в центральном рынке, затем шьет и продает на рынке. В бизнесе помогает ей старшая дочка. Её супруг уехал на заработки в Российской Федерации. Барно раньше была просто домохозяйкой, после распада Союза она вынуждена была искать работу, так как её муж потерял свою работу, и она начинала данный бизнес. Она уже 18 лет в этом бизнесе. Барно является матерью четверых детей. Она запрашивает займ для покупки сырья для производства мешка.
texts.en: Barno has taken out more than thirty loans from IMON International. She makes bags. She buys materials from the central market, and then sews the bags and sells them at the market. Her eldest daughter helps her in the business. Her husband left to work in the Russian Federation. Barno was once just a housewife, but after the dissolution of the Soviet Union, she was forced to look for work because her husband lost his job.  She started this business. She has worked in this business for eighteen years. Barno has four children. She is asking for a loan to buy the raw materials to make bags.

loans.use: purchase raw materials to sew bags

loans.name: Bazar

texts.ru: Базар продолжает свою деятельность. Он работает продавцом в своем магазине. Кредит берет для покупки женской одежды и продуктов питания.
texts.en: Bazar continues the work from his previous loan. He works as a salesman in his own shop. He is taking out a loan to buy women's clothing and food.

loans.use: buy women's clothing and food

loans.name: Clementine

texts.en: Clementine is 26 years old. She sells a variety of merchandise in the shop she has run for seven years. She has requested a loan to buy more cooking oil, rice and sugar to sell. With the profits from her business, she plans to save for a better future.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oil, rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Rachael

texts.en:
Rachael is 43 years old, married with four children, who are all in school. She lives in Nakuru.

Rachael has a business of selling stationery, which she has been doing for the past eight years. She has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD, to enable her buy magazines and printing papers to add to her stock.

She hopes to diversify into poultry farming in the near future.

loans.use: To buy magazines and printing papers to sell

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 60 years old. He is married to Consolata, and together they have three children. He operates a butchery and has been in this business for the past 10 years.

This is his first loan from KADET LTD. He was introduced to them by one of their field officers. He will use the loan to purchase meat to sell in his business.

He hopes to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: To purchase meat to sell

loans.name: Islamkul

texts.ru: Исламкул проживает в районе Яван. Ему 49 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Исламкул вместе с семьей занимается посевом сельскохозяйственных культур. В основном он сеет кукурузу и подсолнух. В этой области он пять лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений и топлива.
texts.en: Islamkul lives in Yavan. He is 49 years old, married, and has five children. Islamkul and his family farm. He principally grows corn and sunflowers. He has been doing this for five years. He is taking out a loan to buy fertilizer and fuel.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Salim

texts.ru: Салим более 10 лет занимается откормом и продажей скота. Он трудолюбивый и добрый человек, на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Кроме скотоводства он занимается выращиванием картофель, морковь и пшеницу, так как он проживает в сельской местности. Его жена и дети помогают в ведении бизнеса. Салим хочет увеличить поголовье скота, чтобы его бизнес расширился и с этой целью он запрашивает займ для покупки скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и щедрость.
texts.en: Salim has been working for more than ten years fattening and selling cattle. He is a hard working and kind man who is raising four children. Since he lives in a rural area, in addition to raising animals he grows potatoes, carrots, and wheat. His wife and children help him with his business. Salim wants to expand his business by increasing the number of cattle he has.  Therefore, he is asking for a loan to buy cattle. He looks forward to your help and generosity.

loans.use: buy cattle to expand his business

loans.name: Malohat

texts.ru: Более 15 лет Малохат занимается выращиванием сельхозпродуктов. Он умная женщина, любящая жена и заботливая мать троих детей. Она очень старается поднять урожайность земли и получить хорошую прибыль, чтобы улучшить благосостояние семьи. Малохат в основном выращивает картофель, морковь и пшеницу. Данный бизнес является единственным источникам её дохода и для этого она работает усердно. В бизнесе помогают дети и муж. Малохат хотела бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений для обработки земли и семян для посева. Она надеется а вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Malohat has been farming for more than fifteen years. She is an intelligent woman, a loving wife and a caring mother of three children. She is trying very hard increase her land's productivity to earn a decent profit, and improve the family's standard of living.  Malohat mostly grows potatoes, carrots and wheat. This business is her sole source of income, and she works hard for it. Her husband and children help her in the business. Malohat would like to get a loan to buy fertilizer to improve the soil and seeds for planting. She is placing her hopes in your help and kindness.

loans.use: buy seed and fertilizer

loans.name: Maria Clemencia

texts.es:
MARIA CLEMENCIAtiene 32 años de edad es casada tiene dos hijos de 8 y 6 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

MARIA CLEMENCIA se dedica al cultivo y venta de papas y maíz, así como también la crianza y venta de pollos y cuyes.

Solicita el crédito para compra de ternera. Con el apoyo del crédito va a tener su propio ganado y así ir incrementando su dinero.
Realiza sus compras y ventas cada semana en la ciudad de Guaranda .
El sueño de la señora es tener más ganados .
El desafío de la señora es  la competencia y el transporte.
En su tiempo libre le gusta tejer y disfrutar la época de navidad.
texts.en:
Maria Clemencia, 32, is married and has 2 children aged 8 and 6.  She lives with her husband and children in the city of Guaranda, in Bolivar province.

The communal bank "Tagma Rumiñahui" is made up of 14 members, and is located about 25 minutes from the San Simon office.  The members work in agriculture and livestock production.

Maria Clemencia has a business cultivating and selling potatoes and corn.  She also raises and sells chickens and guinea pigs.

She is requesting a loan to buy some calves.  With the support of this loan, she is going to have her own cows and in this way increase her income.

She makes her purchases and sales every week in the city of Guaranda.

Maria Clemencia's dream is to have more cows.  The main challenges she faces are the competition, and transportation. 

In her free time, she likes to knit and enjoy the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Ma. Chona

texts.en:
Ma. Chona is 43 years old. She is from Trinidad, Bohol. She is married and has three children, who are 16, 18 and 21 years old. She has a dry goods business where she sells clothing and kitchen utensils. Her business has been in existence for more than 20 years. She and her husband help each other in looking after their business. 

Ma. Chona is asking for a loan to buy 5 dozen shorts, 5 dozen T-shirts and 5 dozen blouses. She would like to keep improving her business so she can keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy 5 dozen shorts, 5 dozen t-shirts and 5 dozen blouses to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock her clothing sales business.

loans.name: Gulnara

texts.ru:
Гульнаре 38 лет, воспитывает дочь. Гульнара в поисках источника дохода 17 лет назад начала свой бизнес в животноводстве, начав с суммы 10,000 сом (KGS).  Благодаря упорному  труду Гульнары на сегодняшний  день в ее хозяйстве имеется 2  головы крупного и 18 голов мелкого рогатого скота, 3 лошади, выручка с продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 7,000 сом (KGS). 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Гульнара обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Гульнара планирует вложить в оплату обучения для дочери.
texts.en:
Gulnara is 38 years old and has a daughter. In order to find a source of income, seventeen years ago Gulnara started her business in animal husbandry.  She started with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Gulnara's hard work, the farm now has two head of cattle, eighteen head of sheep and goats, and three horses.  She earns 7,000 som (KGS) selling dairy products. 

In order to further develop her business, Gulnara contacted Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves. 

Gulnara plans to use income she earns from the loan for her daughter's education.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Tun

texts.en:
Tun is 48 years old and married. She has four children, some of whom are going to school. Tun has tried to work hard to manage her rice-farming business while she is a single parent. She has been in this business for almost 22 years and earns around 2.00 USD per day on average. Two of her daughters are working in a garment factory in Phnom Penh to help Tun in earning income to cover the family's needs.

Tun wants to help her daughter achieve her dream of having a seamstress shop in their village, so now Tun is applying for additional capital of 500 USD to purchase a sewing machine, raw cloth, and other materials needed for the business. This loan will enable Tun’s daughter to attain her goal. She believes that this new business will generate more income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine, raw cloth, and other materials needed in a seamstress shop.

loans.name: Auntie

texts.en: Auntie lives at Eguafo, near Elmina. Her husband is retired, and she has seven dependents. Auntie operates a grocery shop, which she has done for 15 years now. She uses her income to assist her husband in feeding and clothing their children. Auntie will use her loan to purchase more groceries to sell, and with the greater profits, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell

loans.name: Mamarasul

texts.ru: Мамарасул проживает в районе Яван. На сегодняшний день он разводит мелко - рогатый и крупнорогатый скот. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Mamarasul lives in Yavan.  He raises livestock. He is taking out a loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves

loans.name: Eldar

texts.ru: Eldar nachal svoe delo 5 let nazad. Sfera ego deyatelnosti yavlayetsa prodaja moloka i masya. Krome etogo oni s jenoy poluchayut pensiyu ot gosudarstva. Emu 61 let i u nego 4 detey. Dochka Eldara sobiraetsa viyti zamuj, segodna on obratilsa za kreditom 1000 AZN manats dla togo chtobi kupit ey nedostayushee pridanoe.
texts.en: Eldar started this work five years ago. He produces meat and dairy products. Additionally, he and his wife receive a pension from the state.  He is 61 years old and has four children. His daughter is getting ready to marry. He has asked for a loan of 1000 AZN to pay for her dowry.

loans.use: pay for a dowry for his daughter.

loans.name: Jurabek

texts.ru: Чурабек житель города Вахдат. Он женат. Ему 57 лет. У него трое детей. Чурабек уже девять лет как работает таксистом. Он берет кредит для ремонта своей автомашины.
texts.en: Jurabek lives in Vahdat. He is married, 57 years old, and has three children. Jurabek has been working as a taxi driver for nine years. He is taking out a loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Vahid

texts.ru: Vahid 62 letniy pensioner, on jenat, u nego 4 detey. Semya u Vahida bolshaya i on podrobativaet na jizn voditelem taksi uje 5 let. On xochet sdelat novuyu krishu u seba doma, kogda idet sneg ili dojd' potolok protekaet, doma bivaet siro i deti chasto boleyut.
texts.en: Vahid is a 62-year-old retiree.  He is married with four children. He has a large family, and he has had to earn a living driving a taxi for the past five years. He wants to put a new roof on his house. His roof leaks in the rain and snow. The house is damp, and the children are often ill because of it.

loans.use: put a new roof on his house.

loans.name: Flor Esperanza

texts.es:
FLOR ESPERANZA tiene 24 años, es casada, tiene dos hijos de 6 y 2 años de edad. Vive con su esposo e hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

FLOR ESPERANZA es empleada publica además se dedica a la venta y  crianza de pollos y el cultivo de papas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos y cerdos. Con la ayuda del crédito va incrementar el negocio.

Realiza sus compras y ventas cada 15 días en la ciudad de Guaranda.

El sueño es tener un vehículo para comodidad de su familia. El desafío a la que se enfrenta es el transporte.
En el tiempo libre ella descansa juega con sus hijos y disfruta de los carnavales cuando es la época.
texts.en:
Flor Esperanza is 24 years old. She is married and has two children, ages 6 and 2. She lives with her husband and children in the city of Guaranda, Bolivar Province. 

The communal bank Tagma Rumiñahui is formed by 14 members and is just 25 minutes from the San Simón office. The members farm and raise livestock.

Flor Esperanza is a civil servant. She also sells and raises chickens and grows potatoes. She requests the loan to buy chickens and pigs. With the help of the loan, business will grow. She makes her purchases and sales every 15 days in the city of Guaranda. 

Her dream is to have a vehicle for her family's convenience. The challenge that she faces is transportation. 

In her free time, she rests and plays with her children. She also enjoys festivals when it's the season.

loans.use: to buy chickens and pigs

loans.name: Nicolasa

texts.es:
NICOLASA tiene 37 años de edad es casada tiene 5 hijos de 15,13,10,7,4 años de edad, vive con el esposo e hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar. 

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

NICOLASA se dedica a la venta y cultivo de maíz ,papas y cebolla, así como también a la crianza de cerdos, pollos y cuyes .

Solicita el crédito para comprar una ternera. Con la ayuda del crédito va incrementar los animales. Realiza sus compras y ventas en la ciudad de Guaranda cada 15 días.

El sueño de la señora es tener sus propios ganados y así incrementar su dinero. El desafío de la señora es la competencia y tener precios altos.
En su tiempo libre la señora descansa y disfruta de los carnavales de Guaranda cuando es la época.
texts.en:
Nicolasa is 37 years old and married. She has five children who are 15, 13, 10, 7, and 4 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the city of Guaranda in Bolívar Province.

The Tagma Rumiñahui Communal Bank, located almost 25 minutes from the San Simón office, is made up of fourteen members who work in livestock and agriculture.

Nicolasa works selling and cultivating corn, potatoes, and onions, as well as raising pigs, chickens, and guinea pigs. She does her buying and selling in the city of Guaranda every fifteen days. 

She is requesting this loan to buy a heifer calf; with the help of the loan, she will increase her animal stock. 

Nicolasa's dream is to have her own cattle and thereby increase her income. Her challenge is competition and having high prices. 

In her free time, Nicolasa relaxes and enjoys Guaranda's carnivals during carnival season.

loans.use: to buy a heifer calf.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es:
MARIA JOSEFINA tiene 33 años, es casada tiene 4 hijos de 15,10,7 y 4 años de edad, vive con el esposo e hijos en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

MARIA JOSEFINA se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz. papas, además se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos y ganado.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, urea, líquidos para la maleza y comprar cerdos.

Con el apoyo del crédito va incrementar sus animales y mejorar los sembríos. Realiza sus compras cada 15 días en la ciudad de Guaranda.

El sueño de la señora es tener su propio vehículo para comodidad de ella y de su familia.
El desafío de la señora es el transporte.
En el tiempo libre le gusta descansar y disfrutar la época de fiestas de Guaranda.
texts.en: María Josefina is 33 years old. She is married and has 4 children who are 15, 10, 7 and 4 years old. She lives with her husband and children in the city of Guaranda, Bolívar Province. The VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, is made up of 14 partners and is located at about 25 minutes from the San Simón office, they do agricultural activities and cattle farming for a living. María Josefina's activity is agriculture, she sows corn and potatoes and she also breeds and sells pigs and cattle. She requests the loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, urea and liquids for weeds and to buy pigs. Thanks to the loan she will be able to increase the animals she has and improve her sown fields. She makes her purchases every fortnight in the city of Guaranda. The lady's dream is to have a vehicle of her own for her and her family's comfort. The means of transportation are a challenge for her. In her spare time she likes to rest and enjoy Guaranda's parties Season.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, urea, liquids for weeds and to buy pigs

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es:
ANA LUISA tiene 29 años de edad es madre soltera tiene un hijo de 4 años, vive con el hijo en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

ANA LUISA se dedica al cultivo y venta de maíz, papas, además la crianza y venta de pollos y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para compra de cerdos y pollos.
Con el apoyo del crédito va incrementar sus animales.

Realiza sus compras y ventas  cada semana en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño de la señora es tener su propia granja .

El desafío a los que se enfrenta la señora es el transporte.
En su tiempo libre le gusta descansar y le gusta participar en el feriado de los difuntos
texts.en:
Ana Luisa is 29 years old, a single mother, and has a four-year-old son. She lives with her son in the city of Guaranda, Province of Bolívar.

The communal bank Tagma Rumiñahui is made up of 14 members at almost 25 minutes from the San Simón office. They devote themselves to crop and livestock farming. 

Ana Luise earns a living growing and selling corn and potatoes, as well as raising and selling chickens and pigs. She is seeking the loan to purchase pigs and chickens. With the support of the loan she will increase her number of animals. 

She carries out her purchases and sales every week in the city of Guaranda. Her dream is to have her own farm. 

The challenge she faces is transport. 

In her free time she likes to rest and participate in the Day of the Dead festivities.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Richard Pierre

texts.es:
Richard es un hombre de 42 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su pareja y sus 3 hijos, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programas educativos y noticieros en televisión y en algunas ocasiones prepara uno de sus platos favoritos como es la riquísima Carapulcra; Richard siempre ha sido un hombre muy emprendedor que ha trabajado desde muy joven, él culminó sus estudios secundarios, lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera universitaria, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Agronomía.  
Gracias a su entusiasmo y al apoyo de su familia, Richard arrendo un pequeño terreno para iniciar su negocio de cultivo de tuna para la extracción de cochinilla, él trabaja un aproximado de 10 horas diariamente, él se siente muy a gusto con su negocio ya que siempre le ha interesado el campo y el trabajo que se realiza en el. 
Richard se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la infesta de cochinilla a todo su cultivo de tuna, de esta manera podrá aprovechar la estación y obtendrá abundante cría de cochinilla, así cuando la cosecha de su cultivo terminé, podrá obtener buenas ganancias de las ventas realizadas, favoreciendo de esta manera a que poco a poco Richard pueda cumplir su gran sueño de tener su propio fundo y lograr que sus hijo sean buenos profesionales y hombres de bien.
texts.en:
Richard is a 42 year old man, he lives in the city of Nazca with his partner and their 3 children. During his spare time, he like watching educational programs and newsreels on the television and he sometimes prepares one of his favorite dishes, such as the delicious Carapulcra. 

Richard has always been a very enterprising man who has worked from a very young age. He completed secondary school education, but unfortunately due to a lack of financial resources he was unable to pursue a university course, although he would have liked to have studied Agriculture.

Thanks to his enthusiasm and the support of his family, Richard rented a small plot of land to start his business growing prickly pear cacti to rear cochineal bugs. He works approximately 10 hours a day and he feels very much at home with his business as he has always been interested in the countryside and the work he carries out there. 
 
Richard is extremely grateful to the Kiva loan lenders, as it is thanks to the help given that he will be able to introduce the cochineal bugs to his whole prickly pear cactus plantation. In that way, he will be able to make the most of the season and obtain a large volume of cochineal bugs. Once the harvest is completed, he will be able to gain good profits from the sales, in this manner enabling Richard to achieve his dream little by little of having his own farm and enabling his children to be good professionals and good people.

loans.use: to introduce cochineal bugs in his prickly pear cactus plantation.

loans.name: Juan Constantin

texts.es:
JUAN CONSTANTIN tiene 22 años de edad es soltero, no tiene hijos vive con los padres en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

JUAN CONSTANTIN se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y a la crianza y venta de pollos. Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá incrementar el negocio. Realiza sus compras y ventas en la ciudad de Guaranda cada 15 días.

El sueño es tener su propio vehículo. El desafío a los que se enfrenta el señor es el transporte.
En su tiempo libre el juega indor  y disfruta la época del carnaval.
texts.en:
Juan Constantin, 22, is single and has no children.  He lives with his parents in the city of Guaranda in Bolivar province.

The communal bank "Tagma Rumiñahui" is made up of 14 members, and is located about 25 minutes from the San Simon office. The members work in agriculture and livestock production.

Juan Constantin is a farmer who cultivates corn and raises and sells chickens.  He is requesting a loan to buy chickens.

With the support of this loan, he will be able to expand his business.  He makes his purchases and sales in the city of Guaranda every 15 days.

Juan Constantin's dream is to have his own vehicle.  His main challenge is transportation.  

In his free time, Juan Constantin enjoys playing indoor soccer, and he also enjoys the Carnival season.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Maria Agustina

texts.es:
MARIA AGUSTINA tiene 54 años de edad, es casada tiene un hijo de 22 años, vive con su esposo en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

MARIA AGUSTINA se dedica al cultivo y venta de papas y maíz, así como también  la  crianza y venta de pollos cuyes y cerdos.
Solicita el crédito para compra de una ternera. Con el apoyo del crédito va a criar y venderlo para obtener mas dinero.
Realiza sus compras y ventas en la ciudad de Guaranda cada semana.
El sueño de la señora es tener su propia granja.
El desafío de la señora es el transporte y tener precios altos.
En su tiempo libre la señora descansa y en la época de carnaval disfruta a lo máximo
texts.en:
Maria Agustina is 54 years old, married, and has a 22 year-old son.  She lives with her husband in the city of Guaranda in Bolivar province.

The communal bank "Tagma Rumiñahui" is made up of 14 members, and is located about 25 minutes from the San Simon office. The members work in agriculture and livestock production.

Maria Agustina has a business cultivating and selling potatoes and corn.  She also raises and sells chickens, guinea pigs and pigs.

She is requesting a loan to buy a calf.  With the support of this loan, she will be able to raise it and sell it and obtain more money.

She makes her purchases and sales in the city of Guaranda every week.

Maria Agustina's dream is to have her own farm.  Her main challenges are transportation and high prices.

In her free time, she likes to rest, and she also enjoys the Carnival season to the utmost.

loans.use: to buy a calf

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз проживает в районе Пяндж. Ей 31 год. Она не замужем. Дилафруз два года проработала секретаршей. На сегодняшний день она занимается шитьем национальных платьев. Она берет заказы у себя на дому. Этим видом деятельности занимается два года. Кредит берет для приобретения швейной машинки и разноцветных ниток.
texts.en: Dilafruz lives in Pyanj. She is 31 years old and single. Dilafruz worked as a secretary for two years. Currently, she works sewing national dresses. She takes orders for them from home. She has been doing this for two years. She is taking out a loan to buy sewing machines and thread in many colors.

loans.use: buy a sewing machine and thread

loans.name: Tursunboy

texts.ru: Турсунбой житель района Пяндж. Он женат. Ему 53 года. У него трое детей. Турсунбой уже четыре года как занимается торговлей на рынке. Он арендует торговую точку, где продает ткани. Кредит берет для покупки новых видов тканей и национальных платьев.
texts.en: Tursunboy lives in Pyandj. He is married, 53 years old, and has three children. Tursunboy has worked selling in the market for four years. He rents a shop where he sells fabric. He is taking out a loan to buy fabric and traditional dresses.

loans.use: buy fabric and traditional dresses

loans.name: Juan Israel

texts.es:
JUAN ISRAEL tiene 27 años es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

JUAN ISRAEL se dedica al cultivo y venta de papas, y a la crianza y venta de pollos. Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, ternero y un cerdo.

Con el apoyo del crédito va incrementar su negocio.Realiza sus compras y ventas cada quince días en la ciudad de Guaranda.
El sueño del señor es tener su vehículo para su comodidad. El desafío al que el señor se enfrenta es el transporte.
En su tiempo libre el señor juega indor y en la época de carnaval disfruta mucho.
texts.en:
Juan Israel is 27 years old, single and has no children. He lives with his parents in the city of Guarand, Province of Bolivar. 

The communal bank Tagma Rumiñahui is made up of 14 members at almost 25 minutes from the San Simon office. They devote themselves to crop and livestock farming. 

Juan Israel earns a living growing and selling potatoes, and raising and selling chickens. He is seeking the loan to purchase chickens, a calf and a pig. 

With the support of the loan he is going to expand his business. He makes his purchases and sales every two weeks in the city of Guaranda. 

His dream is to have a vehicle for his convenience. The challenge he faces is transport. 

In his free time he likes to play indoor soccer and enjoys himself a lot during Carnival season.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, a calf and a pig.

loans.name: Maria Teresa

texts.es:
MARIA TERESA  tiene 24 años de edad, es casado tiene un hija de 5 años, vive con su esposo e hija en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

MARIA TERESA es empleado público, además se dedica al cultivo de maíz y papas y crianza de pollos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, cerdos, semillas, insecticidas. Realiza sus compras y ventas en la ciudad de Guaranda cada semana.

El sueño de la señora es tener su vehículo para su comodidad y la de su familia.
El desafío a la que la señora se enfrenta es el transporte.
En su tiempo libre la señora juega indor y disfruta del carnaval cuando son las fiestas.
texts.en:
María Teresa is 24 years old, is married, and has a five year old daughter.  She lives with her husband and her daughter in the city of Guaranda in Bolívar province.

The communal bank Tagma Rumiñahui is made up of 14 members and is located about 25 minutes from the office of San Simón.  The group members work in agriculture and livestock.  

María Teresa is a public employee, and she also works planting corn and potatoes, and raising chickens.  She is asking for a loan in order to purchase chickens, pigs, seeds, and insecticides.  She makes her purchases and sales in the city of Guaranda each week.  

Her dream is to have a car for her convenience and for the comfort of her family.
The struggle that she faces is transport.
In her free time she plays "indor" (a popular Ecuadoran sport) and enjoys the carnival during the holiday season.

loans.use: to buy chickens, pigs, seeds and insecticides.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замира – участница группы  «Азамат», ей 48 лет, замужем, имеет 3 детей. Замира в поисках источника дохода 18 лет назад начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве. Благодаря упорному  труду Замиры на сегодняшний  день в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы, выручка с продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 4,000 сом (KGS). Также Замира ежегодно обрабатывает  1  га земли,   выращивает в основном картофель, пшеницу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Замира обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Замира планирует вложить постройку нового сарая для скота, так как в старом обвалилась крыша.
texts.en: Zamira is a member of  of the group "Azamat".  She is 48 years old, married, and has three children. In order to make an income, Zamira started farming eighteen years ago.  Through her hard work, Zamira now has two cows.  She makes 4,000 som (KGS) selling dairy products.  Zamira also farms one hectare of land where she grows mostly potatoes and wheat. In order to further develop her business, Samira asked Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves. Zamira plans to use money she makes from the loan to build new barn for her livestock since the old roof collapsed.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru: Салима – лидер группы  «Азамат», ей 56 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей. Салима в поисках источника дохода 15 лет назад начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве. Благодаря упорному  труду Салимы на сегодняшний  день в ее хозяйстве имеется 2 коровы с приплодом, 3 лошади, выручка с продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 4,000 сом (KGS). Также Салима ежегодно обрабатывает  4  га земли,   выращивает в основном картофель и кукурузу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Салима обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Салима планирует вложить в оплату за обучение в столице для младшей дочери.
texts.en: Salima is the leader of the group "Azamat." She is 56 years old, married, and has five children. Salima needed income fifteen years ago, so she started her farming business. Thanks to Salima's hard work, now the farm has two cows with calves and three horses.  She makes 4,000 som (KGS) selling dairy products. Salima also farms four acres of land, growing mostly potatoes and corn. In order to further develop her business, Salima has asked Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves. With the money she makes from the loan, Salima plans to pay for tuition so that her youngest daughter can study in the capital city.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
JUAN CARLOS tiene 30 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive en la ciudad de Guaranda Provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Tagma Rumiñahui, esta conformada por 14 socios casi a 25 minutos de la oficina de San Simón, se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería.

JUAN CARLOS se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz suave, papas y además a la venta de abono natural, crianza de pollos.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, insecticidas y animales. Con el apoyo del crédito comprará lo que tanta falta le hacía.

Realiza sus compras y ventas cada 15 días en la ciudad de Guaranda. El sueño del señor es comprar un vehículo.
El desafío al que el señor se enfrenta es el transporte.
En su tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli y disfrutar de la fiestas de carnaval cuando es la fecha.
texts.en:
Juan Carlos is 30 years old, single and has no children. He lives in the city of Guaranda, Province of Bolivar. 

The communal bank Tagma Rumiñahui is made up of 14 members at almost 25 miles from the San Simon office. They devote themselves to crop and livestock farming. 

Juan Carlos earns a living in farming, growing soft corn and potatoes, as well as selling natural fertilizer and raising chickens. 

He is seeking the loan to purchase seeds, urea, insecticides and animals. With the support of the loan he will purchase the things he was needing so much. 

He makes his purchases and sales every two weeks in the city of Guaranda. His dream is to buy a vehicle. The challenge he faces is transport. 

In his free time he likes to play volleyball and enjoy the festivities of Carnival when it comes around.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, insecticides and animals.

loans.name: Aigul

texts.ru:
Айгул - участница группы "Азамат", ей 41 год, замужем, воспитывает 4 детей, младшая из которых школьница. Айгул в поисках источника дохода 4 года назад начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве. Благодаря упорному  труду Айгул на сегодняшний  день в ее хозяйстве имеется 1 корова с теленком,  5 овец с ягнятами, выручка с продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 3,000 сом (KGS). Также Айгул обрабатывает  1,60  га земли,  выращивает  в основном картофель и кукурузу.
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айгул обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Айгул планирует вложить в оплату обучения для средних сына и дочери.
texts.en: Aigul is a member of the group "Azamat." She is 41 years old, married, and has four children, the youngest of whom is still in school. In order to make money, four years ago Aigul started farming. Through her hard work, Aigul now has a cow and calf and five sheep with lambs on her farm. She makes 3,000 som (KGS) selling dairy products. Aigul also farms 1.60 hectares of land, growing mostly potatoes and corn. In order to further develop her business, Aigul asked Bai-Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to purchase calves. Aigul plans to use money she makes from the loan to pay tuition for her middle son and daughter.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Asilakhan

texts.ru: Асилахан – 48 лет, замужем, имеет 5 детей. Асилахан в поисках источника дохода 28 лет назад начала свой бизнес в животноводстве и полеводстве. Благодаря упорному  труду Асилахан на сегодняшний  день в ее хозяйстве имеется 6 коров, 20 голов мелкого рогатого скота , выручка с продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляет 12,000 сом (KGS). Также Асилахан ежегодно обрабатывает  1,5  га земли,   выращивает в основном кукурузу. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Асилахан обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS)  на покупку скота - молодняка.  Доходы от кредита Асилахан планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Asilakhan is forty-eight years old, married and has 5 children. Twenty-eight years ago, searching for an additional source of income, Asilakhan began a business centered on farming and animal raising. Thanks to her hard work, today she owns 6 cows, 20 heads of small-horned cattle and 1.5 hectares of land she grows corn on. She makes 12,000 soms (KGS) per month via the sale of milk and milk products. 

Hoping to expand her business, Asilakhan approached "Bai Tushum and Partners" with a request for a loan of 100,000 soms KGS) in order to purchase some young livestock. 
She plans to reinvest profits from the loan back into her business.

loans.use: to purchase livestock.

loans.name: Claudia Lissete

texts.es: Claudia  de  30años  de edad soltera con un hijo menor de edad tiene por actividad economica  la venta de meracaderia en general, con doce años de experiencia ya que desde muy joven se didica  a este negocio, el cual ha podido administrar gracias a su perseverancia y esfuerzo, y la necesidad de tener una herramienta de trabajo para ayudar con los gastos de sus hogar,  el la actulidad ha podido cumplir sus sueños que es de tener un negocio propio  y tener una casa propia para el bienestar de su hijo, gracias al apoyo que fundacion leon 2000 le ha brindo con los financiamiento, en esta ococion el fiananciamiento lo quiere para la compra de mecaderia como: perfumenes, cremas corporales, ropa interior, camisas, pantalones, sabanas, entre  otros.
texts.en:
Claudia is 30 years old, single, and has a young child. Her business involves selling general merchandise. She has 12 years of experience and has worked in this type of business from a young age. Claudia has been able to manage her business thanks to her perseverance, effort, and the need to have a source of work for covering the household expenses. She has fulfilled her dreams of having her own business and her own house for the welfare of her son, thanks to the support provided by Fundación León 2000.

On this occasion, the loan she is requesting will be used to buy merchandise such as perfumes, body crèmes, undergarments, shirts, trousers, bed sheets, and other items.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, body crèmes, undergarments, shirts, trousers, bed sheets, and other items.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio es un hombre de 47 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con su amada esposa y sus 2 queridos hijos; él siempre ha sido una persona muy trabajadora, persevante; en sus ratos libres le gusta dedicar un poco de tiempo a la lectura, y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz Chaufa para compartir con su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Agronomía. 
Gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y al apoyo de su familia, Antonio se dedica a la agricultura en un terreno arrendado en el cual cultiva papa, él dedica a su negocio un aproximado de 10 horas diarias, Antonio se encuentra muy a gusto en su negocio, ya que siempre le ha gustado mucho las labores del campo.
Antonio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de un motor para el regado de su cultivo; de esta manera podrá sostener la cosecha de su cultivo de papa y la del cultivo alterno de limones, así con ello espera poder incrementar sus  ventas e ingresos económicos para poder seguir expandiendo su negocio y adquirir un terreno propio y con ello espera poder cumplir su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos realizados.
texts.en:
Antonio is a 47-year-old man. He lives in the city of Nazca with his adored wife and his two beloved children. He always has been a very hardworking, persistant person; in his free moments, he likes to spend a little time reading, and on occasion he cooks a delicious Arroz Chaufa [fried rice with vegetables, eggs, and meat] to share with his family. Unfortunately, he was not able to pursue a degree due to lack of resources, but he would have liked to have been able to study agriculture.

Thanks to his enterprising spirit and the support of his family, Antonio works in agriculture on a leased plot of land where he grows potatoes; he works about ten hours a day. Antonio is very happy with his business, since he has always really enjoyed farm work.

Antonio is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, since thanks to the help being offered, he will be able to purchase a motor for irrigating his crops. That way, he will be able to maintain the yield of his potato crop and his alternate lemon crop, thereby increasing his sales and economic income so that he can continue to expand his business and acquire his own land; with his own land, he hopes to fulfill his greatest dream of seeing his children all grown up.

loans.use: To purchase an irrigation motor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay the initial payment for his motorcycle taxi

loans.name: Elegita

texts.en:
Elegita is married with 6 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elegita is 47 years old and has 3 children who are in school.

Elegita has a fish vending business in the Philippines. Elegita requested a PHP 25000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Elegita has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Elegita would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 52 years old and married with 7 children.

Erlinda works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 24500 loan through NWTF to buy additional inventory to sell.

Erlinda has borrowed and repaid 22 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns an income from food vending and raising livestock.

Erlinda aspires to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional inventory to sell.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica operates a grocery shop at Eguafo near Elmina. She has done this for 21 years now. The items in her grocery shop are milk, milo, sugar, soups, different kinds of soft drinks, tin tomatoes, tin fish, biscute, toffees, powdered milk, etc.  She is married with 3 children.   

Monica uses her income to support her husband and to pay the utility bills. She will use her loan to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Genayln

texts.en:
Genayln is 32 years old, married and has 3 children. Two of her children are in school.

Genayln is in the agricultural business raising pigs in the Philippines. Genayln requested a PHP 18000 loan through NWTF to buy additional feed for her pigs.

Genayln has been raising pigs for 10 years now, and has borrowed 7 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Genayln would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additioanl feed for her pigs.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Doña Lucia, es una señora de 57 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y vive solo con dos de ellos menores de edad en una aldea de La Carrosa, municipio de victoria, Yoro.
Ella es muy emprendedora toda su vida a trabajado duro para mantener a su familia, inicio vendiendo comida y pan de forma ambulante y hace 12 años ella decidió cultivar arroz, maíz y frijoles, además compra y vende cerdos para el destazo, siempre busca tener otras opciones para generar ingresos. Estas actividades de negocio las ha mantenido mediante la inversión de varios préstamos. Actualmente el préstamo que está solicitando es el catorceavo y lo va invertir en el mantenimiento del cultivo de arroz, maíz y frijoles, comprara fertilizantes y pago de mano de obra. Espera de esta inversión una mejor producción de calidad que le permita obtener buenos ingresos.
Su meta personal es poderle dar una mejor vida a sus hijos y nietos a su cargo y en el negocio mejorar la producción.
texts.en:
Lucia is a 57-year-old lady, a single mother of three children who only lives with two of them who are still minors in a village in La Carrosa, Victoria Municipality, Yoro.

She's very enterprising.  She's worked hard her entire life to support her family.  She started out selling food and bread from place to place and 12 years ago decided to start growing rice, corn and beans.  She also buys pigs to butcher and is always looking for other opportunities to earn income.

She's kept these business activities going thanks to several loans and is currently askig for her 14th loan to invest in corn, rice and bean crop maintenance.  She will buy fertilizer and pay labor costs.  

She hopes the investment will lead to better quality production that will allow her to earn good income.  Her personal goal is to give her children and grandchildren in her care a better life and her business goal is to improve production.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more plastic items.

loans.name: Abena

texts.en:
Abena is a fish monger  at Eguafo near Elmina. She buys fresh fish from market and smokes it to sell. She has been into this business for 20 years now.  

Abena is married to a farmer  and has 3 children. Abena assists her husband in feeding and clothing their children. Abena will use her loan to purchase more fish which she will smoke for selling. With the new profit, she will expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more fish which she will smoke for selling.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto tiene 41 años, es separado y tiene una hija de 17 años. 
Posee terrenos de cultivo en la zona agrícola de Huasahuasi (a 2 horas de su localidad), donde siembra papas de distintas variedades, las que al cosechar lleva a las ciudades costeras del país, viajando cientos de kilómetros. “Las papas de Huasahuasi son bien solicitadas en la costa, por eso siempre hay ventas y sus precios como semillas son mejores”, menciona. Cuando no puede cubrir la cantidad que sus compradores le exigen tiene que comprar sacos de papas de otros agricultores. Así también cuenta con un puesto de ventas en el mercado mayorista de su ciudad donde vende sus papas por kilos. Hace 15 años que realiza este trabajo y a pesar de que viaja constantemente no descuida los estudios ni es bienestar de su hija. Continuará trabajando porque le gusta su actividad.

Este es su tercer crédito con MFP, por eso agradece la confianza y la oportunidad de desarrollo que le brindan, por lo que se comprimente a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
Roberto comprará varios sacos de semilla de papas y junto a los de su producción los llevará a venderá a las ciudades costeras del Perú.
texts.en:
Roberto is 41 years old, separated from his spouse, and has a 17-year-old daughter. He has land that he cultivates in the farming district of Huasahuasi (which is two hours away from his town) where he plants potatoes of different varieties. The products that he harvests are taken to the coastal cities of the country, which requires him to travel hundreds of kilometers. "The potatoes from Huasahuasi are in high demand along the coast, so there are always sales to be made and the prices for seed potatoes are better," says Roberto. When he is not able to supply the amounts requested by his customers, he has to resort to buying sacks of potatoes from other farmers. He also has a vending post at the wholesale market in the city where he sells potatoes by the kilo. Roberto has been in this line of work for 15 years. Despite the constant travel, he does not neglect his daughter's education. He continues to work because he enjoys this activity.

This is his third loan with MFP. He is grateful for the trust and the opportunity for development that have been given to him. For this reason, he promises to be punctual with his monthly loan payments. Roberto will buy several sacks of seed potatoes that he can sell with whatever he produces in the coastal cities of Peru.

loans.use: to buy sacks of seed potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Iván, es divorciado y tiene un hijo pequeño con el cual vive en un cuarto alquilado ubicado en la zona Villa Bolívar  C de la ciudad de El Alto.
El estudio hasta la secundaria y actualmente trabaja como empleado por más de diez horas como chofer asalariado, ya que debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y pago de alquiler de su cuarto.
El crédito lo solicita para un anticretico (es una forma legal de alquilar un bien inmueble por un periodo de tiempo determinado y por un  monto establecido entre el dueño de casa y el inquilino. Al cabo del tiempo, el dueño de casa se compromete a devolver el total del dinero y el inquilino desaloja el bien inmueble) ya que desea ahorrar en el pago de alquileres para mantener a su hijo.
El sueño de Iván, es tener su propio vehiculo para tener más ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Ivan is divorced and has a small son living with him in a rented room in the city of El Alto's Villa Bolivar C zone.  He studied up to secondary school and currently works more than ten hours as a salaried driver since he must cover food and room rental costs.

He is asking for the loan to pay for an 'anticretico' plan (a legal form of renting real estate for a set period of time an for an amount agreed upon by homeowner and tenant.  At the end of the rental period the homeowner is obliged to return the total amount of the money and the tenant agrees to move out of the unit) because he wants to save on rental costs in order to support his son.

Ivan's dream is to own a car to earn more income and improve his quality of life.  His is the first time he's requested credit from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to pay for an Anticretico plan.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.es:
Jacinta tiene 58 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 5 hijos  y vive en la Ciudad de puerto Cortes.
Doña Jacinta tiene un negocio de una pequeña pulpería. Ella vende productos de la canasta básica como azúcar, harina, manteca,  golosinas, huevos etc. Su prioridad es trabajar en su negocio para ayudar con los gastos del hogar, con el paso del tiempo ha ido surtiendo poco a poco su pequeño negocio.
Actualmente es clienta de Odef y esta solicitando otro préstamo de 6000 lempiras para invertir en el negocio surtiendo con más productos alimenticios. Como harina, manteca, pan, huevos, etc.
La meta es tener mas productos de mayor demanda y estar mejor económicamente.
texts.en:
Jacinta, 58, is a single mother; she has five children and lives in the city of Puerto Cortes.  She has a small grocery store.  She sells basic staple items like sugar, flour, lard, snacks, eggs, etc.  Her priority is to work in her business to help with household expenses.  With the passage of time she's been gradually stocking her small store.

She is currently an ODEF client and is asking for another loan in the amount of 6000 lempiras to invest in her business stocking up on more foodstuffs like flour, lard, bread, eggs, etc.  Her goal is to have more products that are in high demand an to be better economically.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia lives with her husband, a driver, and 3 children in Eguafo near Elmina.  She sells shoes, slippers and African fabric and has done this for ten years.  

With her income, Emelia assists her husband in paying for their children’s school frees. Emelia needs this loan to purchase more shoes, slippers and bags to sell. With the additional profit from her expanded business, she wishes to acquire a shop where she can sell her goods.

loans.use: to purchase more shoes, slippers and bags to sell.

loans.name: Winshow

texts.en:
Winshow is a married man. He has 3 children with ages ranging from 2 years to 12 years. He describes himself as an outgoing man. 

He operates a motorcycle where he provides transportation. He has been involved in this business for the past 5 years. His business is near a university school along a tarmac road and his primary customers are residents and students. He describes his biggest business challenge to be few customers during rainy seasons. He will use the Kes 15,000 loan to buy motorcycle spare parts. His business goal is to run a well established motorcycle business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have the best motorcycle transportation services in his area.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle spare parts.

loans.name: Alcira Enoe

texts.es: Alcira Enoe es una mujer emprendedora inicio  su actividad económica en su pulpería Desde hace mas de 21 años. Su mayor deseo es ofrecerles siempre todo a sus clientes.
