El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de golosinas, refrescos, pan, granos básicos, jabón, fósforos, papel higiénico y sopas. Ella siempre se encuentra feliz de proporcionarle a su clientes lo que le solicitan y se siente muy agradecida porque gracias a fundación 200 a podido realizar sus sueños.
texts.en:
Alcira Enoe is an enterprising woman who established her own store more than 21 years ago. Her greatest wish is to always offer everything to her customers.

The reason for this loan is so that she can buy candy, soft drinks, bread, basic grains, soap, matches, toilet paper, and soups. She is always happy to provide whatever her customers ask for and is extremely grateful to Fundación León 2000 for helping her fulfill her dreams.

loans.use: to buy candy, soft drinks, bread, basic grains, soap, matches, toilet paper, and soups.

loans.name: Rigoberto

texts.es:
Rigoberto, es casado y tiene dos hijos con los cuales vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando dos habitaciones pequeñas y con paredes de ladrillo, la misma se encuentra  ubicada en  la zona Alto Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió hasta el nivel técnico medio de odontología  pero actualmente trabaja como chofer  por más de diez horas al día y hasta altas horas de la noche ya que necesita tener más ingresos para pagar los estudios y la alimentación de sus hijos. 
Rigoberto  solicita el crédito para el mantenimiento de su vehículo, chequeo de frenos, cambio de pastillas, líquidos y cambio de aceites ya que es la única fuente de ingresos  que tiene para mantener a su familia.
El sueño de Rigoberto, es tener su casa propia para mejorar la calidad de vida y dar más comodidad a su familia.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Rigoberto is married and has two children living with him in his parents' house occupying two small rooms with brick walls.  The house is located in the city of La Paz's Alto Sopocachi zone.

He studied up to mid-level dental technician but currently works more than ten hours daily as a taxi driver sometimes into the wee hours of the night because he needs to have more income to pay for his children's schooling and food.

Rigoberto is asking for the loan to service his vehicle; to check the brakes, replace pads, liquids and oil change because this is his only source of inome to support his family.

Rigoberto's dream is to have a house of his own to improve his quality of life and to give his family more comfort.

This is the second time he's asked for credit from IMPRO and KIVA.

loans.use: to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es:
Roberto, es casado y tiene dos hijos que están en etapa escolar, viven en la casa de sus padres ocupando tres habitaciones pequeñas y con paredes de ladrillo, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Plan Autopista de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió hasta la secundaria y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja como chofer por más de doce horas al día. Roberto es el único que solventa los gastos de alimentación, educación y servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo solícita  para la reparación de su vehículo, pues necesita cambiar la caja ya que es su herramienta de trabajo y es el único ingreso  que tiene para mantener a su familia.
El sueño de Roberto, es tener su casa propia para dar más comodidad a su familia y mejorar su calidad de vida.
Es la primera vez que solicita el crédito junto a IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Roberto is married and has two children who are school age.  They live in his parents' house occupying three small rooms with brick walls.  The house is located in the city of La Paz's Plan Autopista zone.

He studied up to secondary school and currently earns income because he works as a driver for more than twelve hours daily.  Roberto is the only one covering basic food, education and utilities for his family.

The loan he's requesting now is to repair his vehicle because he needs to replace the gearbox since it's his work tool and the only source of income he has to support his family.

Roberto's dream is to own a house to give his family more comfort and to improve their quality of life.

This is the first time he's asked IMPRO and KIVA for credit.

loans.use: to purchase and install a gearbox.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 25 years old. She is from Nakuru and is married with three school going children. She has a charcoal selling business that she has been doing for the past seven years.

Mary has applied for her first loan from KADET LTD, to enable her buy more bags of charcoal to add to her stock for selling. She is optimistic that her business will do better after the loan.

She hopes to own a hotel in the near future.

loans.use: to buy more charcoal for selling.

loans.name: Claudette

texts.en: Claudette is 28 years old. She is married with two children who are enrolled in schools. She sells andazi (fried dough) and breads and has been in the business for the past six years. She has requested the loan to buy more andazi and breads for selling. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her two children.

loans.use: to buy more andazi (fried dough) and breads for selling.
